ATP1M5MB: Sardaukar and Fremen forces are active in this region.

ATP1M7FRMini: Atrocities have been reported by the Fremen in this region.
ATP1M8FRMini: There is a small Fremen camp in this region.
ATP1M9GNMB: One of our men is missing in this region.
ATP1M10SAMB: Sardaukar have been quite active in this region, of late.
ATp1m11orMini: Our intelligence service requests your attention in this area.
ATP1M12GNMini: The conditions in this territory are unusually hostile.
ATP1M13GNMini: This territory is ideal for the transport of supplies.
ATP1M14HKMini: Harkonnen morale in this area is low.
ATP1M15FRMini: There is a Fremen camp in this region.
ATP1M17GNMini: There are reports of smuggler activity in this region.
ATP1M18SAMini: There is Sardaukar activity in this region
ATP1M19GNMB: This territory was once home to a smuggler base.
ATP2M1FRMini: There is a Fremen camp in this region.
ATP2M2IXMini: There is an Ixian base in this region.
ATP2M3SAMini: The Sardaukar forces are attacking the Tleilaxu!
ATP2M4IXMini: There is a small Ixian base in this region.
ATP2M5SAMini: The Sardaukar are in talks with the enemy in this region.
ATP2M6FRMini: The Fremen from this region are hostile.
ATP2M7FRMini: There are Fremen in this region.
ATP2M8IXMini: Ixian scientists are stranded in this region.
ATP2M9IXMini: There is Ixian activity in this region.
ATP2M11SMMini: Smugglers are a problem in this region.

ATP2M13IXMini: The Ixians in this region have an offer for us.
ATP2M14IXMini: There is Ixian activity in this region.
ATP2M15IXMini: There is Ixian activity in this region.
ATP2M16TLMB: There are reports of Tleilaxu in this area.
ATP2M17TLMini: The High Command has an interest in this region.
ATP2M18IXMini: An Ixian base is supporting the enemy.
ATP3M10FRMini: The Fremen are searching this region.
ATP3M12TLMini: The Tleilaxu in this region have contacted us.
ATP3M13SMMini: There is a smuggler base active in this region.
ATP3M1FRMini: The Fremen have asked for our help.
ATP3M2TLMini: There is a Tleilaxu base here.
ATP3M3FRMini: Fremen refugees have been seen in this territory.
ATP3M5TLMini: The Tleilaxu are negotiating an alliance here.
ATP3M6FRMini: There is a Harkonnen prison camp near this region.

ATP3M9IXMini: Ixian distress signals have been detected!
ATP1M1FR: We have detected a Fremen camp caught between our forces and the enemies!  The ensuing battle could prove a threat to their lives. The territory must be captured, but the Fremen camp should be protected!
ATP1M2SA: Sardaukar observers have become stranded in this region.  Find them and allow them to observe our combat prowess as we conquer the territory.
ATP1M3SA: Intelligence reports a Sardaukar camp in this territory.  We have had little contact with the Sardaukar so far. Their reputation is well deserved.  Do not antagonize them during the capture of this territory, Commander.
ATP1M4: You must locate a Fremen guide, who will lead you to the enemy base in this territory.
ATP1M5FR: The Fremen are battling the Sardaukar. Destroy the Imperial Barracks to help them.
ATP1M6FR: We are tracking a Harkonnen raiding party, emerging from the desert. They have more Fremen prisoners for the Baron's slave pits.  You must rescue these prisoners and destroy the base.
ATP1M7FR: You should be aware that we've had reports of Harkonnen atrocities against local Fremen settlements. The general responsible for these actions is based here.  The Fremen have sworn Kanly, a vendetta, against this man, but they are too weak to attack.  Do you admire the art of Kanly, Commander? Kill the officer and capture the territory, and you will earn the gratitude of the Fremen and free Arrakis of another Harkonnen parasite.
ATP1M8FR: The capture of this territory may prove to be more complex than we imagined. The Naib of the local Fremen sietch is critically ill and has asked for medical assistance.  He cannot be moved and is being attended in a makeshift camp nearby. When the medics arrive, escort them to the camp to treat the Naib.  The enemy is unlikely to attack the medics en route, but they may launch an attack against the Fremen camp.
ATP1M9GN: Our listening posts have received an emergency transmission. One of our senior commanders was caught in a Coriolis Storm while returning from enemy territory, and his Ornithopter crash landed.  He carries vital reconnaissance information.  You must locate him and bring him back to base safely.  It may cost the lives of some of our best men.  But, your priority must be to capture this region first.
ATP1M10SA: The Sardaukar have placed observers among us, to see if we are worthy of their support.  The Sardaukar would be too valuable an ally for us to ignore this opportunity. We must capture the territory with an overwhelming show of strength.  The Sardaukar observers will have access to our base and our communications network.
ATp1m11or: An Ordos assassin has been unmasked, and is attempting to escape.  You must prevent this escape by any means necessary! Be cautious.  This must not distract you from the more important task of capturing this territory.
ATP1M12GN: Some kind of viral outbreak has infected the Enemy troops.  A vehicle containing a cargo of vaccines has been dispatched by their high command. You must prevent these supplies from reaching the enemy.  If they are weakened by the virus, they will be no match for us.
ATP1M13GN: Coriolis Windstorms have prevented our supply frigates from reaching our forward outposts. Our supplies are dwindling!  Emergency rations must be transported by land.  We are using your attack as diversion, to get a supply convoy through enemy lines. It must reach its destination or our own frontline will be seriously weakened.  This territory must be captured to ensure that we maintain a strong defensive line.
ATP1M14HK: We have been approached by Harkonnen troops, seeking to defect.  It seems that they have been suspected of embezzling spice from the Baron's coffers! They claim to have information that will prove useful to us.  It may be a deception, but if they speak truth it may be worth the risk! You are to offer asylum to any deserters.  They are secondary, however, to the task at hand.  This region must be taken from the enemy!
ATP1M15FR: A tribe of fanatical Fremen have set up camp in this territory.  They are obsessed with the evils of all Offworlders and will attack anyone who approaches. This could jeopardize our objective of capturing this area.  Do not provoke them.  They will not interfere unless they are threatened.
ATP1M16AT: Surveillance of the targeted area shows an abandoned refinery in the battle zone. We have assigned you an engineer for the purpose of reactivating the refinery.  The additional resource will ensure a quick victory in this area.
ATP1M17GN: A trade caravan is due to pass through this territory soon.  Normally they carry little of significance, but we believe that this convoy is a cover for smugglers. Inspect it for contraband and commandeer the convoy if anything untoward is found.  Above all, remember -- the territory must be captured!
ATP1M18SA: There are Sardaukar based in this region.  Their commander is hostile to us and must be removed from power. Our attack is timed to intercept a small patrol, led by this hostile commander.  You must kill him and defeat his troops before the main force arrives. Extra resources have been allocated to ensure your success against the Sardaukar.  They must not prevent us from capturing this territory!
ATP1M19GN: Providence!  Dust storms have camouflaged the advance of our troops.  This will help us to capture this territory.  But, do not relax your guard.  Your airborne reinforcements have become disorientated by these same storms.  An abandoned smuggler outpost has been detected, just ahead of your forces.  You should attempt to reactivate it. Your reinforcements will use the outpost's signal to rendezvous with you.  Once they have arrived, utilize them to capture the region.
ATP2M1FR: We have received a disturbing report from the Intelligence units monitoring House Ordos.  The Ordos are manufacturing Gholas in the form of Atreides troops.  We believe that they intend to use them for attacks on Fremen sietches, in order to destabilize the Duke's negotiations. These attacks must be intercepted and the Gholas destroyed before the territory can be captured from our enemies.
ATP2M2IX: The Ixians have established a small base in this territory. The Ixians are neutral and we do not expect our enemies to attack them.  However, we have detecting a gathering of Tleilaxu forces. Their hatred for the Ixians suggests that their motive is to raid the Ixian base.  The Ixians are mercenary arms traders, but the Tleilaxu are an abomination. Destroy their forces before they can harm the Ix.  Once this is done, conquer the territory in the Dukes name!
ATP2M3SA: Intelligence reports that Tleilaxu forces are raiding the old Sardaukar tombs and removing genetic material for their Flesh Vats.  The tombs contain the bodies of those who have died in battle, and are sacred to the Sardaukar. The Sardaukar have vowed to avenge the desecration of their fallen comrades.  They will assist any House that attacks the Tleilaxu forces. We cannot afford to turn down their assistance.  All Tleilaxu forces are to be engaged on sight!  Conquer the territory!
ATP2M4IX: An Ixian base is suffering unrest amongst its worker drones, the Suboids.  Suboids are generally docile and loyal, despite their slave-like existence. A revolt is unheard of.  My instincts tell me others are involved in this!  Do not let this distract you, however, from the task at hand.  The territory must be captured!
ATP2M5SA: Our agents report that the Sardaukar have been negotiating with our enemies, in an attempt to forge an alliance.  We should prevent this from happening, if at all possible. The Sardaukar's respect for strength will assist us here.  Intercept the Sardaukar party on their way to the enemy base and show them proof of our superior might and numbers. They may reconsider their alliance and prevent the treaty from being signed.  Do your best, Commander!
ATP2M6FR: Reports are coming in from the desert, of a fremen prophet.  She preaches against us and hampers our attempts to meet with the local Fremen. After investigation, we believe that this Fremen is an impostor, a Ghola.  She must be removed, but the task will not be an easy one. Killing her could trigger a negative response among the Fremen.  She must be unmasked at close quarters and exposed as an agent. We must try to avoid Fremen casualties during this operation.  You must not forget that we are trying to gain their support!
ATP2M7FR: There is a Fremen camp in this area.  You should try to protect it while you conquer this territory.
ATP2M8IX: Ixian scientists are stranded in this territory.  The Ixians will pay generously if we escort them from the battlefield safely. Do not allow this to distract you from the capture of this region!
ATP2M9IX: The Ixian elite are arriving on Dune.  This is a sign of the importance they attach to their mission here.  A convoy carrying  their leaders will pass through this region.  The IX have asked us to protect them. The enemy will seek to embarrass us by attacking the Ixian vehicles.  You must balance the two tasks -- protect the Ixians, but be sure to capture the region!
ATP2M11SM: Smugglers have been hijacking our harvesters and vanishing into the desert before we can intercept them. This time, an alarm was sent and we are tracking them.  Their crime cannot go unpunished!  Find them before you capture the territory.  They must not trouble us again!
ATP2M12IX: The Ixians have a small base in this territory.  Their harvesters are off line and they are in need of resources. They have promised us units on delivery of this spice.  Although the diversion of a harvester will be a short term difficulty, the extra units should help you in your capture of the territory.
ATP2M13IX: House IX has asked us to test their units under battle conditions. We shall judge their performance and tactical advantages.  If they help in the capture of this territory we may purchase more.
ATP2M14IX: The Ixians have offered a bounty.  A Tleilaxu Face Dancer was traced to this territory. We expect the Face Dancer to be hiding at the enemy base.  As you capture the territory, ensure that this creature does not slip through your fingers.
ATP2M15IX: Ixian scientists are performing experiments in this territory. The coming battle will endanger them, but they insist that they will not leave their research.  House IX requests we take supplies to the scientists. They have promised us their support if we carry out this task.  Capturing this region will ensure that they will not be troubled in the future.
ATP2M16TL: A Tleilaxu research base has been destroyed.  Some of their experiments have escaped into the desert. You are to watch for rogue Tleilaxu units during your conquest of this territory.  Destroy them on sight.
ATP2M17TL: The Tleilaxu have convinced the Landsraad that there is a secret Ixian base in this territory, and that research at the base breaks the Imperial edict against thinking machines. The Landsraad demands our assistance in their search for this 'secret base.'  We will escort an Inspector to the base once it is discovered.
ATP2M18IX: The enemy has struck a deal with the Ixians.  They will receive a number of Ixian units in return for their support.  These units are too powerful.  They must not fall into enemy hands.  You must prevent their delivery!  If possible, capture the Ixian base to prevent the units being manufactured.  If this proves too difficult, destroy it along with the enemy!
ATP3M1FR: We have received a communication from the local Fremen. Tleilaxu snatch squads are hunting their most respected ecologist, a Doctor Behl.  The Doctor is an expert on the lifecycle of the Sandworm, and his knowledge would be sorely missed. You are to do everything in your power to save him!  But remember, this region must be captured as well!
ATP3M2TL: Reports of Tleilaxu abductions are increasing.  Fremen and civilian captives are being converted into Contaminators or fed into their Flesh Vats as raw material. We have discovered a base where these innocents are brought for experimentation.  This vile place must be destroyed as we claim this region for the Duke!
ATP3M3FR: Another Fremen settlement has been raided by the Tleilaxu.  The survivors are fleeing this way, with the raiders in pursuit! Some of our own troops fell in the attack on the sietch.  Even now their bodies are being processed and turned into unholy Tleilaxu creations! The raiders will not expect an attack here.  Wipe them out!   Show them how the Atreides deal with criminals!
ATP3M5TL: Our spies report that the Tleilaxu are meeting with the enemy to form an alliance! An alliance would make our battle for this territory a difficult one!  Ambush the Tleilaxu diplomats before they reach the enemy base, then proceed to take the region!
ATP3M6FR: Intercepted communiques reveal that a number of prisoners have escaped from a local Harkonnen death camp. The survivors are now being hunted.  As you capture the territory, you should help the escapees as much as possible.
ATP3M8TL: The Tleilaxu have joined with the enemy to gain support in their hunt for civilians. The base is heavily reinforced, and the Tleilaxu are a formidable obstacle.  We must capture this territory!
ATP3M9IX: A group of Ixian scientists has contacted us.  They seek refuge. They fear that local communications are being monitored and refused to disclose their location.  We know only that they are somewhere in this territory. Their information may be vital.  Find them if you can, but the capture of this territory is your first priority.
ATP3M10FR: There has been Fremen activity in this area. Groups of warriors have been seen, scouring the desert.  Investigate this before you launch your assault on the enemy base.
ATP3M12TL: A group of Tleilaxu scientists wishes to defect.  They have important information about the Tleilaxu! Shelter them from the Tleilaxu!  Capture the territory for the Duke.
ATP3M13SM: Smugglers in this area are supplying the enemy. Locate their base and confiscate their supplies. Post a guard here.  You must prevent the destruction of the Starport. Do not let that hardware fall in to enemy hands!  Don't waste resources by capturing the building, unless you must!
ATP1D1FR: The Fremen that you rescued have come to our defense!  The water debt they owe us might save our skins. They will die before they fail to honor it.  Your foresight is admirable, Commander!
ATP1D2SA: The Sardaukar that you rescued were most impressed. They have detailed a further squad to aid us. They should be more than adequate to defend the base.  Now you can assign more troops to take the offensive against our attackers.
ATP1D3SA: Out of respect for your leadership, the Sardaukar have assigned a squad of their elite troops to your command!  This is unheard of! Bravo, Commander. Make good use of them.  You must thwart the enemy incursion!
ATP1D4FR: The Fremen despise the Harkonnen.  They will assist in our attack, so that their warriors may share in the victory and spill Harkonnen blood!
ATP1D5FR: Our Fremen allies will attack the enemy here!  These desert-dwellers may prove to turn the tide of battle against our enemies!
ATP1D6FR: The Fremen have sworn revenge upon the enemy.  They require our assistance. Their leader is waiting in the desert to plan a joint attack on the invading forces.  You must locate him.
ATP1D7FR: The attack on the General has been met with widespread reprisals. The Harkonnen are sending their raiders deep into the desert to destroy the Fremen sietches.  One of these columns has been spotted in the area. The Harkonnen have taken many hostages.  Public executions have been planned in their capital.  You must rescue the Fremen and continue to defend this territory.
ATP1D9GN: The general that you rescued has considerable influence among the Fremen.  A group of Fremen warriors has come to assist in our defense of this territory.
ATP1D10SA: The Sardaukar observers seem impressed by the strength of our forces.  Sardaukar reinforcements have arrived to aid our defense!
ATP1D11OR: There have been reports of raids by Ordos commandos.  Be on your guard.  We must not allow them to jeopardize our hold on this region!
ATP1D12GN: The destruction of their vaccine supply has left the enemy demoralized and weakened.  Now is the time to strike!
ATP1D14HK: Harkonnen fugitives have been wandering in this desolate territory for some time. Soon they will die of thirst.  Perhaps they would rather join us?  We must retain this territory at all costs!
ATP1D17GN: The civilian populace has expressed interest in bartering for the contraband we confiscated.  It might be worth considering. It is the Duke's wishes that they be given a fair price.  Do not let it be said that House Atreides is without compassion!
ATP1D19GN: We have lost contact with an incoming Carryall.  Telemetry indicates that it has crashed in this territory. The Carryall's estimated position will appear on your radar.  You must find the cargo before our enemies do!
ATP2D1FR: Another squad of Gholas has been found.  One of them has escaped our outlying troops and is fleeing in this direction. It must not survive.  Its potential for mischief is too great. We expect a rescue attempt by the Ordos to recover their expensive investment. Capture it or kill it, but do not let it escape.  Then, defeat the invaders in this region!
ATP2D2IX: The IX have made good on their promises and supplied us with several units.  Make good use of them, Commander!
ATP2D3SA: In return for your assistance in avenging themselves upon the Tleilaxu, the Sardaukar will help us to defend this territory.
ATP2D4IX: The Suboid rebellion has been crushed and the survivors returned to slavery.  We have inconclusive evidence that the rebellion was incited by outside forces.  The Ixians hint that action must be taken. In return for your help, the Ixians have promised to send aid for the defense of this region.
ATP2D5SA: In accordance with our temporary alliance, the Sardaukar have set up a base in this territory.  They will be assisting in your defense.
ATP2D6FR: Following our contact with the Fremen Ghola, we have increased surveillance of Ordos activities. They are launching further attacks upon the Fremen with their Ghola troops. They must be stopped, even as you defend this territory from enemy aggression.
ATP2D7TL: A Fremen column was reportedly destroyed by the enemy not far from here. Watch for survivors attempting to make for the safety of our base.  You must protect them while you do battle with the enemy invaders.
ATP2D8IX: The Ixians have kept their word.  They have supplied us with units and resources in return for saving their lives.  Use these to bolster our defenses.
ATP2D9IX: In return for your protection of their leaders, the Ixians built a Research Center at our base.  It may be used to build Ixian vehicles to assist you in the defense of this territory.
ATP2D10aGN: Protecting the supply convoy has allowed us to train and provision extra troops. As a result, you will receive extra reinforcements in this battle.  Fight well, Commander!
ATP2D10bGN: Our supplies are running dangerously low, Commander! We cannot supply you with adequate reinforcements, but you must not allow the enemy to take this territory!
ATP2D11SM: The smugglers wish to avoid any more reprisals. They are sending 'recompense for the inconvenience we have suffered'.  Perhaps this 'recompense' will strengthen our defenses.
ATP2D12IX: Your financial assistance to the Ixians appears to have paid off, Commander.  They will supply us with Projector Tanks and Infiltrators.  These weapons could make all the difference!
ATP2D13IX: The financial assistance you gave the Ixians is to be repaid - with interest.  Their help may prove invaluable!
ATP2D14IX: An Ixian scientist is stranded.  The enemy has offered a bounty for his head.  Find him, and then defeat the invaders!
ATP2D15IX: The Ixians welcome our support, and have delivered a number of their units as payment.  Use them to defend this region!
ATP3D1FR: The Fremen have risen up against the Tleilaxu after the attempt on Dr. Behl.  They have mounted raids on a number of major Tleilaxu bases with great success. They do, however, send this warning.  During the destruction of an experimentation plant, a number of Tleilaxu units escaped. They may infest this territory.  This should only stiffen your resolve to defend the region against all attackers!
ATP3D2FR: The Tleilaxu base responsible for these evil experiments has been destroyed.  Its reign of terror has ended. The Fremen have discovered Flesh Vats among the ruins, containing fragments of their loved ones!  Their hatred of the Tleilaxu has never been stronger!  They ask that we avenge them and their families.  The Duke has pledged our support.  The Fremen have gathered spice to fund the war effort and helped us to capture this region.  The Tleilaxu will pay with blood!
ATP3D3FR: Some of the refugees have remained, to join with us in the coming attack.  Rearmed, they are a useful force.
ATP3D5TL: The Tleilaxu and our enemies have signed a treaty of mutual support.  We anticipate that our attackers will soon see reinforcements of Tleilaxu units. You should be wary, Commander.  Do not allow them to take this territory from us.
ATP3D8TL: The Tleilaxu are defeated.  Their revenge will not be long in coming.  Be vigilant!
ATP3D6FR: Resentment against the enemy is rising!  Support for our cause is growing! We can expect Fremen aid in the coming battle.  We shall defend this territory in the Duke's name.
ATP3D9IX: An Ixian scientist has defected.  He is being held in the Barracks, under guard.  The Ixians will stop at nothing to silence him!  Protect the barracks until you can defeat the enemy!
ATP3D10FR: Tleilaxu revenge for the Fremen attack has been swift!  A nearby sietch has been wiped out.  The survivors are heading this way, pursued by the Tleilaxu.  Help them in anyway you can. You must not be defeated.  If we lose this territory, the refugees are doomed.
ATHWD: Our Duke and his Fremen guests are surrounded by Tleilaxu Gholas and Face Dancers.  We believe that House Ordos is behind the attack! Engage the enemy and rescue the Duke!  There is only one way out -- by air! The majority of our troops still wage war on Arrakis.  You must use our remaining units wisely! A transport crate containing an advanced prototype Carryall has been dropped in the area.  Clear the enemy units, locate the Carryall, and fly the Duke to safety.
ATENDGAME: If the Emperor Worm awakens, all mankind is doomed to eternal slavery!  You must destroy it!
ATP1M1FRWin: You saved the Fremen camp.  The Fremen are grateful to you for protecting their families. The news has spread!  The other Fremen tribes see this as an example of our commitment to their cause.  We can expect Fremen assistance in the near future.
ATP1M1FRLose: Your failure to protect the Fremen camp has weakened our position. Mistakes like this are unacceptable, Commander.  We must convince the Fremen of our sincerity.
ATP1M2SAWin: The Sardaukar were monitoring this action and were impressed with our efficiency. We may look forward to aid from the Sardaukar in the future.
ATP1M2SALose: Our failure has damaged our prestige with the Sardaukar.  They do not see us as a viable contender for the throne.  We must prove them wrong!
ATP1M3SAWin: Your victory over the Sardaukar's attackers did not go unnoticed.  We have received a communiqué from the Sardaukar leadership offering their assistance.
ATP1M3SALose: Commander, we have failed the test.  We should expect more trouble from the Sardaukar.
ATP1M4win: The Fremen guide was willing to help us.  This is a very promising sign. More importantly, you have shown the Fremen that we trust them. Perhaps they may now start to trust us to help them.
ATP1M4lose: The Fremen ask why we scorn their help, after one of their men risked his life for us. You've been unable to locate the Fremen guide.  The Fremen are not very impressed with your lackluster performance.  They say that you've not spent enough time in the desert.
ATP1M5FRWin: The Imperial Barracks was destroyed.  The Fremen will help us with our coming battle!
ATP1M5FRLose: Without our assistance, the Fremen attack on the Sardaukar failed.  They sustained heavy losses. We must try harder, Commander.  An alliance with the Fremen is our best chance of victory.
ATP1M6FRWin: Your rescue of the captives has raised the spirits of the local Fremen.
ATP1M6FRLose: By Fremen custom, captives are already counted among the dead.  Your failure does not concern them, but a valuable opportunity has been lost.
ATP1M7FRWin: The Fremen people are grateful for the death of their oppressor. Their only regret was that his water was not spilled by Fremen hands.  Your actions will be remembered for many years.
ATP1M7FRLose: The General has escaped despite your efforts.  The Fremen will suffer for this. He is already massing his raiding parties for revenge.  The Fremen will be driven further into the desert wastes.
ATP1M8FRWin: The Naib is safe.  He will return to his sietch as an ally of House Atreides. With luck, he will convince others that an alliance between House Atreides and the Fremen will help to resolve the conflict on Arrakis.
ATP1M8FRLose: The failed rescue puts us in a difficult position with the Fremen.  We must regain their confidence!
ATP1M9GNWin: The commander had been in contact with the Fremen, and learned of an impending enemy attack. The Fremen have agreed to fight alongside us, as this territory holds some special significance for them.  They will ambush the enemy reinforcements to help us hold off the attack.
ATP1M9GNLose: The commander died before he could pass the information on to us.  His sacrifice was in vain.
ATP1M10SAWin: You have managed to sway the Sardaukar with your performance.  We can expect help from them in the future.
ATP1M10SALose: You have failed to protect the observers and the base has fallen.  The Sardaukar will not be impressed.
ATp1m11orWin: The assassin is being debriefed.  Rest assured we will discover its secrets and pass on any relevant information.
ATp1m11orLose: The assassin evaded you.  We will have to hope that it didn't escape with any useful information.
ATP1M12GNWin: Without additional supplies, the enemy cannot hold the territory.
ATP1M12GNLose: Your failure to destroy the supply vehicle has complicated our task, Commander.  Opportunities for easy victories cannot be squandered!
ATP1M13GNWin: The supply convoy reached its destination.  Our front line will hold!
ATP1M13GNLose: The supply convoy was destroyed.  The lost equipment must be found from elsewhere!
ATP1M14HKWin: The information from the deserters was quite useful.  We can expect to pick up more fugitives in the future.  The brutality of these Harkonnen monsters drives their soldiers into our arms!
ATP1M14HKLose: The deserters have been killed.  Most unfortunate.  Their knowledge might have proved useful.
ATP1M15FRWin: The Fremen may look more kindly on House Atreides after this.  They will soon see the wisdom in joining forces.
ATP1M15FRLose: Assaulting the Fremen solidified their mistrust of offworlders.  This cannot help our cause.
ATP1M16ATWin: Reactivating the Refinery will increase future productivity in this region.  Every small victory helps the Atreides cause!
ATP1M16ATLose: What happened to the engineer sent in to activate the refinery?  They were given specific orders.
ATP1M17GNWin: These smugglers have been a drain on our war effort.  Their capture has freed up precious resources and brought us a step closer to victory!
ATP1M17GNLose: Nothing was found this time.  The smuggler convoy is still out there!
ATP1M18SAWin: There is wisdom in your actions, Commander.  The Sardaukar should be more sympathetic to our cause.
ATP1M18SALose: Endless complexity -- plots within plots.  We shall see how the future unfolds…
ATP1M19GNwin: The smugglers are grateful for our help.  They may try to contact us again in the future.
ATP1M19GNlose: The Carryalls crashed in one of our territories.  You must locate them!
ATP2M1FRWin: Thank to your actions the Ordos plot has failed, Commander.  The Fremen finally understand what sort of enemy we face.
ATP2M1FRLose: The Ghola attack on the Sietch left few survivors.  The Fremen don't know who to trust.  The Duke's long term plans have suffered a serious setback.
ATP2M2IXWin: House IX extends its gratitude for our aid in holding off the Tleilaxu raiders.  They shall promptly pay off their debt to us.
ATP2M2IXLose: The Ixians mourn their dead. They are not likely to solicit our aid again, except under desperate circumstances.
ATP2M3SAWin: The Duke has ordered that Tleilaxu abominations be destroyed wherever they are found! Your assistance to the Sardaukar has been noted.  You may expect assistance from Sardaukar troops in the near future.
ATP2M3SALose: The Sardaukar attack on the Tleilaxu base has failed.  The Sardaukar have sustained heavy casualties.
ATP2M4IXWin: Control of the Suboids has been returned to their masters.  The rebellion is crushed and the Ixian elite are safe. This may be considered a successful mission, but it leaves a bitter taste in one's mouth.
ATP2M4IXLose: The Ixians were butchered by their slaves.  We believe that the revolt was instigated by Tleilaxu agents.  Our refusal to involve ourselves has been interpreted as assistance!
ATP2M5SAWin: Well done, Commander.  Convincing the Sardaukar to change their minds is a difficult task, even more so in the midst of battle.  Their assistance could be invaluable!
ATP2M5SALose: Influencing the Sardaukar is difficult, even in the best of situations, Commander.  Your failure in the midst of battle cannot be held against you. The addition of the Sardaukar to the enemy forces, however, may make things more difficult for us.
ATP2M6FRWin: The prophet's exposure has caused an uproar among the Fremen. Left unchecked, she could have turned the Fremen towards an alliance with the Ordos.  You have done a great service for House Atreides!
ATP2M6FRLose: The prophet's message still has influence over her Fremen followers.  There may still be trouble in the future!
ATP2M7FRWin: The Fremen are grateful for your help.  They abhor water thieves!
ATP2M7FRLose: The water thieves have escaped!  The Fremen aren't pleased.  To them, this is the gravest of crimes!
ATP2M8IXWin: The scientists are safe.  The Ixian research can continue.  We can expect payment soon!
ATP2M8IXLose: The Ixians are disappointed.  They expected more from us.
ATP2M9IXWin: The Ixians pay their debts promptly.  It is their nature.
ATP2M9IXLose: The Ixian convoy was destroyed.  This is a major diplomatic embarrassment for the Duke.  We will not be asked to protect the IX again, unless circumstances are desperate!
ATP2M11SMWin: The smugglers fate will teach other criminals that the Duke's patience is finite.
ATP2M11SMLose: We can expect these attacks to continue.  Resources allocated for the front line must be spent protecting our supply lines and resource areas.
ATP2M12IXWin: Dealing with the Ixians is a sensible choice.  They are generally trustworthy and pay on time.
ATP2M12IXLose: Who knows what the Ixians did without our help?  They may have turned to the enemy for assistance!
ATP2M13IXWin: The Ixians are grateful for your actions against the Tleilaxu.
ATP2M13IXLose: The escape of some Tleilaxu is cause for concern, for us and for the Ix.
ATP2M14IXWin: The Ixians will pay the bounty as agreed.
ATP2M14IXLose: The face dancer has escaped.  We shall see him again soon enough, I imagine.
ATP2M15IXWin: House IX is grateful for your efforts in re-supplying the scientists.  They have promised us aid in the future, once they reap the benefits of their research.
ATP2M15IXLose: The Ixian research failed due to their lack of supplies.  They have retreated from this area.
ATP2M16TLWin: The Tleilaxu have been defeated.  It appears that the outbreak has been stopped.
ATP2M16TLLose: The Tleilaxu units will spread across Dune unless they are stopped.  They must be hunted down and destroyed before they threaten our territories! We have allocated forces to patrol the areas to our rear.
ATP2M17TLWin: The Ixian base was destroyed.  The Tleilaxu must be punished!
ATP2M17TLLose: The Ixians are grateful to be alive, thanks to your actions.  We have gained favor with them.
ATP2M18IXWin: Our capture of their research center seems to have focused the minds of these Ixians.  Perhaps now they will reconsider their attitude towards their allies.
ATP2M18IXLose: It would have been preferable to have captured the Ixian research center.
ATP3M1FRWin: The Fremen are grateful that we rescued Behl.  The loss of his expertise would have been a serious blow to  the Fremen dream of terraforming Arrakis. This has earned us the sincere friendship of many Fremen, something our alliance with them did not necessarily provide.
ATP3M1FRLose: The Tleilaxu have Doctor Behl.  There is little point in mounting a rescue bid.  By now, what remains of the ecologist would be virtually unrecognizable.
ATP3M2TLWin: The destruction of the Tleilaxu base will stand well on your record, Commander!  Their experiments were an abomination.  The civilians in this area can live without fear, once again.
ATP3M2TLLose: Your failure to wipe out the Tleilaxu base is disappointing at best, Commander. They will move their operation to a new area and continue with their vile experiments.  The Fremen are disheartened by your lack of progress.
ATP3M3FRWin: The Fremen are grateful.  You are offered the status of a righteous man in their tribe, a rare honor indeed!
ATP3M3FRLose: Your failure has resulted in the death of the Fremen refugees.  The Fremen will abandon these regions if these attacks continue!
ATP3M5TLWin: Your prevention of the Tleilaxu plans has helped our cause!  They would have made powerful allies for our enemies.  Congratulations, Commander.
ATP3M5TLLose: We failed to prevent the enemy's alliance with the Tleilaxu.  We can expect difficult battles in the future.
ATP3M6FRWin: We have explained to the Fremen that the fugitives had been driven insane by Harkonnen torture. The Fremen understand and are grateful that their comrades died in battle, rather than facing a life of imprisonment.  We have returned their water to the tribe.
ATP3M6FRLose: Your failure to aid the Fremen escapees is regrettable.  They have undoubtedly been killed by the Harkonnen.
ATP3M8TLWin: The Tleilaxu were defeated.  They will never be allowed to prosper here!
ATP3M8TLLose: The Tleilaxu are powerful!   This was a difficult task.
ATP3M9IXWin: You are to be commended for rescuing the Ixian scientist.  His reports of Tleilaxu activities are most unsettling!
ATP3M9IXLose: The message could have been a trap.  Perhaps it was best not to be drawn in.
ATP3M10FRWin: The local Fremen are grateful for our help against the Tleilaxu, Commander.
ATP3M10FRLose: The Fremen have declared war against the Tleilaxu.
ATP3M12TLWin: The Tleilaxu defectors are dead!  A slow-acting poison was administered to them before their escape.  We may never know their secrets!
ATP3M12TLLose: We will never know the  dark secrets these Tleilaxu scientists wished to impart!
ATP3M13SMWin: The Smugglers know that we are on to their game.  They dare not trade with our enemies now!.
ATP3M13SMLose: This unsanctioned smuggler activity could undermine our war efforts.  It must not be allowed to continue!
ATP1D1FRLose: These Fremen fought bravely!  We owe much to these Zensunni Warriors!
ATP1D6FRlose: A joint attack might have cemented our bond with the Fremen. Their commander put himself at risk needlessly.  We have missed a valuable opportunity.
ATP1D6FRwin: This Fremen cooperation bodes well for the future.  We must not underestimate their value.
ATP1D7FRLose: By now, any Fremen captives who survived the journey will be hanging from the Harkonnen's walls.
ATP1D7FRWin: The surviving captives are free to return home to their families.
ATP1D8FRLose: You have failed to protect the Fremen, even in our own lands.  The Duke will not be pleased.
ATP1D8FRWin: This we have shown -- the Fremen will be protected wherever the Atreides flag flies.
ATP1D9FRwin: The Fremen fought bravely on our behalf.  We shall send our thanks to their sietch.
ATP1D9FRLose: The Fremen fought bravely on our behalf.  We shall send our thanks to their sietch.
ATP2D1FRLose: The Ghola evaded you.  You must be more vigilant in the future, Commander!
ATP2D1FRWin: We will examine this Ghola and see what we can learn.
ATP2D2IXLose: The Ixians have repaid their debt to us.  In future, it will be necessary to buy their assistance in the normal manner.
ATP2D3SALose: The Sardaukar are formidable fighters.  They would make useful allies.
ATP2D4IXLose: I trust that the Ixian reinforcements were useful, Commander.
ATP2D5SALose: The temporary alliance with the Sardaukar has ended.  The next time we meet, they may be fighting against us.
ATP2D6FRLose: The Ghola attack on the Sietch has left few survivors.
ATP2D6FRWin: The Ordos plot has failed, Commander.  The Fremen are safe from attack for the moment.
ATP2D7TLWin: Two things betrayed the face dancers to us -- their unusual speech patterns, and their boots.  No Fremen would wear their sand boots so tight! Sloppy.  Still, a clever plan.  We must be vigilant at all times!
ATP2D7TLLose: You failed to aid the Fremen.  They were almost certainly killed.
ATP2D14IXLose: The Ixian is dead.  No doubt his killers will claim their bounty.
ATP2D14IXWin: The Ixian is on his way.  We shall see what diplomatic benefits this brings, commander!
ATP3D1FRLose: The territory is infected by Tleilaxu poison!  We must sweep these villains from the surface of the planet!
ATP3D1FRWin: The Tleilaxu have been stopped.  The people of the region will be safe.
ATP3D2FRLose: Make good use of this Fremen aid, Commander.
ATP3D7ATLose: Excellent!  You used the enemy's own vehicles against them!  We now have intimate knowledge of their capabilities.  Well done, Commander!
ATP3D9IXwin: The Ixian scientist has survived.  A full debriefing is planned at headquarters.
ATP3D9IXLose: The scientist is died.  We have antagonized the Ixians, with no benefit.
ATP3D10FRLose: The Fremen suffered terrible losses at the hands of the Tleilaxu.  They will want their revenge.
ATP3D10FRWin: The Fremen are grateful for the Atreides protection.  They seek revenge against the Tleilaxu.
ATHWDwin: House Atreides is forever in your debt.  The last of the assassins are being hunted down, even as we speak.  We shall not forget this abomination!
ATHWDlose: Your failure is an embarrassment to House Atreides!
ATP1M1FRa: Mentat : A Fremen settlement is threatened by the battle.  The Duke has guaranteed their safety.  Do not break our word, Commander.  Protect them, but capture the territory!
ATP1M1FRb: Mentat : The enemy has destroyed the Fremen camp!
ATP1M1FRc: Mentat : The Harkonnen have sent troops to attack the Fremen.  They need our help!
ATP1M1FRd: Mentat : The Harkonnen are attacking the Fremen.  Protect the Fremen camp or they will surely die!
ATP1M2SAa: Mentat : You must find the Sardaukar before our enemies do!
ATP1M2SAb: Mentat : The Sardaukar will align with the strongest House, the House that assures a swift victory.   We shall fight alongside you, and observe your prowess in battle.
ATP1M2SAc: Mentat : The Sardaukar leader must survive the battle.  His report must reach his superiors!
ATP1M2SAd: Mentat : The Sardaukar have called in additional reserves.  These troops have been ordered to attack the enemy. Use this opportunity to prove that our troops abilities can equal the Sardaukar's!  Capture the region for the Duke!
ATP1M2SAe: Mentat : The Sardaukar officer has been killed.  The Sardaukar high command will not hear of our exploits.
ATP1M3SAa: Mentat : There is a Sardaukar base in this territory.  Do not engage them unless provoked.  Concentrate on capturing the territory.
ATP1M3SAb: Mentat : Congratulations, Commander.  The Sardaukar have a new found respect for House Atreides!
ATP1M3SAc: Mentat : A group of Sardaukar has entered the region.  They are heading towards their base.
ATP1M3SAd: Mentat : An enemy group is tracking the Sardaukar.  Their observations have gone unnoticed.  Attack them and warn the Sardaukar!
ATP1M3SAe: Mentat : The Sardaukar have been ambushed by the enemy.  Assist them!
ATP1M3SAf: Sardaukar : A cowardly attack!  Their masters will pay in blood!
ATP1M3SAg: Mentat : The Sardaukar base has mobilized to attack the enemy.
ATP1M3SAh: Sardaukar : We will avenge ourselves, Atreides!
ATP1M3SAi: Sardaukar : We are indebted to you.  We shall repay you in time.  For now, we have other business.
ATP1M4FRb: Fremen : Follow me. I will lead you to the enemy.
ATP1M4FRc: Fremen : The enemy base!  Wait here.  I will summon my tribe.  We will unite, and attack as a single force!
ATP1M4FRe: Fremen : We must retreat, but we have spilled much of their water!  The Harkonnen are weakened.  We may yet  drive them from this region.
ATP1M5FRa: Fremen : We will teach the Sardaukar a lesson!  They will pay for the Fremen water they have spilled!
ATP1M5FRb: Sardaukar : This does not concern you, Atreides.  It is between the Fremen and ourselves.
ATP1M5FRc: Fremen : You fought well!   We will send some of our younger warriors to join in your next battle.
ATP1M5FRd: We will slaughter every Sardaukar in this area!
ATP1M5FRe: Mentat : The Fremen have been ambushed by Sardaukar.  They are outgunned and need help!
ATP1M5FRf: Sardaukar : If you get in our way we will kill you, too!
ATP1M6FRa: Mentat : The enemy has captured the Fremen.  They will interrogate and torture them, then put them to death.  You must rescue them and return them to their tribe.
ATP1M6FRb: Fremen : The Fremen thank you, Commander.  They owe you their lives.  They are at your service until the water debt is repaid.  They will join you in your fight against the enemy.
ATP1M7FRa: Mentat : Find the general in the Harkonnen base, and eliminate him.
ATP1M7FRb: Mentat : We have located the enemy general.  He has taken cover inside the Harkonnen Radar Outpost.
ATP1M7FRc: Mentat : The Outpost has been destroyed and the general is confirmed dead.  The defeat has demoralized the enemy.  They are retreating!
ATP1M7FRd: Mentat : A distress signal is emanating from the Harkonnen base.  Reinforcements are being called in to protect the general.  Expect them to arrive shortly.
ATP1M7FRe: Fremen : A Harkonnen rescue party is on its way.  We will intercept it, and buy you additional time.
ATP1M7FRf: Mentat : Additional Harkonnen troops have arrived.
ATP1M7FRg: Mentat : The Harkonnen rescue force has arrived, but is too late.  They may yet attack to cover their forces retreat.
ATP1M7FRh: Fremen : We have engaged the Harkonnen reserves.
ATP1M7FRi: Mentat : The Harkonnen reserves have broken through the Fremen ambush.  Destroy the Outpost before they arrive.
ATP1M7FRj: Fremen : The Harkonnen have been wiped out.  Long live the fighters!
ATP1M7FRk: Mentat : The Harkonnen reserves are no longer a threat.
ATP1M7FRl: Mentat : The Harkonnen reserves have been defeated.  Onward to victory!
ATP1M8FRa: Mentat : Escort the medical vehicle to the Fremen camp.
ATP1M8FRb: Mentat : The medics have arrived.  Be sure they reach the Fremen camp.
ATP1M8FRc: Mentat : The medical vehicle has been destroyed and the Naib is doomed.  You must now concentrate on capturing the territory, Commander.
ATP1M8FRd: Mentat : The Naib is critically ill.  He must be taken to the medical facilities in the capital, where treatment can begin.  The medical vehicle must be protected at all costs.
ATP1M8FRe: Mentat : The Naib is dead.  Not even a Suk doctor can revive a corpse.
ATP1M8FRf: Mentat : The Naib is safely on his way.  Onward to victory!
ATP1M8FRg: Mentat : The fremen camp is destroyed, and the Naib is dead.  The rescue attempt has failed.  You must take this territory to ensure that the Naib's death was not in vain.
ATP1M8FRh: Mentat : The Naib is safe, but many of his tribe have died.  Every Fremen life is valuable, Commander, not just the leaders.  Take this territory to ensure that their deaths were not in vain.
ATP1M9GNa: Mentat : You must rescue the commander.
ATP1M9GNc: Atreides General : Escort me to the base!  I have vital information for the Duke.
ATP1M9GNd: Atreides General : We're under fire!  Where's that rescue force?
ATP1M9GNe: Mentat : The commander has been killed.
ATP1M9GNf: Atreides General : We can't hold this position!  If we stay here, we'll die.  Let's go!
ATP1M9GNg: Mentat : The Duke thanks you and your men for the commander's valiant rescue.  Now drive the enemy out of this territory!
ATP1M9GNh: Mentat : We have detected a group of Fremen.  Their purpose is unknown.
ATP1M9GNi: Fremen : Atreides, we have found your man in the desert.  He is known to our tribes.  The Fremen will protect him with our very lives.  But, you must move quickly!  The enemy knows he is here.
ATP1M10SA0: Mentat : Be aware:  Sardaukar observers will be visiting the base during this battle.
ATP1M10SAa: Mentat : The Sardaukar observers are arriving.  You must ensure that they remain unharmed.
ATP1M10SAb: Sardaukar : The enemy are attacking your base.  Do you know nothing of strategy?  You should be taking the fight to the enemy!
ATP1M10SAc: Mentat : The Sardaukar will not be pleased when they learn of their observer's deaths.  Only our complete victory in this region can salvage any hope of their support.
ATP1M10Sax: Sardaukar : We are here to observe your operation.
ATP1M10Saxx: Sardaukar : We have encountered a delay. We will deal with the interruption and continue to your base.
ATp1m11ora: Mentat : An Ordos assassin is expected to pass through this region, as it returns to its Ordos masters.  Capture it alive!  A prisoner is worth more to us than a corpse.
ATp1m11orb: Mentat : Commander - the assassin has entered your area.  Capture it!
ATp1m11orbb: Mentat : Listening posts report that an Ordos rescue force has been dispatched.  It will attempt to free our captive.  You must not allow this to happen.
ATp1m11orc: Mentat : The assassin has been captured.  It shouldn't be too difficult to find out how much it knows.  It is imperative, however, that you complete the mission and capture the territory.
ATp1m11orcc: Mentat : The Ordos have snatched the Spy. Destroy the APC before it escapes!
ATp1m11ord: Mentat : With the assassin dead, we are none the wiser about the Ordos espionage networks.  At least our secrets died with it.  Capture this territory in the Duke's name!
ATP1M12GNa: Mentat : The enemy in this territory desperately require a vaccination against a dangerous viral outbreak.  A medical vehicle is on its way to re-supply them.  You must destroy it.  But be cautious.  Our intelligence reports suggest that the Sardaukar have been employed to guard the delivery.
ATP1M12GNb: Mentat : The medical vehicle is making its way towards the enemy base.  You must prevent it from reaching them!
ATP1M12GNc: Mentat : The medical vehicle has been destroyed.  The enemy cannot hold this territory for long without those supplies.  We are one step closer to victory!
ATP1M12GNd: Mentat : The vaccine has been delivered to the enemy!  Press home the attack and capture the territory before the vaccine can take effect!
ATP1M13GNa: Mentat : Our supply convoy will pass through this territory.  You are to escort it safely to its destination.
ATP1M13GNb: Mentat : The convoy has entered your zone of control.
ATP1M13GNc: Mentat : The convoy has left the area safely.  Well done, Commander!  Now onward to victory, in the Duke's name!
ATP1M13GNd: Mentat : The supply convoy has been destroyed.  We must capture this territory in order to maintain our defensive line!
ATP1M13GNe: Convoy Leader : This is dangerous territory.  We're fortunate to have you as an escort, Commander.
ATP1M14HKa: Mentat : The defectors are making their escape bid!  They have yet been spotted by the Harkonnen forces…
ATP1M14HKb: Mentat : The defectors have been detected by the Harkonnen!  You should send an escort immediately!
ATP1M14HKc: Mentat : The defectors have been executed, and their information has died with them.  Complete your main objective.  Capture the territory!
ATP1M14HKd: Mentat : The deserters have reached safety.  Their information may allow us to coerce more soldiers to leave the Harkonnen and join us!
ATP1M15FRa: Mentat : There is a camp of fanatical Fremen in this region.  They are hostile to any strangers who approach, so keep your distance.
ATP1M15FRb: Fremen : Leave here, outsider!   We want nothing from out-freyn scum!
ATP1M15FRc: Mentat : Killing so many Fremen was an ill-considered move.  Their mistrust may grow into hatred.
ATP1M15FRd: Mentat : You should not have destroyed the camp.  It could prove a disastrous setback for the Duke's plan to ally with the Fremen.
ATP1M16ATa: Mentat : An Engineer has been detailed to reactivate the decommissioned refinery.
ATP1M16ATb: Mentat : Well done.  However, the refinery needs urgent repairs.
ATP1M16ATc: Mentat : The control sequences for the harvester have been initiated.  It is now fully operational.
ATP1M16ATd: Mentat : If the barracks are captured, we may be able to train our infantry in the use of enemy weapons and tactics.
ATP1M17GNa: Mentat : A suspected smuggler convoy has entered this territory.  You must inspect it for contraband goods.
ATP1M17GNb: Mentat : The convoy's destruction was a grievous error.  It's contents have been wasted!
ATP1M17GNc: Mentat : The convoy is being searched.
ATP1M17GNd: Mentat : The convoy is smuggling weapons parts.  These supplies will be confiscated and the drivers will be interrogated.  The way is now clear to capture this territory!
ATP1M17GNe: Mentat : The search has proved to be fruitless.  The convoy is legitimate.
ATP1M18SAa: Mentat : You are to eliminate a Sardaukar patrol in this region.  You must not be seen!
ATP1M18SAb: Sardaukar : What is your business here?
ATP1M18SAc: Sardaukar : We shall avenge this insult!  Attack!!
ATP1M18SAd: Mentat : The Sardaukar patrol has been eliminated.
ATP1M18SAe: Mentat : The Sardaukar patrol has been eliminated.  False evidence has been planted to ensure that our enemy is blamed for this assault.
ATP1M18SAf: Mentat : The Sardaukar patrol was not defeated quickly enough.  This territory will be difficult to capture.
ATP1M19GNa: Mentat : Find the smuggler outpost and use an engineer to restore it to active status.
ATP1M19GNb: Mentat : The outpost is nearby.  You must hurry.  There is not much time left!
ATP1M19GNc: Mentat : Increase your efforts - the advanced Carryalls might prove to be invaluable!  Unless you locate the Outpost, they will be lost to you!
ATP1M19GNd: Mentat : ALERT!  The Carryalls have sent their final distress signal.  You must reactivate the outpost!
ATP1M19GNe: Pilot : This is Advanced Carryall Flight 23. Your signal is strong.  We are triangulating your position and will arrive shortly.
ATP1M19GNf: Mentat : Repair the outpost and protect it until the Carryalls reach it!
ATP1M19GNg: Pilot : Advanced Carryall flight 23 reporting for duty.  We are yours to command, sir!
ATP1M19GNh: Mentat : Our enemy has detected the activated outpost.  They will attack shortly.  The building must be protected!
ATP1M19Gni: Mentat : Contact with the Carryalls has been lost, Commander.  You must capture the region without their help.
ATP1M19GNj: Mentat : Contact with the Carryalls has been lost.
ATP1M19GNk: Mentat : Telemetry data indicates that the Carryalls crashed in one of our territories.
ATP2M1FRa: Mentat : Ordos Gholas resembling your troops will attack a Fremen camp.  Stop them at all costs.
ATP2M1FRb: Fremen : Sound the alarm!  The Atreides are attacking!
ATP2M1FRc: Mentat : Destroy the Gholas quickly.  Their corpses will prove to the Fremen that we did not betray them.
ATP2M1FRd: Mentat : We have spotted the first Gholas.  They are exact replicas of the Atreides forces.
ATP2M1FRe: Fremen : Barak is dead.  By the laws of Kanly, our revenge will be bloody!
ATP2M1FRh: Fremen : Hanin is dead, murdered by traitors!
ATP2M1FRi: Fremen : By Shai-Hulud, my tribe will avenge me . . .
ATP2M1FRj: Mentat : The Fremen camp has been destroyed.  Our failure here could cost us dearly.
ATP2M1FRk: Atreides Soldier : That's one less Ghola to deal with!
ATP2M1FRl: Mentat : With the Gholas dead, we can use their bodies as evidence, to expose the Ordos plot.
ATP2M1FRm: Mentat : The Fremen are intent on revenge against the Ordos.
ATP2M1FRn: Mentat : More Gholas have entered the region.  Kill them before they reach the Fremen.
ATP2M2IXa: Mentat : The Tleilaxu are raiding an Ixian base.  An Ixian representative has contacted us, requesting that we assist in its defense.  He promises future assistance from the Ixians in return.
ATP2M2IXb: Tleilaxu : Do not attempt to protect these heathens!  Step aside or join them in hell!
ATP2M2IXc: Mentat : We have failed to defend the Ixian base.  Their trust in us will almost certainly be diminished.
ATP2M2IXd: Mentat : The Tleilaxu raiders have been destroyed, and the Ixians are grateful.  Well done, Commander.
ATP2M2IXe: Mentat : The raiders are approaching in small groups and massing for an attack.  If you locate their staging area, perhaps the attack cold be prevented.
ATP2M2IXf: Mentat : A small group of Tleilaxu have been detected entering the territory.
ATP2M2IXg: Mentat : The Tleilaxu have amassed a large raiding party, and are preparing to attack.  The Ixian base commander has ordered a small group of Infiltrators to harass them, but you should move your troops into position to defend the base.
ATP2M2IXh: Mentat : The Ixians are under attack!  This is your last chance to protect them, Commander.
ATP2M3SAa: Mentat : Attack the Tleilaxu base!  The Sardaukar have vowed to stand with you!
ATP2M3SAb: Sardaukar : We have come to destroy the Tleilaxu infestation!  Your aid would be welcome.
ATP2M3SAc: Mentat : We have visual confirmation of the Tleilaxu position.
ATP2M3SAd: Sardaukar : Our comrades have been avenged.  They will be returned to their tombs.
ATP2M3SAe: Tleilaxu : The Sardaukar could not attack us without Atreides help.  You will pay for this!
ATP2M3SAf: Tleilaxu : We anticipated your attack, Atreides.  Now pay with your lives!
ATP2M3SAg: Mentat : The Sardaukar have been wiped out!  The Tleilaxu will attack our positions next.
ATP2M3SAh: Mentat : Tleilaxu reinforcements have arrived.  Be careful, Commander!
ATP2M3SAi: Sardaukar : We have come to assist you, Atreides.
ATP2M4IXa: Mentat : An Ixian base is endangered by a Suboid revolt. The Ixians are begging for assistance!
ATP2M4IXb: Suboid : Kill the Masters!  Freedom will be ours!
ATP2M4IXc: Ixian : You must help us!  Name your price, we will pay anything!
ATP2M4IXd: Ixian : We will provide you with units for your next battle. Now, we must rebuild our base and assess our losses.
ATP2M4IXe: Suboid : Our masters are dead.  We are free!  Do not stand in our way!
ATP2M4IXf: Suboid : Our friends will make you pay for your attack!
ATP2M4IXg: Mentat : The Tleilaxu are attacking both sides.  I recommend that you assign additional forces, Commander!
ATP2M4IXh: Suboid : Why do our friends attack us?  They promised us freedom!
ATP2M5SAa: Mentat : Word has reached us that the Sardaukar are planning a temporary alliance with our enemies in this territory.  Meet with the Sardaukar emissary and convince him of our superiority!
ATP2M5SAb: Mentat : You failed to convince the Sardaukar, and they have joined with the enemy for the time being.
ATP2M5Sac: Mentat : The Sardaukar are impressed with your audacious behavior, Commander.  They will join you for the time being, and see how you fare in battle.
ATP2M5Sad: Mentat : The Sardaukar delegation has arrived.  When you meet with them, be sure that you outnumber our enemy!
ATP2M6FRa: Mentat : The Ordos have created the Ghola of a Fremen religious leader. She is inciting the Fremen against us. You must capture her and reveal her true role as an enemy agent!
ATP2M6FRb: Atreides Soldier : We come in peace, Fremen.  But, we are the bearers of distressing news. Your prophet is false!  It is a ghola construct, sent by the enemy to deceive you!
ATP2M6FRc: Ghola : Ya! Ya! Yawm!  Hear me, my followers!  Do not believe the Atreides lies!  You have seen the omens, you have seen my powers!   Ya! Ya! Yawm!
ATP2M6FRd: Mentat : Now these Fremen will fight to the death against our perceived oppression!
ATP2M6FRe: Mentat : The Ghola has armed a self-destruct device.  Move her away from the camp!
ATP2M6FRf: Ghola : You cannot keep me captive!  I am the prophet of Shai-Hulud!
ATP2M7FRa: Mentat : There is a Fremen base nearby.  They have called in extra defenses to ensure their safety during the battle.  It must not be harmed during your capture of the territory!
ATP2M7FRb: Mentat : The Fremen reinforcements are attacking their own camp!  They are bandits!  Protect the settlement, Commander.  Kill the attackers!
ATP2M7FRc: Mentat : The Fremen camp has been destroyed, and a nearby sietch has been alerted.  The bandits are retreating towards the enemy base - intercept them!
ATP2M7FRd: Fremen : The water thieves will be punished!  They shall not escape us!
ATP2M7FRe: Mentat : The fugitives are dead.  The water they stole shall be returned to the tribe.  Now drive the enemy from this region!
ATP2M8IXa: Mentat : Ixian scientists have been stranded by the battle.  Rescue them, and protect them from harm while you fight for control of the territory!
ATP2M8IXb: IX: Thank you, Commander.  We are in your debt.  If you continue to protect us, your reward will be great.
ATP2M8IXc: Mentat : The Ixians are dead.  We must concentrate on the capture of this territory.
ATP2M8IXd: Mentat : One of the scientists has been lost.  The others need your help if they are to survive!
ATP2M8IXe: Mentat : A group of Tleilaxu units have been detected.  The Ixian scientists must be their target.  They hate the Ix.  Destroy the Tleilaxu attackers!
ATP2M9IXa: Mentat : An Ixian convoy is due to pass through the battle zone.  It must not be harmed!
ATP2M9IXb: Mentat : The Ixian convoy has arrived.
ATP2M9IXc: Mentat : The convoy has left the area safely.  Well done, Commander.
ATP2M9IXd: Mentat : The convoy has been wiped out!  You must capture the territory!
ATP2M9IXe: Ixian : We are grateful for your protection, Commander.
ATP2M9IXf: Mentat : Tleilaxu units have entered the area and are moving to intercept the Ixian convoy.  They must be stopped.
ATP2M9IXg: Tleilaxu : How dare you interfere in our war with the Ix?   Now you will die with them!
ATP2M11SMa: Mentat : Smugglers have stolen one of our harvesters.  Find it and take it back!  Use as much force as necessary.
ATP2M11SMb: Mentat : We have located the harvester.  Defeat the guards and recapture it!
ATP2M11SMc: Mentat : The harvester is ours again.  Return it to its harvesting duties.  Let the rest of the convoy go.  They have learned what it means to cross the Atreides!
ATP2M11SMd: Mentat : The harvester was too valuable to be destroyed!  It could have helped us capture this area!
ATP2M11SMe: Mentat : The harvester is rigged with explosives.  The smugglers were obviously prepared for us.  Move it away from our units!
ATP2M11SMf: Mentat : The bomb has detonated!  The timer must have been set the moment it was recaptured.
ATP2M11SMg: Mentat : The stolen harvester has been detected.  Take a small force and recapture it.
ATP2M12IXa: Mentat : An Ixian base has offered us vehicles in return for deliveries of spice.
ATP2M12IXb: Ixian : The bargain is simple.  If you deliver spice, we will deliver units.
ATP2M12IXc: Ixian : What is the meaning of this attack?  Leave us in peace!
ATP2M12IXd: Ixian : Accept this unit as payment.  These payments will continue, so long as the spice is delivered.
ATP2M12IXe: Ixian : The spice delivery is welcomed.  You will be rewarded very soon.
ATP2M13IXa: Mentat : The Ixians have supplied the units for battle testing.  They are sophisticated, but their armor is light.  Put them through the paces as you capture this territory.
ATP2M13IXb: Mentat : Tleilaxu observers have been detected at the enemy base.  They must be watching the trials of the Ixian vehicles.  We will communicate this to the Ixians.
ATP2M13IXc: Mentat : The Ixians have sent extra reinforcements to the area to help in the destruction of the enemy base.  However, they insist that the priority is the destruction of the Tleilaxu.
ATP2M13IXd: Mentat : The death of the Tleilaxu fulfills our obligation to the Ix.  Now we shall conquer this region for the Duke!
ATP2M14IXa: Mentat : A Tleilaxu Face Dancer has taken refuge here.  Hunt it down for the bounty!
ATP2M14IXb: Mentat : The spy is on the move!  Destroy it!
ATP2M14IXc: Mentat : The face dancer has been detected.
ATP2M14IXd: Mentat : The face dancer is dead.  The bounty should follow shortly.  You must continue to capture this region.
ATP2M14IXe: Mentat : The spy now has an escort, and they are trying to escape.  Killing him will be more difficult.
ATP2M14IXf: Tleilaxu : Any attack on our units will be will be met with force.  Do not provoke us, Atreides.
ATP2M14IXg: Tleilaxu : Now you will face the wrath of House Tleilaxu!
ATP2M15IXa: Mentat : The Ixian scientists need more supplies.  Escort the sandcrawler to them.
ATP2M15IXb: Ixian : You have our gratitude.  Your units will arrive shortly.
ATP2M15IXc: Ixian : Again, we are grateful to you.  We have arranged for the delivery of a third load.  It is essential to our work  here.
ATP2M15IXd: Mentat : We have received a signal from the Ixians.  The consignments have all been delivered.
ATP2M15IXe: Mentat : The supply vehicle has been destroyed.  The  Ixian research will fail without the components it carried.
ATP2M15IXf: Mentat : The sandcrawler must be stopped!  A bomb has been detected inside the consignment.  The Ixians are attempting to disarm the bomb now.  Do not take the crawler into the Ixian base!
ATP2M15IXg: Mentat : The Ixians report that it will take time to disarm the bomb.  It is set to be triggered remotely as it approaches the Ixian base.  The base is now being searched.
ATP2M15IXh: Mentat : The bomb has been detonated by the proximity fuse!
ATP2M15IXi: Mentat : Tleilaxu units are entering the area, undoubtedly to attack the Ixian vehicles.  The proximity fuse is not yet disarmed.
ATP2M15IXj: Mentat : The Tleilaxu are carrying a short-range transmitter.  It's an alternate trigger device for the bomb in the sandcrawler!  If they get close it will detonate!
ATP2M15IXk: Mentat : A Tleilaxu unit got close enough to the sandcrawler to detonate the bomb!
ATP2M15IXl: Mentat : With the destruction of the supplies, the Ixians cannot complete their experiments.  For the time being, we must concentrate on defeating the enemy.
ATP2M15IXm: Mentat : The proximity trigger has been defused.  The sandcrawler can now be delivered to the Ixian base.
ATP2M15IXn: Mentat : The Ixians have built an Infiltrator for us.
ATP2M16TLa: Mentat : Seek out the Tleilaxu and destroy them!
ATP2M16TLb: Mentat : We are picking up garbled transmissions. The Tleilaxu appear to be headed for the enemy's positions.
ATP2M16TLc: Mentat : The enemy are under attack from the Tleilaxu.
ATP2M16TLd: Enemy transmissions show that the Tleilaxu have ceased attacking.  Be prepared, Commander!
ATP2M16TLe: Mentat : We are under attack by the Tleilaxu!
ATP2M16TLf: Mentat : All Tleilaxu units have been eliminated.  Now that this territory has been cleared, we will capture it for the Duke!
ATP2M16TLg: Mentat : The villagers have been infected!  Prepare to defend yourselves.
ATP2M16TLh: Mentat : Check on the nearby civilian settlement.  They will need to be protected from the Tleilaxu.
ATP2M17TLa: Mentat : The Landsraad have asked us to escort an Inspector to a hidden Ixian base in this region, in order to check for infringements of the Butlerian Jihad.
ATP2M17TLb: Inspector : Thank you for guiding me here, Commander.  I must begin the inspection.
ATP2M17TLc: Inspector : The Inspector claimed to have found evidence of forbidden technology at the Ixian base.  He has summoned Tleilaxu monsters to attack the Ixians.   The Duke does not trust this report.  Protect the Ixians if you can!
ATP2M17TLd: Ixian : The Inspector is a Tleilaxu agent!  His report is a lie!  The Tleilaxu seek to justify the destruction of our base.  You must help us!
ATP2M17TLe: Inspector : Commander, I see that you have located the Ixian base.  I must go there as quickly as possible, to begin the inspection.
ATP2M17TLf: Tleilaxu : Heretics!  How dare you interfere with the cleansing of this unholy place!  You will suffer for this outrage!
ATP2M17TLg: Mentat : You defeated the Tleilaxu, but their purpose was fulfilled.  We can cover our error by claiming that their creatures went rogue and had to be destroyed.
ATP2M17TLh: Mentat : The base is safe.  The Ixians are in our debt.  Good work, Commander.
ATP2M17TLi: Mentat : The Tleilaxu ploy was successful.  The Ixian base has been destroyed!
ATP2M17TLj: Mentat : Despite your efforts, the Ixian base has been destroyed.
ATP2M18IXa: Mentat : Your mission is to capture the Ixian base in this territory.  Failing this, destroy it.
ATP2M18IXb: Mentat : The Duke would have preferred that we capture the Ixian base, but its destruction does mean that the enemy is weakened.  Onward to victory!
ATP2M18IXc: Mentat : The Ixian research center has been destroyed.  Would that we could have captured it!  The Duke will be disappointed.
ATP2M18IXd: Mentat : Good work, Commander.  You must now protect the Ixian base from enemy attempts to destroy it.
ATP3M1FRa: Mentat : Find the Fremen ecologist.  Protect him from the Tleilaxu!
ATP3M1FRb: Mentat : Dr. Behl has been found!  Good work, Commander.  The Fremen are sending a group of warriors to act as his bodyguard.  Protect him until they arrive.
ATP3M1FRc: Fremen ecologist : Do your worst!  I am Fremen.  I am ready to join with Shai-Hulud in the next life! Do your worst.  I am Fremen.  I am ready to die.
ATP3M1FRd: Mentat : The Fremen ecologist has been killed!   You must continue with the capture of this territory.
ATP3M1FRd2: Mentat : The death of the ecologist sent his bodyguard into a death frenzy!
ATP3M1FRe: Mentat : Tleilaxu have been detected, entering this region.  They come for the ecologist!
ATP3M1FRf: Mentat : The Tleilaxu have captured Dr. Behl!  Intercept them and rescue him.
ATP3M1FRg: Tleilaxu : We know that the scientist is under your protection.  Give him to us, or die!
ATP3M1FRh: Mentat : The Tleilaxu are leaving with the ecologist.  Mount a rescue before it is too late!
ATP3M1FRi: Mentat : The ecologist has been taken by the Tleilaxu.  We have no time to mourn him - capture the region for the Duke!
ATP3M1FRj: Mentat : The ecologist has made a break for freedom.  He will need protection!
ATP3M1FRk: Tleilaxu : If we cannot take him alive, we will have his corpse!
ATP3M1FRl: Fremen : We will spill our own water to protect our leader,  Atreides!  The future of our people is in his hands!.
ATP3M2TLa: Mentat : Destroy the Tleilaxu base and its guards.  Raze it to the ground!
ATP3M2TLb: Tleilaxu : What is your business here, Atreides?
ATP3M2TLc: Tleilaxu : Stop your attack!  We have great riches!  We can reward you!
ATP3M2TLd: Tleilaxu : A plague upon your house!   Your corpses will feed our flesh vats!
ATP3M2Tle: Tleilaxu : A curse on your Duke!  On the Day of Judgment you shall be damned!
ATP3M2TLf: Mentat : The Duke proclaims that Tleilaxu abominations will not be tolerated on his land!
ATP3M2TLg: Mentat : We have detected a group of civilians under attack by Tleilaxu units.  Help them!
ATP3M2TLh: Mentat : The civilian captives are being massacred by the Tleilaxu!  We must avenge them!
ATP3M2TLi: Tleilaxu : You shall not reclaim these subjects!   They are our property!
ATP3M2TLj: Mentat : The remaining civilians are running for their lives!  Protect them if you can!
ATP3M2TLk: Tleilaxu : This indignity shall be repaid a thousandfold!  Flee now, while you have the chance!
ATP3M2TLl: Tleilaxu : You have had fair warning.  Now pay for your transgressions!
ATP3M3FRa: Mentat : A Fremen sietch has been destroyed by the Tleilaxu.  The survivors are heading in this direction, seeking refuge.  It is our duty to find and protect them.
ATP3M3FRb: Fremen : The Tleilaxu approach!  You must help us!
ATP3M3FRc: Tleilaxu : Leave now, Atreides!  Or suffer the consequences!
ATP3M3FRd: Mentat : The refugees are dead.  We have failed them.  All we can do now is capture this territory, in the hope that it may provide a safe haven for other Fremen.
ATP3M3Fre: Mentat : The Tleilaxu raiders have been wiped out.  Death was too good for these torturing beasts!
ATP3M3FRf: Mentat : A group of refugee Fremen are headed for our base.  They have very few weapons and are quite vulnerable.  You must protect them!
ATP3M3FRg: Tleilaxu : We are defeated… for now.  But watch your backs, Atreides!  We will return!
ATP3M5TLa: Mentat : A Tleilaxu envoy is heading through this territory, on its way to meet with our enemies!  Kill the diplomat, and prevent any possible alliance between them!
ATP3M5TLb: Mentat : The Tleilaxu delegate made it through the enemy lines and an agreement has been reached.  We must capture the region quickly before they can take full advantage of this new alliance!
ATP3M5TLc: Mentat : The envoy is dead, and the alliance, thwarted.  Now is the time to strike!   You must capture the territory for the Duke.
ATP3M5TLd: Mentat : The Tleilaxu diplomat is heading for the enemy base.  Intercept him!
ATP3M6Fra: Mentat : A group of Fremen have escaped from the local Harkonnen death camp.  They are now headed for our lines.  If all goes well, they should meet us in this territory.  Protect them.  They must be debriefed.
ATP3M6FRb: Fremen : I would sooner die than be returned to the tribe!
ATP3M6FRc: Fremen : Are you Harkonnen?  You seem . . . different.  It is so difficult to know who to trust.  Will you help us?  We must rest.
ATP3M6FRd: Fremen : Forgive us!  Harkonnen were everywhere!  Even within our own ranks, there were double agents. The spies were clever, but we unmasked them.  We spilled their water in the desert.
ATP3M6Fre: Fremen : The Harkonnen are here.  I sense their presence.   I cannot see them, but I feel them . . . everywhere.
ATP3M6FRf: Mentat : The fugitives are exhibiting symptoms of extreme psychosis, probably brought on by dehydration and their brutal treatment in the death camps.  Be cautious.  Keep them at a safe distance.
ATP3M6FRg: Fremen : Why do you send us back?  I won't go!  I won't return!   I'll kill you first, I'll kill all of you!
ATP3M8TLa: Mentat : The enemy and the Tleilaxu have joined forces against the Atreides.  A massive Tleilaxu force is heading in your direction. The Fremen are mobilizing a relief force.  Stand firm.  They will reach you soon!
ATP3M8TLb: Mentat : The Fremen relief force is on its way.
ATP3M8TLc: Mentat : The Fremen force has entered the outer borders of the territory.  Hold on!
ATP3M8TLd: Mentat : Our long-range scans have picked up the Fremen relief contingent!
ATP3M8TLe: Mentat : The Fremen have arrived, and are at your command!  Onward to victory!
ATP3M9IXa: Mentat : Tracking stations report unusual activity.  It might be a signal from the scientists.
ATP3M9Ixb: Ixian : You have our gratitude.  Our team was traveling through the wastes.  We witnessed a group of Tleilaxu frigates transporting strange and exotic equipment to the surface.  They spotted us and attacked.  We were the only survivors from our group.
ATP3M9IXbb: Ixian : Don't shoot!  We have been lost for days.  Most of our team was devoured by sandstorms and worms.  We are all that's left.  We witnessed something strange in the desert and fell under attack.  We managed to escape, but even now, they are tracking us . . .
ATP3M9Ixc: Ixian : What this?  Our vehicles!   They have been infected by the Tleilaxu!
ATP3M10FRa: Mentat : You must find out what the Fremen are doing in this region.
ATP3M10FRc: Tleilaxu : We shall remember this.  You will regret your foolish actions!
ATP3M10FRd: Fremen : These abominations must be dealt with.  Your destruction can wait!
ATP3M10FRe: Mentat : The Tleilaxu have been wiped out!  These Fremen are more than equal to the Tleilaxu.
ATP3M10FRf: Fremen : Why do you come to us?  Will you aid us in our fight?
ATP3M10FRg: Tleilaxu : We were attacked by these vermin, and now we shall destroy them!   Do not interfere!
ATP3M10FRh: Mentat : The Fremen are dead.  The Tleilaxu are reclaiming Fremen corpses for their Flesh Vats.
ATP3M10FRi: Tleilaxu : Now you shall pay for your interference!  You will join your colleagues in our flesh vats!
ATP3M12TLa: Mentat : The Tleilaxu deserters have been detected.  You must escort them to the base, in safety!
ATP3M12TLb: Tleilaxu : We beg for your protection!   The experiment . . it has gone too far!   Give us sanctuary, we beg you!
ATP3M12TLbb: Tleilaxu : You must protect us!  It is coming!   It will kill us!  It will destroy everything!  We must leave this planet!
ATP3M12TLc: Mentat : A Tleilaxu force is headed for your position, Commander.  Prepare for an attack.
ATP3M13SMa: Mentat : Find the smuggler's Starport.  Punish the occupants for their misdeeds!
ATP3M13SMb: Smuggler : We surrender!   But there are still deliveries in transit.  Allow us to survive, and they are yours.  Kill us, and they will never arrive!
ATP3M13SMc: Smuggler : Here, take this these supplies!   More deliveries are scheduled, but we must call them in.  If we are not heard from, the deliveries will be cancelled!
ATP3M13SMd: Smuggler : Thank you for your mercy.  Perhaps, in future, we could… do a little business?
ATP3M13SMe: Mentat : The smuggler Starport has been destroyed.  There will be no more deliveries to intercept!
ATP3M13SMf: Mentat : There will be no more deliveries to this Starport.  There are no Smugglers left to call them in!
ATP3M13SMx: Mentat : The smuggler Starport has been captured, but free deliveries, courtesy of the enemy, are now at an end!  .
ATP1D1FRa: Fremen : We owe you our lives, a debt of water!  Your enemies are our enemies!
ATP1D1FRb: Mentat : We defended their sietch against the enemy, and now the Fremen will return the favor in kind.
ATP1D1FRc: Fremen : We have defeated your enemies.  The water debt has been repaid.
ATP1D1FRd: Fremen : We will guard your people.
ATP1D1FRe: Fremen : We are at your command.
ATP1D2SAa: Mentat : The Sardaukar have assigned a squad to defend the base.  They should prove invulnerable against any attacker.
ATP1D2SAb: Mentat : Ordos commandos are reported in the area, Commander.  Stay alert for their attack!
ATP1D2SAc: Sardaukar : We will deal with the Ordos.
ATP1D3bSAa: Mentat : The Ordos seem to have some sort of strategy in mind.  They have pushed many of their reserves forward.  Our scouts report that they are beginning to regroup.  Prepare for an attack!
ATP1D3bSAb: Mentat : The Ordos attack forces have arrived!  Two large bodies of troops have entered the battlefield.  Stand by to defend yourself, Commander.
ATP1D3bSAd: Mentat : The first attacking Ordos column has been met by the Sardaukar.
ATP1D3bSAe: Mentat : The second attacking Ordos column has been met by the Sardaukar.
ATP1D3SAa: Mentat : The Harkonnen have pushed their reinforcements forward.  They are massing for an attack.  Prepare yourself, Commander.
ATP1D3SAb: Mentat : The Harkonnen are attacking from two directions.  Defend yourself, Commander!
ATP1D3SAd: Mentat : The first attacking Harkonnen column has been intercepted by Sardaukar.
ATP1D3SAe: Mentat : The Sardaukar have intercepted the second attacking column of the Harkonnen!
ATP1D3SAf: Sardaukar : The Harkonnen are defeated.  Honor is satisfied.  Your conquest of the region should be a simple matter, now.  Until we meet again, Atreides.
ATP1D3Sag: Sardaukar : Our weakness is shameful!  We are Imperial Sardaukar!   We are pledged to die in battle!
ATP1D4FRa: Mentat : The Fremen will come to our aid, to defend this region!
ATP1D4FRb: Mentat : The Fremen have entered this area, and will rendezvous with us soon.  A second group has also been detected, and they are not far behind!
ATP1D4FRd: Mentat : The second group of Fremen has arrived!
ATP1D4FRe: Mentat : Commander, the second group of Fremen is being attacked!  You must drive off their Harkonnen pursuers!
ATP1D4FRf: Fremen : Attack!  Kill the Harkonnen devils!
ATP1D4FRg: Fremen : Our thanks for your protection, Commander.  You fight well.
ATP1D4FRh: Fremen : Our pursuers are dead.  We shall regroup at the base, as planned.
ATP1D4FRi: Fremen:  Commander, we are yours to command.
ATP1D5FRa: Mentat : We expect Fremen assistance in this battle, Commander.
ATP1D5FRb: Mentat : Fremen troops have arrived in this territory and are headed towards your position.
ATP1D5FRc: Mentat : The Fremen have encountered enemy forces, and are engaging them.  I recommend that you lend assistance -- the Fremen warriors are valuable allies, but they are not well armed.
ATP1D5FRd: Fremen : We have come to aid in your battle, Commander.  Long live the fighters!
ATP1D6FRa: Mentat : The Fremen leader awaits your counsel.  You must contact him!
ATP1D6FRb: Fremen : Greetings, Atreides.  Subakh ul kuhar.  Today we will spill the water of our enemies together.  I will show you their positions.
ATP1D6FRc: Fremen : This is the enemy's main position.  My warriors gather in the desert.  They will attack at my command.  With your aid, our victory is assured.
ATP1D6FRd: Fremen : Attack!  Death to the enemies of Shai-Hulud!
