ATP1D6FRe: Fremen : Our losses are heavy.  We must retreat, but we have struck a blow here.  The enemy is weakened.  You must finish them, Commander.
ATP1D8FRa: Mentat : You must defend the Fremen encampment!  Destroy all the invaders in this territory!
ATP1D8FRb: Mentat : The Fremen camp has been overrun, and utterly destroyed.  The invaders must be punished!
ATP1D8FRc: Mentat : The enemy raiders are nearby!  The Fremen need your help!
ATP1D8FRd: Mentat : The Fremen are under attack.  Without your help their fate is sealed!
ATP1D9GNa: Mentat : The general that you rescued has considerable influence among the Fremen.  They have come to join our fight!
ATP1D10SAa: Mentat : The Sardaukar observers were impressed.  They have sent a squad of infantry to assist in this battle.
ATP1D14HKa: Mentat : Find the Harkonnen fugitives in the desert.  We may yet enlist their help in the defense of this territory.
ATP1D14HKb: Mentat : These extra troops may prove useful, but can we trust them?  You must test their resolve.
ATP1D17GNa: Mentat : A group of civilians is approaching to buy some of the confiscated goods. Let them approach.
ATP1D17GNb: Mentat : Our profits here will help us to defend this territory.  These civilians will benefit in more ways than one!
ATP1D19GNa: Mentat : The Carryall went down somewhere in the area indicated on your radar screen.  Find it, and use the cargo as you see fit.
ATP1D19GNb: Mentat : We are certain that the Carryall went down in the area indicated on your radar screen.  If you cannot locate it, perhaps you are too late, and it has already fallen into enemy hands!
ATP2D1FRa: Mentat : The Ghola must be stopped.
ATP2D1FRb: Mentat : Commander, the Ghola has entered your area.  It must not escape!
ATP2D1FRbb: Mentat : The Ordos force has been detected.  It will arrive shortly.
ATP2D1FRc: Mentat : The Ghola has been captured.  Now destroy the enemy base!
ATP2D1FRcc: Mentat : The Ordos have retrieved the Ghola. The APC must be destroyed!
ATP2D1FRd: Mentat : The Ghola is dead.  It will not trouble us again..
ATP2D3SAa: Mentat : The Sardaukar will help to defend us.  They are sending reinforcements.
ATP2D3SAb: Sardaukar: We are at your service, Commander.
ATP2D3SAc: Mentat : Tleilaxu raiders are pursuing the Sardaukar.  They may need help.
ATP2D3SAd: Tleilaxu: Once again you interfered with our plans.  You will pay for this!
ATP2D4IXa: Mentat : Suboid rebels from other Ixian bases are still roaming Arrakis.  You will have to defend yourself against any attacking rebels - they are desperate and violent.
ATP2D4IXc: Mentat : Suboid rebels have been detected in the area.
ATP2D5SAa: Mentat : In accordance with the treaty they signed, the Sardaukar have set up a base in the area, to aid us in this battle.
ATP2D6FRa: Mentat : Ordos Gholas are launching an attack on the Fremen camp.  Intercept and destroy them.
ATP2D6FRb: Fremen : Sound the alarm.  We are under attack!
ATP2D6FRc: Mentat : Destroy the Gholas quickly.  The Fremen are unable to recognize the enemy.
ATP2D6FRd: Mentat : We have detected the Ghola troops.  Be careful, Commander.  This battle could get very confusing!
ATP2D6FRf: Fremen : Fregor's water has been spilled.
ATP2D6FRh: Fremen : Hanin has been murdered by traitors!
ATP2D6FRi: Fremen : By the laws of Kanly, my tribe will avenge me . . .
ATP2D6FRj: Mentat : The Fremen camp has been destroyed
ATP2D6FRk: Atreides soldier : Another Ghola falls before us!
ATP2D6FRl: Mentat : The Gholas have been defeated.
ATP2D6FRm: Mentat : The Fremen are intent on revenge.
ATP2D6FRn: Mentat : Another column of Gholas has arrived.
ATP2D7TLa: Mentat : A Fremen column has been ambushed, with heavy losses.  Protect any survivors attempting to make their way to our base.
ATP2D7TLb: Fremen : Over here, Atreides.  Water, please, I beg of you...
ATP2D7TLc: Fremen : Our group was attacked.  We are all that remain.
ATP2D7TLd: Fremen : We must get to your base.  We have vital information that must be delivered personally, to Duke Achillus himself.
ATP2D7TLe: Fremen : We must see the Duke!  We bear a message from the supreme leader of the Fremen.
ATP2D7TLf: Mentat : These Fremen are not what they seem.  Keep them under guard.  If they make any sudden actions, shoot to kill.  I will take responsibility with the Duke!
ATP2D7TLg: Mentat : As I suspected, face dancers!  Kill them!
ATP2D8IXa: Mentat : Use the Ixian rewards wisely.
ATP2D9IXa: Mentat : As a reward, the Ixians have constructed a Research center at our base.
ATP2D11SMa: Mentat : The Smugglers are sending us a peace offering.
ATP2D11SMb: Mentat : A harvester has entered the area.  We assume this is the gift the smugglers offered us.  It should prove quite valuable!
ATP2D11SMc: Mentat : Treachery!  The harvester exploded.  It must have been wired with explosives!
ATP2D11SMd: Smuggler : We offer you this harvester in thanks.  We apologize for our actions.   In the future, we won't deal with your enemies, rest assured!
ATP2D11SMe: Mentat : Our scans reveal explosives onboard that harvester.  It must not be allowed to enter our base!
ATP2D11SMf: Mentat : The harvester contained a substantial amount of explosives. I should have predicted such a possibility, but smugglers do not normally act so violently!
ATP2D12IXa: Mentat : House IX has repaid the funds that we loaned to them.
ATP2D12IXb: Mentat : Ixian units are heading towards your position, Commander.  We recommend that you intercept them and investigate.
ATP2D12IXc: Ixian : Greetings, Commander.  We are here as full and final payment for House Ix's debt.  As of this moment, we are yours to command.
ATP2D14IXa: Mentat : Protect the Ixian from the bounty hunters!
ATP2D14IXc: Ixian : They will kill me!  Please, you must help me!
ATP2D14IXd: Ixian : I am under attack!  Lend me your assistance, and House Ix will reward you!
ATP2D14IXe: Mentat : The Ixian is dead.  You must now concentrate on our defense.
ATP2D14IXf: Ixian : They're coming.  We must leave, immediately!
ATP2D14IXg: Mentat : The Ixian is safe. We shall return him to his comrades soon enough.  Now finish the job of cleansing this territory of invaders!
ATP2D14IXi: Fremen : We have a captive who says he is known to you, Atreides.  He claims that our enemies are his enemies.  We will try to protect him until you arrive, but the enemy is growing in strength.  You must hurry!
ATP2D15IXa: Mentat : A number of Ixian units have joined us, in return for our assistance.
ATP2D15IXb: Mentat : An Ixian convoy has entered the area and is heading towards your position.
ATP2D15IXc: Mentat : The Ixian convoy has stopped.  We cannot raise it on our communicators.  Send out a force to investigate.
ATP2D15IXd: Mentat : The convoy has been infected by the Tleilaxu!  Defend yourself, Commander.
ATP2D15IXe: Mentat : This treacherous attack is typical of the Tleilaxu!
ATP2D2IXa: Ixian : Commander, House Ix is in your debt.  By way of payment, we have delivered four units to your command.  We also bear this warning.  The Tleilaxu seek revenge!   Be prepared.
ATP2D2IXb: Mentat : Tleilaxu raiders have been detected - prepare to engage!
ATP3D1FRa: Mentat : Kill any Tleilaxu units that enter this territory.
ATP3D1FRb: Mentat : The enemy has been attacked by the Tleilaxu!
ATP3D1FRc: Mentat : The enemy are suffering heavy losses from the Tleilaxu!
ATP3D1FRd: We have lost contact with the Tleilaxu. This does not bode well.  Be prepared, Commander!
ATP3D1FRe: Mentat : We are under attack!  Tleilaxu units - multiple targets!
ATP3D1FRg: Mentat : As we feared, they have been infected.  They must be destroyed.
ATP3D1FRh: Mentat : Help the villagers here.  I fear the worst!
ATP3D2FRa: Mentat : The Fremen have delivered a large amount of spice as payment.
ATP3D2FRb: Mentat : Commander, our scouts have noticed a group of Tleilaxu entering the area.  They may be seeking revenge for our destruction of their research base.  Beware!
ATP3D2FRc: Tleilaxu : You underestimated us, and that will cost you!   Your biomass shall be added to our vats!  Your genomes shall be ours to manipulate!
ATP3D2FRd: Fremen : We will destroy these Tleilaxu vermin for you, Commander.  Ya hya chouhada!
ATP3D2FRe: Mentat : The Tleilaxu raiders have been destroyed.  The Fremen turn upon our enemies!  Those who aligned with the evil Tleilaxu must pay with their lives!
ATP3D3FRa: Mentat : Relatives of the refugees have come to aid our defense!
ATP3D3FRb: Mentat : Another band of Fremen refugees have arrived.  They have been lost in the desert for some time.  Get them to the base as quickly as possible.  They must have water!
ATP3D3FRc: Tleilaxu : We warned you of our return!  The time is at hand!   Prepare to join us!
ATP3D5TLa: Mentat : The enemy are being reinforced by the Tleilaxu.  Their short term alliance threatens our position here.  Take care, Commander!
ATP3D6FRa: Mentat : The enemy has been torturing its Fremen captives.  As their hatred for the Tleilaxu grows, our own ties with the Fremen are strengthened.  You will be receiving extra Fremen reinforcements for this battle!
ATP3D6FRb: Mentat : A group of Fremen have arrived to assist you.
ATP3D7ATa: Mentat : A number of enemy vehicles were found in the hands of smugglers, and seized.  Use them well!
ATP3D8TLa: Mentat : Our attackers are still receiving Tleilaxu aid.  The Tleilaxu hatred for us grows with every action we take against them!
ATP3D8TLb: Mentat : Tleilaxu war-beasts have entered the area!  Prepare to do battle with them!  The Sardaukar and the Fremen have been alerted.  You should expect their assistance at any time!
ATP3D8TLc: Mentat : Fremen and Sardaukar reinforcements have arrived.  Perhaps the tide of battle turns?
ATP3D8TLd: Mentat : We have encountered a great number of Tleilaxu raiders.  We must hold out, Commander!
ATP3D8TLe: Mentat : More Fremen and Sardaukar have arrived!  They are under your command!
ATP3D9IXa: Mentat : We are picking up incoming Ixian units.
ATP3D9IXb: Mentat : The Ixian is dead.  We will not be able to interrogate him.  Valuable information has been lost.
ATTutorialA: Mentat : Welcome to Arrakis, Commander.  You have been assigned a squad of troops.
ATTutorialB: Mentat : A beacon is positioned near an enemy radar outpost, north-east of your position.  Move your troops to the beacon site and await instructions.
ATTutorialD: Mentat : The outpost is destroyed.  It is now safe to send in a Mobile Construction Vehicle.  Move the vehicle onto the rock outcropping currently occupied by your troops.  Once it is in position, deploy it to create a Construction Yard.  Move your troops away to ensure they do not block the deployment.
ATTutorialE: Mentat : You will now be able to build other base structures.
ATTutorialF: Mentat : Build an Outpost, in order to get radar coverage of the terrain you have explored.
ATTutorialF2: Mentat : The Outpost is complete.  You should next, build a Windtrap.
ATTutorialG: Mentat : Excellent work, Commander.  You learn swiftly.  Next, build a Refinery and a Barracks.
ATTutorialH: Mentat : Refineries are supplied with a harvester and a Carryall. Harvesters automatically harvest spice from the desert sands and return it to the Refinery for purification.  If your harvester is destroyed, you will receive a replacement.
ATTutorialI: Mentat : With the barracks complete, you can train extra troops.  I recommend building extra infantry - you have enough scouts already.
ATTutorialJ: Mentat : Scanners detect the movement of a squad of Harkonnen troops!  Send a scout to the beacon on the northern end of this rock outcropping to watch for the enemy!
ATTutorialK: Mentat : Wait here for the Harkonnen squad to approach.  Do not send troops to meet the enemy, as wormsign has been detected!  Traveling over the sand would be dangerous.
ATTutorialL: Mentat : A Shai-Hulud!  You are fortunate, Commander. To see a Shai-Hulud, a Great Maker, and to survive… this is a sign of great fortune!  They are the largest of the worms of Arrakis, and the most dangerous. They do not tend to linger in one place.  This one will soon be leaving.  Wait until the all-clear is given.
ATTutorialM: Mentat : It would appear that some of the Harkonnen survived the attack of the Shai-Hulud.  Prepare to defend yourself, Commander!
ATTutorialN: Mentat : The enemy squad is defeated.  Soon you shall be ready to engage the enemy's main base!
ATTutorialO: Mentat : The Shai-Hulud has gone.  The sands are safe, once again.  The time has come, Commander, to show you more of Arrakis.  Collect your forces and send them to the beacon located to the east of your base.
ATTUtorialP: Mentat : The patch of gray sand you see before you, Commander, is a dustbowl.  Its shifting sands can suck down anything that enters it! Only the hover vehicles of the Ordos can cross a dustbowl.  When you see them, tread carefully!  You have been warned.  It is time to move on.  Travel to the beacon located to your south-east.
AttutorialQ: Mentat : This rocky ground can be of  tactical importance.  The roughness of the terrain means that vehicles cannot enter here. Infantry hiding in these areas can use the rocks for cover, and gain a potentially vital advantage.  Used well, these areas can turn the tide of a battle!
ATTutorialR: Mentat : The main enemy base is located towards the north-east end of this territory.  Find it and destroy it!
ATTutorialS: Mentat : You have found the enemy base.  The most important targets are the production facilities, the Barracks, the Factories and the Construction Yard.  Their destruction is your priority, but be sure to attack any enemy units that threaten you!
ATTutorialT: Mentat : The Harkonnen have heavy support - a Buzzsaw and an Assault Tank.  These vehicles carry heavier weapons than the infantry.  They can also drive over soldiers and crush them. A pair of Atreides vehicles have been sent as reinforcements -- a Mongoose and a Minotaurus.  These are easily a match for the Harkonnen!
ATTutorialU: Mentat : You have destroyed the Harkonnen Construction Yard!  Without it, they will be unable to rebuild!  Now, finish the job you have begun!
ATTutorialV: Mentat : Destroying the barracks makes good tactical sense, Commander.  Without it, the Harkonnen cannot train reinforcements!
ATTutorialW: Mentat : Without a base, the remaining troops will be easy prey.
ATTutorialX: Mentat : Without troops, the base is defenseless.  Destroy it!
ATTutorialY: Mentat : The enemy base and its guardians have been destroyed.  This area belongs to the Atreides!  Well done, Commander!
ATTutorialZ: Mentat : We are supplying reinforcements to replace your losses.
ATHLa: Mentat : You must reclaim the captured Atreides frigates.  The rescued troops will be your reinforcements.  With each victory, your forces will grow!
ATHLb: Frigate Captain : These troops will join with your forces.
ATHLc: Frigate Captain : There are two more of our frigates in this area.  Proceed with caution!  Security forces are everywhere.
ATHLd: Frigate Captain : Reporting for duty, Commander!
ATHLe: Mentat : You must ensure that there are no more captives.  Those left behind will surely die!
ATHLf: Mentat : General Formarch has been captured by Harkonnen dogs!  He is under heavy guard in an outlying docking bay.  Take the troops rescued from the frigates and find him!
ATHLg: Mentat : Congratulations, Commander.  Your decisive actions have foiled the plot!
ATHWDa: Mentat : There is a research base nearby.  Use the APC to transport the Duke there.  You will find a crate containing a prototype advanced Carryall near the base.  Use it to evacuate the Duke.
ATHWDb: Mentat : The research base has been activated.  New defensive forces can now be constructed!
ATHWDc: Mentat : Excellent.  You've found the Carryall!  Quickly!  You must fly the Duke to safety!
ATHWDd: Mentat : The area is infested with Tleilaxu Gholas and Face Dancers.  The Ordos are behind this, I'd wager my life on it!
ATHWDe: Mentat : You must find a more defensible position, Commander!
ATHWDf: Mentat : You must protect our Duke at all costs!
ATHWDg: Mentat : Tragedy befalls us!   The Duke Achillus is Dead!
ATHWDh: Mentat : Corlen, the Fremen leader, has fallen.  Our alliance with the Fremen is doomed!
ATHWDi: Mentat : The only way out is by air!  You must find the Carryall!
ATEndmissionWin: Mentat : The Guild and the Tleilaxu are fallen!  You have lead us to victory, Commander!
ATEndMissionC: Mentat : Destroy the Worm now, before it wakes!
ATEndMissionD: Mentat : The Emperor Worm feeds upon the spice!  If you destroy the Guild Harvesters, you will buy us precious time!
ATEndMissionE: Mentat : The enemy builds more Harvesters!  You must destroy the Worm quickly, before it's mind awakens!
ATEndMission00: Mentat : The Worm's development has been delayed.  Destroy it, now!
ATEndMissionLose: Mentat : The Sleeping God awakes!  Our doom is at hand!
HKP1M1FRMini: Fremen activity is reported in the area.
HKP1M2FRMini: There is a Fremen camp in this region.
HKP1M3FRMini: There is Fremen activity in this region.
HKP1M4SAMini: Elite Sardaukar troops have been reported in this region.
HKP1M5SAMini: The Sardaukar have been fighting the Fremen in this area.
HKP1M6SAMini: Sardaukar have been attacking us from this territory.
HKP1M7HKMini: Refugee civilians are escaping Harkonnen rule, through this territory.
HKP1M8HKMini: Rich trade convoys often pass through this region.
HKP1M9GNmb: A scout has been stranded in this territory.
HKP1M10ORMini: Our intelligence service demands your attention in this area.
HKP1M11GNMini: Conditions in this territory are hostile.
HKP1M12GNMini: A supply transport requires our support.
HKP1M15HKMini: The Harkonnen High Command demands your attention here.
HKP1M16GNMini: There are reports of smugglers in this region.
HKP1M17SAMini: Sardaukar activity is reported in this region.
HKP1M18GNmb: A smuggler base is known to have existed here.
HKP2M1HKMini: Anti-Harkonnen propaganda is being broadcast in this region.
HKP2M2HKMini: High Command has a special interest in this region.
HKP2M3IXMini: An Ixian offensive has been launched against the Tleilaxu.
HKP2M4TLMini: Tleilaxu Diplomats request our attention to this region.
HKP2M5SAMini: Sardaukar forces are attacking a Tleilaxu base in this region.
HKP2M6INMini: Harkonnen prison camps have foolishly allowed some prisoners to escape.
HKP2M7HKmb: Supreme Commander Gunseng has taken a personal interest in this territory.
HKP2M8SAmb: We have detected heavy Sardaukar activity in this region.
HKP2M9IXMini: A number of Ixian scientists are stranded in this region.
HKP2M10IXMini: Ixian activity is reported in the area.
HKP2M11TLMini: There is Tleilaxu activity in this region.
HKP2M12SMMini: Unexpected smuggler activity is reported in this region.
HKP2M13IXMini: There is an Ixian base in this territory.
HKP2M14IXMini: The Ix have scheduled military tests in the area.
HKP2M15IXMini: There is an Ixian presence in this region.
HKP2M16IXMini: There has been Ixian activity in this region of late.
HKP2M17TLMB: There are reports of Tleilaxu units in this area.
HKP2M18TLMini: The Tleilaxu have interests in this area.
HKP2M19IXMini: An Ixian base in this region is supporting the enemy.
HKP2M20TLMini: A Tleilaxu base is under attack.
HKP2M21TLMini: A Tleilaxu base is under attack by the Fremen.
HKP3M1TLMini: Tleilaxu activity is reported in this region.
HKP3M2TLMini: The Tleilaxu are active in this region.
HKP3M3TLMini: There is Tleilaxu activity in this region.
HKP3M4TLMini: Recurrent Tleilaxu activity is reported in this region.
HKP3M5HKMini: An unusual level of Atreides activity has been reported in this region.
HKP3M6HKMini: There is a rebellious settlement in this region.
HKP3M7FRMini: The Fremen are raiding from this territory.
HKP3M8SAMini: The Sardaukar are attacking a Tleilaxu base in this region.
HKP3M9IXMini: Ixian distress signals have been detected in this region.
HKP3M10FRMini: The Fremen are searching this region.
HKP3M11TLMini: The Tleilaxu have a great interest in this region.
HKP3M12TLMini: The Tleilaxu in this region have contacted us.
HKP3M13SMMini: There is an active smuggler's base in this region.
HKP1M1FR: A group of the Fremen savages have been spotted in the desert.  Teach them a lesson they'll not soon forget! Show them that there is no place for them on our planet. Kill every Fremen you encounter as you take this territory!
HKP1M2FR: Supreme Commander Gunseng has exhausted his supply of slaves.  Refugees from our resettlement program are heading this way. You would do well to acquire them for the Supreme Commander's pleasure, but remember your prime objective.  Capture this region!
HKP1M3FR: Reports indicate a Fremen camp in this region.  Seek it out and destroy it!  We must teach this Fremen scum that their continued defiance will bring only pain and death. Crush the Fremen and raise the Harkonnen banner in this land!
HKP1M4SA: Our intelligence reports that Sardaukar forces are on their way to this region.   Invariably, the Sardaukar give their loyalty to the strongest party in any conflict.  These Imperial elite will test our strength through combat.  Only after they have suffered at our hands, will they deem us worthy of support and join us against our enemies. A show of weakness here will spell disaster!  The Sardaukar will join our enemy in battle.  You must gain their loyalty if we are to gain control of this region!
HKP1M5SA: A Sardaukar base in this territory is under attack by Fremen forces. We should aid them.  Perhaps the Sardaukar will be so embarrassed by their show of weakness, that they will offer to aid us in return. Destroy the Fremen, ally with the Sardaukar and take this territory!
HKP1M6SA: Our relations with the Sardaukar have taken a turn for the worse in this region! Several of our scouting parties have been decimated.  Now a detachment of troops are advancing to attack! We believe their commanding officer may be an impostor.  Kill him!   Reveal him for what he is! When his followers realize they have been deceived, they will be eager to follow us!  You must capture this region!
HKP1M7HK: Our intelligence reports that this route is often used by refugees fleeing our controlled territories. Intercept them and leave their skins on the sand as a warning to others!  Capture this region!  Kill any refugees that you encounter!
HKP1M8HK: The enemy lives well.  Our attack has been timed to coincide with their commander's delivery of luxuries. Capture it and return it to our capital.  Prince Gunseng's interest is aroused.  Claim this territory for House Harkonnen and supplement your success by intercepting this cargo!
HKP1M10OR: An Ordos spy has been discovered amongst our ranks!  He is attempting to escape! We expect him to use the coming battle to cover his exit.  It is imperative that you prevent his escape by any means necessary. Our enemy is likely to send armed escorts to assist him.  As you take the region, you must ensure that the spy is killed.
HKP1M11GN: Enemy troops in this territory are suffering from a viral outbreak.  They lack the proper medical equipment to combat it. The enemy command is attempting to rectify the situation.  A supply vehicle carrying anti-serum approaches, guarded by mercenary Sardaukar deserters.  If you can prevent the supplies from reaching the enemy, their defeat should be guaranteed.
HKP1M12GN: Windstorms prevent our supply frigates from reaching our forward outposts.  Supplies are dwindling! Emergency rations must be transported by land. We are using your attack as cover, to rush in a supply convoy.  It must reach its destination, or our front line will be seriously weakened! Provide cover for the convoy, as you rip this land from the grasp of our enemy!
HKP1M15HK: Our scouts in this area report that there is an abandoned refinery in the midst of the battle zone. It might be advantageous to reactivate the refinery.  We have assigned an Engineer to you, for this very  purpose.  The additional production will ensure our enemy's defeat!
HKP1M16GN: A trade caravan will soon make its way through this territory.  It is our belief that the convoy is a cover for smugglers. You are to inspect it for contraband of any sort.  If you find anything… interesting, commandeer the convoy for House Harkonnen.  As always, your prime objective is to destroy the enemy and take the region!
HKP1M17SA: A contingent of Sardaukar are based in this region.  Their commanding officer opposes any alliance with House Harkonnen. His bias might hinder our attempts to ally with Sardaukar.  This Sardaukar General leads a small patrol.  Our attack is timed to intercept it.   As we dispatch the enemy and claim the region, find an opportunity to kill the General and his troops.  If this goes unobserved, the Sardaukar might be persuaded to believe that the attack was committed by our enemies.  A devious plan, is it not? Extra resources have been allocated to your area to ensure success.
HKP1M18GN: A Harkonnen Carryall was lost in a dust storm.  It must be recovered!  There is a smuggler outpost nearby.  Reactive it, and we might use their broadcast unit to generate a navigation signal they can track.  In the meantime, crush the enemy beneath your boots!
HKP2M1HK: The morale of our troops has fallen in this region, Commander.  A crushing victory here would do wonders for their spirit.  It might also gain the attention of Supreme Commander Gunseng.  Utter failure will undoubtedly gain his attention as well.  I recommend the former.
HKP2M2HK: Your reputation for brutality is growing Commander!  Copec Harkonnen has arranged for a squad of Harkonnen bodyguard to join you as part of the initial invasion force. Use these extra forces to assail the enemy and dominate this region!
HKP2M3IX: We have received an interesting offer from House Ix.  A Tleilaxu base is 'interfering with their business interests'. They are willing to pay handsomely for the destruction of this base.  It is a generous offer, but before you kill them, see what the Tleilaxu cowards will promise us if we spare their lives! These mercenary houses must be taught a lesson.  It is we who decide who lives and dies on Arrakis. Whichever offer you accept, take control of this battlefield!
HKP2M4TL: A message from the Tleilaxu.  A prominent researcher for House IX has strayed far from his protective force. Were he to meet with an unfortunate accident, the Bene Tleilax would send us some of their more interesting creations.  Kill the researcher and capture this region!
HKP2M5SA: You have an important mission.  The Tleilaxu have been excavating more of the Sardaukar tombs - part of their 'research', as they put it.  They make Ghola duplicates from the dead Sardaukar and train them to fight.  The Sardaukar have promised revenge and have offered a bounty for every Tleilaxu head! The entire base must be destroyed.  None of the Sardaukar gholas must remain! They are far too dangerous.  The Baron is determined to woo the Sardaukar and forge a temporary alliance.  Do not disrupt his plans!
HKP2M6IN: Prisoners escaped from one of our holding camps on the border.  They are fleeing towards enemy territory. As you fight the enemy, track down the prisoners and execute them.  Bring back their skulls as trophies.  They will serve as a reminder to others.  The only escape for our prisoners is death!
HKP2M7HK: This task is of a delicate nature. Prince Gunseng is having problems with certain officers prying into his personal expenditures. These officers are acting as agents for his brother.  Should these men fail to return from your mission to capture this map, the Prince would surely express his gratitude in a very definite, if discreet, way.
HKP2M8SA: Sardaukar observers are meeting with the enemy.  They intend to forge an alliance. Intercept them with a force superior to that of the enemy!  A display of Harkonnen military might will remind them who is worth backing in the battle for the Imperial throne!
HKP2M9IX: A number of Ixian scientists have been stranded in this territory. Find them and protect them from the conflict!  The Ixians will pay us for their safe passage.  Dominate this region for House Harkonnen!
HKP2M10IX: The Ixians descend on Arrakis like vultures, seeking to profit from the war. A convoy carrying Ixian leaders will pass through this area.  House Ix has asked us to protect the convoy.   Protect them, and we can expect the Ixians to reward us handsomely.  Ensure that guarding the convoy doesn't cost us the battle!
HKP2M11TL: A Tleilaxu supply convoy is due to pass through this territory.  The Bene Tleilax have asked us to extend our protection to them.  The vehicles carry the shrines and relics of their twisted religion. Protect them, and we can expect the Tleilaxu to repay the favor with interest.  Don't let this distract you from your primary goal, however.  We must seize control of this area!
HKP2M12SM: Smugglers have hijacked a number of our harvesters and vanished into the desert.  A sandcrawler was dispatched and we are tracking the thieves as they try to escape. This crime cannot go unpunished!  Find them and kill them!  Then destroy our enemies.  Kill them all!
HKP2M13IX: The Ixians have a small base in this territory.  Their harvester was destroyed by a sandworm, and they are in need of extra spice. If we deliver spice to them, they have offered to give us some of their high-tech units in exchange.  If you can use their toys, give them the spice!  As long as you crush the enemy, the Baron will be happy.
HKP2M14IX: House Ix requests that we test some of their units under battle conditions.  We have accepted.  As one of our successful commanders, these units have been placed under your control. Judge their performance, and the tactical advantages they provide.  If they assist you in capturing this area,  we may purchase more of them.
HKP2M15IX: A Tleilaxu Face Dancer fled into the desert and was traced as far as this territory.  The Ixians have offered a bounty for the head of this Tleilaxu spy.  We expect the spy to be hiding in the enemy base.  If you can crush it as you destroy the enemy forces, the Ixians will reward us for our efforts.
HKP2M16IX: Ixian scientists have set up experiments in this territory.  The coming battle will be dangerous for them, but they are committed to perform their work in this region.   The Ixian scientists need supplies.  They have promised us technology if we help in their acquisition.  Capture this territory and our position is stronger!
HKP2M17TL: The Tleilaxu manufacturing base in this region has been destroyed by Ixian sabotage. Experimental units have escaped into the desert. The Tleilaxu claim that the units will not survive the unforgiving desert.  Don't be too sure.  Watch for rogue Tleilaxu units as you take control of the region!
HKP2M18TL: The Tleilaxu have persuaded the Landsraad that there is a secret Ixian base in this territory.  They claim that the Ix are researching technology that breaks the Imperial edict against thinking machines. House Harkonnen has been ordered to locate this 'secret base'.  An Imperial inspector has been dispatched to the evaluate a base, should one be discovered. Do the Landsraad's bidding, but don't neglect our priorities!  You must kill the enemy and take this region!
HKP2M19IX: The enemy struck a deal with the Ixian base in this territory.  They received a number of units from it in return for their support. These units are powerful.  Their delivery must be prevented!  If possible, capture the Ixian base and stop the units from being manufactured. If this proves impossible, destroy it along with the enemy.  Take this land!
HKP2M20TL: The Sardaukar are laying siege to a Tleilaxu base, in retaliation for the desecration of Sardaukar tombs.  The base has come under attack by a Sardaukar pursuit column.  Our enemies assist them, in an effort to strengthen their Sardaukar ties.  Tleilaxu representatives are requesting our assistance. It is the Supreme Commander's wish that you should defend the Tleilaxu, in order to teach the Sardaukar the folly of dealing with our enemies!
HKP2M21TL: A Tleilaxu base is under siege by the Fremen.  The Tleilaxu are too weak to maintain an adequate defense.  We are their only hope.   They are deploying a rescue column, but need our assistance.  The Fremen are as stubborn as ever.  You will have to kill them to the man.  Defeat the Fremen, then take this land for House Harkonnen!
HKP3M1TL: Recent Tleilaxu activities on Arrakis casts suspicion on their motives.  They have more on their minds than the sale of bio-weapons! A Tleilaxu research team is heading for their base in this territory.  Capture their leading scientist so that we may interrogate him!  Kill any guards, but ensure the scientist is unharmed! The prisoner will have to be in good health to survive our questioning. Our conquest of Arrakis must continue!  Capture this region!
HKP3M2TL: Fremen civilians were cut off by our recent advance.  Slaughtering Fremen is a tempting diversion, I must agree.  But you must not indulge yourself this time.  Take them alive and deliver them to the Tleilaxu flesh vats! Rest assured, the fate that awaits them is infinitely more horrible.  They will pray for death!  Enjoy your work Commander, do not forget your main task!  You must slaughter the enemy!
HKP3M3TL: We have lost all communication with an observation post in this territory.  A significant Tleilaxu presence has also been noted in the region. If the enemy might have attacked the post or jammed its signal.  In your conquest of this region, find the observer post and learn of its fate.
HKP3M4TL: The Tleilaxu have issued a strange request.  They ask that we guide a modified sandcrawler into the desert and ensure that it is eaten by one of those accursed worms. Our spies report that the modified vehicle is of little of value to us.  It contains nothing of consequence.  Just some strange Tleilaxu drugs and other stinking fluids. They are paying us handsomely for this expedition, so be sure that it succeeds. Your prime objective, however, is the annexation of this region!
HKP3M5HK: An Atreides cargo transport carrying sonic weaponry has crashed in this territory. Find the crash site and bring back any undamaged weapons for investigation. Sweep the territory clear of our enemies!
HKP3M6HK: A settlement in this territory is refusing to pay taxes.  The miserable curs claim that they are impoverished.  We must teach them a lesson! Burn the town to the ground and pillage the ruins!  Any wealth you find should be confiscated in the name of House Harkonnen.
HKP3M7FR: Harkonnen territories have been consistently raided by a Fremen guerilla leader.  Thus far, he has eluded capture.   Our advance scouts believe that he is hiding somewhere in this territory with a small band of followers.  Take the territory and kill him!
HKP3M8SA: The Sardaukar have instigated a blood feud with the Tleilaxu.  They offer a reward for the destruction of a Tleilaxu research post in this territory! Smash the enemy!  Burn the research post and raise the banner of House Harkonnen!
HKP3M9IX: A prominent group of Ixian scientists have contacted us, seeking refuge. They would not reveal their location.  They believe their communications are being intercepted. We do know they are somewhere in this territory.  Find the scientists, but ensure our victory in this region!
HKP3M10FR: There has been a great deal of Fremen activity in this area. Warrior bands have been spotted, searching the wastes.  You are to investigate their motives.  It is also vital that we take this region!
HKP3M11TL: The Tleilaxu have contacted us.  One of their scientists has gone berserk.  He raided their laboratory and stole a virus. He must be killed before he can infect the native population, or our troops. The Tleilaxu express their concern, but their motives are unclear.  There may be other reasons they want him eliminated. Tear this land from the grasp of the enemy!
HKP3M12TL: We have received a Distrans message from a group of Tleilaxu scientists who want to defect.  They claim to have important information about the Tleilaxu they wants to share with us. Give them refuge from the Tleilaxu.  We will interrogate them, once this region is under Harkonnen control!
HKP3M13SM: Smugglers are supplying the enemy with stolen equipment.  Locate the Smuggler base in this area and confiscate their contraband supplies. Keep a small guard nearby.  Prevent the Smugglers from re-supplying the enemy and protect the Starport from destruction.   Do not let that hardware fall in to enemy hands!  Avoid capturing the building unless absolutely necessary!   The enemy will be most interested in your activities.  Kill them and capture this region!
HHK: The guild has been bribed to overlook our… liberal interpretation of the Great Convention. Destroy the opposition!  Blow up all of the enemy frigates!  Death to those who oppose us!
HKENDGAME: The Emperor Worm must be killed while it still sleeps.  Defeat means death for all of us.  Victory or death!
HKP1D1FR: You allowed witnesses to escape your attack on the Fremen.  Now the Fremen have chosen to send aid to our attackers.  This will make your defense of the territory somewhat harder!
HKP1D3FR: Information provided by the Fremen bandits has allowed us to track a larger party of fugitives.  The Fremen fight for us now.  Threats will keep them fearful.  Fear will keep them loyal.  Loyalty will keep them alive.  They cannot return to their own kind, or their former allies.  By their own barbaric traditions, they would suffer death.  Thus, their service to House Harkonnen can be assured.  Use them to win this battle.
HKP1D4SA: The Imperial Sardaukar is impressed with House Harkonnen, thanks to your efforts Commander.  A squad of Sardaukar troops has been placed under your command.  If we wish to obtain further aid, we must utilize them well. Even as they test us, we shall test them.  We will see just how useful these Sardaukar can be.  As always, remember, this territory must not fall into enemy hands!
HKP1D5SA: In retribution for the Fremen assaults on their base, the Sardaukar are attacking a Fremen camp in this territory.  Assist in the assault and they will aid in our defense.
HKP1D7HK: Desertion by the local population is proving quite an annoyance, Commander.  It must be stopped.  A guard was killed by an escapee in this area. We will make an example of the local settlement.  Raze it to the ground and kill the inhabitants! This will send a message to all who oppose us.  Then you must drive our enemies back into their mouse holes.
HKP1D8HK: We have a number of civilian vehicles loaded with explosives.  Drive them into the enemy base and detonate them.  Crush the enemy after they are weakened.
HKP1D9GN: The Sardaukar are harassing the enemy in return for our favors. Enemy reinforcements will be weakened or destroyed.  Use this weakness to your advantage!  Destroy the enemy invaders!
HKP1D10OR: Rumor has it that Ordos commandos have slipped through our defensive lines.  Do not allow the bites of these sand fleas to endanger our conquest of this territory!
HKP1D11GN: We are delighted, Commander!  Your destruction of the enemy's vaccine supply has engendered catastrophic casualties in the region. Likely, these attackers are already demoralized and weakened.  Take your fight to the enemy!
HKP1D14FR: It galls me to leave the Fremen base unharmed.  It is a show of weakness.  Now, let us prove our strength! A group of Fremen dare to cross our land.  Snuff them out!  Drive them and their allies out of this territory!
HKP1D16GN: Loyal Harkonnen citizens are interested in buying the contraband we have confiscated. Any means of increasing our war chest is most welcome! Sell the contraband - for a healthy profit, of course.  But take care.  We must not allow profit-motives to jeopardize our defense of this region.
HKP1D18GN: Reports indicate that the Carryall has crashed in this territory.  We will transmit its estimated position.  Its cargo may be valuable.  Do be sure to get there before our enemies.  Then drive those enemies from Harkonnen land!
HKP2D1HK: Our production has been adversely effected by an unusual number of desertions.  We must have more workers!  Make up the numbers with slaves. There is a group of likely candidates in this area.  If you meet with any resistance, kill the offenders.  Our slaves must respect and fear us!   Ensure this that this region remains under Harkonnen control!
HKP2D2aHK: Copec is amused by the deaths of Gunseng's personal guard.  As reward for your loyalty, he is providing you with additional forces from his own escort. Your name has been mentioned in powerful political circles.  Do not allow defeat to spoil your growing reputation!
HKP2D2bHK: You have acquired the favor of Gunseng Harkonnen by preserving the lives of his personal guard. As repayment for your success, he is providing you with additional defensive forces.  Use them to crush the invaders.
HKP2D3IX: The destruction of the Tleilaxu greatly pleased the Ixians.  We have been given preferential prices on Ixian technology.  Several prototypes have been purchased for your use in the defense of this territory.
HKP2D4IX: The Ixians are pleased and surprised at our refusal to kill their personnel.  The fools believe that we act on instinct alone.  We simply await a better offer! Defeat the enemy.  Prove the superiority of House Harkonnen!
HKP2D4TL: As promised, the Tleilaxu have sent a bounty for our actions against the Ix.  The units have been assigned to your defensive forces.  They are quite interesting, but rather unstable. Learn their strengths and weakness, as they may one day be used against us.  Use them to drive the enemy from our land!
HKP2D5bSA: The Sardaukar have sworn revenge for our 'interference.'  Expect their attacks during the course of the battle. The Tleilaxu are grateful for our efforts.  They will be sending us assistance.  These distractions must interfere with the defeat of the enemy.
HKP2D5SA: The Tleilaxu are sending forces to attack us.  We assisted the Sardaukar in an attack upon a Tleilaxu base, and they seek revenge! We can expect assistance from the Sardaukar at any time.  These distractions will not prevent the defeat of the enemy.
HKP2D6IN: The enemy is aware of our troop movements.  They must be getting their information from escaped prisoners! They have called in additional reinforcements to give a better chance of success.  They are fools to believe they can defeat us!  Drive them back into the desert.
HKP2D9IX: The Ixians have kept their word. They have delivered additional resources as a reward for our assistance.   These have been assigned to your defense, Commander.
HKP2D10IX: In return for your protection of their leaders, the Ixians have built a Research Center at your base.  Use it to build Ixian vehicles for this defense mission.
HKP2D11aGN: The supplies from the convoy have enabled us to train and equip additional troops.  You will receive extra reinforcements to help destroy the invaders.
HKP2D11bGN: Without the supplies from that convoy, troop production has dropped.  You will receive fewer reinforcements in this mission.  Do not allow this land to fall into enemy hands!
HKP2D11TL: The attack on the Tleilaxu convoy has been met with swift response.  The Ixian agents thought to be responsible are being hunted all over Arrakis. One was based here, in a local settlement.  He has since left, but the Tleilaxu intend to make an example of the villagers. Utilize the Tleilaxu to wipe out the town, then take their units and destroy the invading enemy!
HKP2D12SM: The smugglers are sending recompense for the inconvenience we have suffered in losing the harvester units.  This may prove useful in our defense.
HKP2D13IX: The assistance given to the Ixians is to be repaid - with interest. The Ixians will not allow themselves to remain in our debt.  They will pay us promptly, to divest themselves of any future obligation to House Harkonnen.  Take their payment, then crush any enemy resistance!
HKP2D16IX: The Ixians are grateful for our support.  They have given us additional units to show their gratitude.  Use them to defeat the enemy.
HKP2D17TL: The Tleilaxu have identified Ixian sabotage as the cause of the breakout. They seek revenge.  They have identified the Ixian responsible in this region.  Kill him, and crush the enemy.
HKP2D18TL: The Ixians are enraged by the Tleilaxu attack.  A bounty has been placed on the Tleilaxu ambassadors head. The Ambassador is in our territory right now.  We should collect. The Tleilaxu must understand that they do not control us!  We decide who lives and dies on Dune.  Kill the Ambassador and drive the enemy from our borders!
HKP2D20TL: The Sardaukar have sworn to take vengeance upon us for protecting the Tleilaxu. Prepare for their attack!  Slaughter them, along with the enemy!
HKP2D21TL: The Tleilaxu have taken heavy losses from Fremen attacks.  They are eager for revenge. They have launched an attack on the Fremen, using gholas, but are in need our support.  Let them assault the camp.  If there are any survivors, use them to defend the territory.
HKP3D1TL: The scientist captured in your last mission is being held here.  Protect him while you defeat the enemy!
HKP3D2TL: The civilian raids have galvanized resistance against us.  The Fremen have declared an open jihad against all enemies! Their shock troops have been driven into a battle frenzy.  Crush them and their invaders with one blow!
HKP3D3TL: There have been several reports of Tleilaxu 'mistakes' of late.  Most of these escaped abominations have been terminated, but some isolated units have escaped. Be sure they do not jeopardize the defense of this region!
HKP3D4TL: Payment has arrived for the successful completion of the Tleilaxu mission.  A portion has been allocated for this defense mission.
HKP3D5HK: Technicians have reverse engineered the sonic tanks, and produced replicas as test beds.  Now that research is complete, it is time to test them on the field of battle! Their design is weak and overly complex, like all Atreides machinery, but the weapons are effective.  Use them to destroy the enemy invaders!
HKP3D7bFR: The Fremen have been encouraged by their successful ambush.  They have stepped up their raids.  Our reinforcements are being hard hit! Do not expect reinforcements.  The Baron expects this region to be held, regardless!
HKP3D7FR: The Fremen guerillas have stopped ambushing supply lines.  Extra reinforcements have been provided for your command.  Burn the enemy base to the ground!
HKP3D8SA: Squads of Sardaukar are on their way, but they have been delayed by sandstorms.  They will not arrive until after the enemy attacks! They will assault the enemy as soon as they arrive.  Their attack will be your cue to drive the enemy off the map!
HKP3D9IX: We have a defecting Ixian under guard in the Barracks. The Ixians will try to silence him, permanently.  Protect the barracks as you defeat the enemy incursion!
HKP1M1FRLose: Your weakness is appalling!  Why were these vermin not killed?
HKP1M1FRWin: The Fremen are the basest of animals.  I suspect that they enjoy being hunted.
HKP1M2FRLose: The Fremen escaped?  We needed those slaves.
HKP1M2FRWin: You've done well, Commander.  The captured Fremen will make excellent slaves.  They are strong of will.   Breaking that will promises to be a most… diverting experience.
HKP1M3FRLose: You failed to reach the Fremen exiles.  They have been killed by the enemy.  Most unfortunate.  They may have been useful.
HKP1M3FRWin: These Fremen animals might prove useful.  They fear of their own kind.  That fear will make them desperate fighters and expendable allies.
HKP1M4SALose: Commander, you have failed in your duty!  The Baron is quite distraught.  House Harkonnen must not be perceived as weak!  The Sardaukar mock your feeble efforts!. A show of weakness here will spell doom.  If you fail, the Supreme Commander will demand to meet with you, to hear your pitiful excuses.  I have doubts you would survive such a meeting.
HKP1M4SAWin: Well fought, Commander!  I'm certain that the Sardaukar are impressed by your display of military might!   Their aid will be useful.  When our Baron is crowned Emperor, they will serve him without question!
HKP1M5SALose: We want the Sardaukar as our allies!  Standing by as the Fremen vermin destroy their base is not the way to forge an alliance!  You must learn the ways of Harkonnen politics!
HKP1M5SAWin: Good work!  The Fremen are in retreat, and the Sardaukar base is intact!
HKP1M6SALose: That was not an effective way to deal with the Sardaukar situation, Commander. You have done nothing to combat these rogue Sardaukar!  We can ill afford to fight enemies within the ranks of our own allies.  Be warned!  Be more vigilant, or the Baron will see you in his "persuasion chambers"!
HKP1M6SAWin: The Sardaukar are beside themselves with embarrassment!  They can't begin to understand how one of their leaders could have been replaced with a Ghola so easily.  They were not expecting such a sophisticated decoy.  With no one else to trust, they have turned to us!  Delicious irony!
HKP1M7HKLose: Harkonnen must show no signs of weakness.  It is terror that allows us to rule!   Always remember that.
HKP1M7HKWin: Such amusing sport!   We must control through fear and brutality.  It is our right, and our destiny, to dominate those weaker than us.
HKP1M8HKLose: Your failure has won you no friends at the capital, Commander.  Improve your performance before you return here.  The Baron expects results!
HKP1M8HKWin: Your capture of the trade caravan was commendable, Commander.  The survivors will soon adjust to their new lives as slaves.
HKP1M9GNLose: We're certain that the scout had valuable information.  Your failure denies us that knowledge.  Pray that it does not cost us.
HKP1M9GNWin: The scout has been authorized to negotiate with the Sardaukar. He has arranged extra support for our next battle.
HKP1M10ORLose: The spy escaped!  We can only hope he had no useful information for his masters.
HKP1M10ORWin: The captured spy is being interrogated.  A little persuasive torture should loosen his tongue!
HKP1M11GNLose: The assault on the supply vehicle has failed.  You have only made your job more difficult, Commander.  Opportunities for easy victories cannot be squandered!
HKP1M11GNWin: Your interception of the enemy's medical  supplies proved most effective.  Without them, the enemy could not hold the territory.
HKP1M12GNLose: The supply convoy was destroyed.  The lost equipment must be found from elsewhere.
HKP1M12GNWin: Excellent.  You protected the supply convoy from enemy attack.  Now perhaps, our front line will hold.
HKP1M15HKLose: Why did you not take advantage of the extra production capabilities available from the refinery?  Ill considered, Commander!
HKP1M15HKWin: Reactivating the Refinery has increased productivity in this region.
HKP1M16GNLose: No contraband has been discovered.  How very disappointing.
HKP1M16GNWin: Capturing the smugglers is a positive boon!   Their executions will be a message to all who would deceive us.
HKP1M17SALose: The Sardaukar are not satisfied with your efforts, Commander.  They will not aid us!
HKP1M17SAWin: Inspired work, Commander.  We may expect a bit more help from the Sardaukar in the future.
HKP1M18GNwin: The smugglers are grateful for our help.  They will contact us again.
HKP1M18Gnlose: The Carryall was last seen over one of our territories.  We believed it crashed there.  We must locate it!
HKP2M1HKLose: The traitors escape was unfortunate.  The enemy may have gained access to vital Harkonnen secrets. Questions have been raised about your involvement with the defectors, Commander.  It has even been suggested that you were in league with them.  Obviously I don't agree.  If I did, your head would now be the centerpiece on my banquet table.
HKP2M1HKWin: Death has found the traitors!  Their rotting corpses will be displayed on the walls of the capital, so that the weak and foolish remember the strength and resolve of House Harkonnen!
HKP2M2HKLose: Gunseng is pleased that you did not attack his soldiers.  On the other hand, Copec is quite disappointed in you.  Think long on the consequences of your decisions in this power struggle, Commander!
HKP2M2HKWin: The destruction of Gunseng's troops pleased Copec, but angered Supreme Commander Gunseng.  If you are choosing sides in their bitter power struggle, be certain that you choose wisely!
HKP2M3IXLose: Your refusal to attack the Tleilaxu has not strengthened relations with the Ixians.  The Tleilaxu, however,  are well disposed towards us, for the moment at least. Both of these Houses are but weak, meddling merchants!  When we triumph, they will regret their intrusion into the affairs of our great house!
HKP2M3IXWin: We have improved our relations with the Ixian technologists through your actions.  Conversely, our Tleilaxu alliance has been weakened.  I hope you have made the right choice, Commander.
HKP2M4TLLose: The Tleilaxu demand to know why we have refused their offer.  The Ixians will surely hear of this and respond.
HKP2M4TLWin: The Tleilaxu found the death as amusing as we did!
HKP2M5SALose: The Sardaukar are disappointed by your failure to exterminate the Tleilaxu.  The Baron had great plans for the Sardaukar.  He is not pleased.
HKP2M5SAWin: The destruction of the gholas has pleased the Sardaukar.  Their beloved comrades can finally rest in peace.   They are emotional children!  Their comrades are dead, let that be the end of it!
HKP2M6INLose: I am disappointed in your failure to kill those civilians, Commander.  We have a reputation to maintain!  Arrakis is no place for the weak!
HKP2M6INWin: It was a pleasure to see those insects crushed by Harkonnen steel!  No one else will dare rebel!
HKP2M7HKLose: Supreme Commander Gunseng is not pleased with your performance, Commander. Fortunately, the need to keep his plans secret prevents him from taking his revenge on you at this time.  But one day he might be Baron.  Be careful!
HKP2M7HKWin: Supreme Commander Gunseng is pleased, Commander.  He has sent you one of his body slaves as a gift. More importantly, he has decided to spare a little influence, and protect you from his brother's anger.
HKP2M8SALose: Your performance is appalling!  The Sardaukar view us weaklings!  Pray we do not suffer any long-term disadvantage because of your mistakes.
HKP2M8SAWin: The Sardaukar have witnessed the might House Harkonnen!  They have agreed to help us in our next encounter with our enemies.
HKP2M9IXLose: Commander, you failed to protect the Ixian scientists!  We should not expect any Ixian favors for some time.
HKP2M9IXWin: Excellent work, Commander.  The scientists are safe, and the Ixian research continues.  We should expect to receive a reward soon!
HKP2M10IXLose: The Ixian convoy was destroyed. The Ixians have lost faith in our military capabilities!  The damage to House Harkonnen's reputation has been great.
HKP2M10IXWin: Well done, Commander!  You have protected the Ixians leaders.
HKP2M11TLLose: The loss of the Tleilaxu convoy has weakened our relations with them.
HKP2M11TLWin: The convoy is safe, and the Tleilaxu are grateful.  We can expect them to offer payment soon.
HKP2M12SMLose: The smugglers were not sufficiently punished!  We have not seen the last of them.  Resources allocated for the front line must now be utilized to protect our supply lines and resource areas.  The Supreme Commander is not happy.
HKP2M12SMWin: The smugglers fate will dissuade other criminals from stealing from the Harkonnen!
HKP2M13IXLose: Giving aid to the Ixians might have proved useful, in the long-term.  Time will tell.
HKP2M13IXWin: Dealing with the Ixians was a wise move.  They will repay us in kind.
HKP2M14IXLose: Some of the Tleilaxu units have survived.  The Ixians are not pleased.  They will not honor their debt to House Harkonnen.
HKP2M14IXWin: The Ixians are grateful for your actions against the Tleilaxu.  You can expect payment shortly.
HKP2M15IXLose: The Ixians are unhappy that we allowed the spy to escape.  We will not receive support from them.  We may have lost a valuable opportunity.
HKP2M15IXWin: The spy is dead.  The Ixians are grateful, and promise us their support in the future.
HKP2M16IXLose: Your failure to re-supply the Ixians has seriously damaged their research in this area.  They will not be lending us their support for some time.
HKP2M16IXWin: House IX is satisfied with your efforts.  They have promised aid in the near future.
HKP2M17TLLose: The Tleilaxu units will spread across the planet unless they are stopped! They must be hunted down and destroyed before they threaten our territories.  Additional forces have been allocated to protect the area to the rear of our troops.
HKP2M17TLWin: The Tleilaxu have agreed to compensate us for casualties suffered at the hands of their experimental units.
HKP2M18TLLose: The Ixians are grateful to be alive.  We can expect their aid in the future.
HKP2M18TLWin: The Ixian base is destroyed.  Expect a delivery from the Tleilaxu at any time!
HKP2M19IXLose: We would have preferred it, had you captured and held the Ixian research center.
HKP2M19IXWin: Our show of force seems to have impressed the Ixians.  Perhaps they will reconsider their choice of allies.
HKP2M20TLLose: Our situation is grim.  You have failed the Tleilaxu, and allowed the Sardaukar to ally with our enemies!  You had best improve matters, quickly!
HKP2M20TLWin: The Sardaukar and the Tleilaxu continue to feud.  We risk much by supporting the Tleilaxu.  They must certainly realize this!  Our reward should be very generous.
HKP2M21TLLose: The Tleilaxu are disappointed with our performance.  You had best improve matters quickly.
HKP2M21TLWin: Good work, Commander.  The Tleilaxu owe us a great debt.  We intend to collect.
HKP3M1TLLose: Unimpressive, Commander.  The Tleilaxu scientist might have had useful information!
HKP3M1TLWin: The scientist will talk soon enough!  These soft Tleilaxu creatures are no match for the work of skilled torturer!
HKP3M2TLLose: The Tleilaxu are disappointed by your lack of captives, Commander.  If your performance does not improve, you may end up in a flesh vat yourself!
HKP3M2TLWin: Fascinating.  Many of the captives would sooner face a slow death in the Harkonnen torture pits, than suffer the horrors of the Tleilaxu flesh vats.  I must see these vats one day!
HKP3M3TLLose: Your failure to recover Harkonnen property is most regrettable.  The Baron is very disappointed.
HKP3M3TLWin: Well done!  The outpost has been recovered.  We have expressed our extreme displeasure to the Tleilaxu. We do not expect any more of these unprovoked attacks.  If it happens again, we shall send their ambassador home in a body bag!
HKP3M4TLLose: You failed to outwit a giant slug?  Now the Tleilaxu will withhold our payment.  You may become worm food yourself, if your performance does not improve!
HKP3M4TLWin: Feeding a sandcrawler to a worm?  How utterly pointless!  But our payment for the task is forthcoming.  A share will be passed on to you, Commander.
HKP3M5HKLose: It is a pity that you destroyed the Sonic Tanks.  The technology might have been useful.  We will learn what we can from the wreckage.
HKP3M5HKWin: The sonic weapons are ours!   They will reveal much about the enemy's technology.
HKP3M6HKLose: Harkonnen honor required destruction of this settlement!  We must set an example here!
HKP3M6HKWin: We demand respect from all civilian settlements!
HKP3M7FRLose: Your inability to annihilate the Fremen leader was disappointing.  The death of his troops means little if the leader survives.  There are thousands of sand-rats out there, but only one leader to marshal them!
HKP3M7FRWin: Your destruction of the Fremen raiders was most gratifying.  Perhaps they will finally learn to respect the superiority of House Harkonnen!
HKP3M8SALose: Unimpressive, Commander.  You have failed to destroy the Tleilaxu base.  We have lost a rare opportunity to acquire Sardaukar aid.
HKP3M8SAWin: The Tleilaxu base has been annihilated.  The Sardaukar are quite satisfied.  Our support was noted, and they have promised us future assistance.  Once again, House Harkonnen proves its superiority!
HKP3M9IXLose: You have not found the scientists, but perhaps this is for the best.  It might have been a trap.  Perhaps their message was designed to draw us into an ambush.
HKP3M9IXWin: You are to be commended for locating the Ixian scientist.  The information he gave was quite revealing.  Tleilaxu activity is in this area is significant.  We must uncover their purpose here.  We shall increase our surveillance!
HKP3M10FRLose: You refused to involve yourself in their quarrel.  A wise move, Commander.
HKP3M10FRWin: It may have been wise to involve yourself in this quarrel, Commander.
HKP3M11TLLose: The defector survive, and surrendered to us in return for our protection.  He states that there have been many contacts between Tleilaxu and Guild representatives. There is no information as to why these meetings took place, but the secrecy surrounding them is curious.   The Guild traditionally does not take sides, but they seem to be making an exception here. All Tleilaxu outposts are to be observed.  The Tleilaxu are to be regarded as suspect.  Contact with them is discouraged.
HKP3M11TLWin: The Tleilaxu seem overly pleased by the death of the defector.  Curious.  But we shall certainly profit from their goodwill.
HKP3M12TLLose: We will never know what it was those scientists wanted to tell us!
HKP3M12TLWin: Good work, Commander!  Unfortunately, the deserters suffer from dehydration and sunstroke.  They have gone completely insane.  We may never discover their secret, but it seems clear that the Tleilaxu are hiding something.  We shall have to watch them more closely.
HKP3M13SMLose: Your failure to stamp out this unsanctioned smuggler activity will undermine our war efforts!
HKP3M13SMWin: Now that the smuggler's activities have been uncovered.  This should discourage them from dealing with our enemies!
HHKwin: Your thoroughness is to be commended!
HKP1D2FRLose: The Fremen leader has escaped.  The resistance will grow under his leadership!
HKP1D2FRWin: With their leaders dead upon the sand, the resistance should break into squabbling factions, and finally crumble.
HKP1D4SALose: The Sardaukar still have teeth.  They have shown this on the field of battle!  They would make useful allies. You should make every effort to maintain their loyalty, Commander.
HKP1D5SALose: The Sardaukar are hardened for battle.  We should make every effort to gain their loyalty on a more... permanent basis.
HKP1D7HKLose: The destruction was not completed, Commander.
HKP1D7HKWin: Now none shall doubt our resolve.  We will not tolerate resistance of any form!
HKP1D8HKLose: This should teach you a lesson, Commander.  Even apparent non-combatants can be treacherous.  Any small buds of rebellion must be pruned before they have the chance to flower.
HKP1D14FRLose: The Fremen have escaped you.  This must not happen again!
HKP1D14FRWin: After this example, no one can mistake our intentions now.
HKP2D1HKLose: The slaves will be sorely missed.  We must look elsewhere!
HKP2D1HKWin: The slaves will be utilized in the factory pits back on Giedi Prime.
HKP2D2aHKLose: Copec rewards loyalty with great generosity, Commander.  But Gunseng may punish betrayal in equal measure.  Your position is not a guarantee of personal safety, once you begin to meddle in politics.
HKP2D2bHKLose: Gunseng rewards loyalty with great generosity.  But Copec may punish betrayal in equal measure.  Your position may protect you from open reprisals for the time being, but tread with caution.  The wind can shift at any moment.
HKP2D5SALose: Again, the Sardaukar have proved their value!  We must find a way to guarantee their allegiance!
HKP2D11TLWin: The town is destroyed.  The Ix may find it difficult to find others willing to cooperate with them, now.
HKP2D11TLLose: The Tleilaxu mission failed.  Some of the civilians survived the attack.
HKP2D14IXLose: The Ixian convoy was destroyed. We look like fools if we cannot keep order within our own borders..
HKP2D14IXWin: The Ixians passed through safely.  Our agreement was kept.
HKP2D17TLLose: The Tleilaxu are angry that we failed to take revenge.  They did not expect this.
HKP2D17TLWin: The Tleilaxu bounty was a welcome addition to our forces.
HKP2D18TLLose: The bounty was not collected.  The opportunity has passed.
HKP2D18TLWin: The bounty has been collected.  We have sent a clear message to the Tleilaxu.  House Harkonnen controls Dune!
HKP2D21TLLose: The gholas were killed before we could utilize them.
HKP2D21TLWin: These gholas are clever, but deception is no replacement for brute force.
HKP2D22TLLose: Our defense of the Tleilaxu base has turned the Fremen's mistrust to unabashed hatred!  They despise the Tleilaxu, and now consider us to be Tleilaxu allies.   The Bene Tleilax rewarded us generously for our assistance, but we may have to defend ourselves against Fremen attacks in the future.
HKP3D1TLLose: Your failure is an embarrassment, Commander!  Remember, your life depends on your success!  Do not disappoint us again!
HKP3D1TLWin: We are impressed by your actions, Commander.  Protecting that scientist was an important part of our strategy!
HKP3D2TLWin: The Fremen rebellion is over.  Their forces have been crippled by heavy losses.
HKP3D2TLLose: The Fremen revolt continues.  Resistance is increasing!
HKP3D3TLLose: The fugitive Tleilaxu units are still a threat!
HKP3D3TLWin: The Tleilaxu units have been driven into the desert.  Let the worms take them.
HKP3D9IXLose: The scientist is dead.  We antagonized the Ixians, without benefit.
HKP3D9IXwin: Well done, Commander!   Despite constant harassment you have managed to protect the scientist!
HKP1M1FRa: Mentat : A group of Fremen foolishly blunder across our path!  They will not live to regret it. Make an example of them!  Let their blood flow upon the sand!  Then defeat the enemy, and seize the territory!
HKP1M1FRb: Fremen : Mu zein wallah, Harkonnen scum!  You are worthless cowards!   Attack us, if you dare.
HKP1M1FRc: Mentat : Slaughtering Fremen is most... gratifying, don't you agree?   Now capture the territory!
HKP1M2FRa: Mentat : You are undoubtedly anxious to slaughter these Fremen, but I'm afraid I must deny you that pleasure.  We must have slaves.  You must keep them alive until they can be collected.  After that, the region must be claimed for House Harkonnen!
HKP1M2FRb: Fremen : Flee, Harkonnen!  Crawl back under the rock from whence you came!  Ya hya chouhada!  Long live the fighters!
HKP1M2FRc: Mentat : You have taught these vermin to fear the strength of House Harkonnen.  Now crush the enemy!
HKP1M2FRd: Mentat : You failed to capture a single slave?  You incompetent fool!   Complete your mission and crush enemy resistance, before the Baron loses his patience with you!
HKP1M2FRe: Mentat : We have detected the arrival of Fremen on the battlefield.
HKP1M3FRa: Mentat : Find the Fremen camp and destroy it.  We have reports of enemy reinforcements heading towards the camp even as we speak!  You must capture the territory before they arrive!
HKP1M3FRb: Fremen Bandit : Come closer.  We wish to speak with you.
HKP1M3FRc: Fremen Bandit : We will join you, Harkonnen, in return for water, and protection from our 'brethren.'
HKP1M3FRd: Mentat : The Fremen have enacted their revenge upon the fugitives.  I almost admire their brutality. But, they are no use to us now.  Continue your assault on the enemy base.
HKP1M3FRe: Mentat : How marvelous.  Fighting has broken out inside the Fremen camp.  They requested assistance, but their 'reinforcements' appear to have been bandits!
HKP1M3FRf: Mentat : All communication from the camp has been cut off.  We assume it has been destroyed by the bandits. Commander...  the Fremen will seek revenge.  Offer our protection to the bandits.  They might be persuaded to join us in our assault on the enemy.
HKP1M3FRg: Mentat : A band of Fremen natives have entered this area.
HKP1M3FRh: Fremen : Harkonnen filth.  You are no better than common water thieves.  Prepare to die!
HKP1M4SAa: Mentat : The Sardaukar have come to test our strength.  A squad of Sardaukar troopers is on the attack! Defeat them, and the Sardaukar will gain respect for House Harkonnen.  You must not allow this dilemma to threaten our conquest of this region!
HKP1M4SAb: Sardaukar : Soldiers of House Harkonnen!  Prepare to die a warrior's death!
HKP1M4SAd: Sardaukar : Hail, Harkonnen!   We come to test your worthiness in battle!
HKP1M4SAe: Mentat : Radar indicates another force of Sardaukar on its way to this area.  Continue with your assault on the enemy base!
HKP1M4SAf: Sardaukar : We are now ready to test the strength of your enemy.
HKP1M5SAa: Mentat : A Sardaukar base in this area is under attack from a superior Fremen force!  If we assist in their defense, the Sardaukar might aid us in our attack on this territory.
HKP1M5SAb: Mentat : Fremen raiders have reached the Sardaukar!  You must come to their aid and ensure their survival!
HKP1M5SAc: Mentat : The Sardaukar base has been destroyed, and its guards are in retreat.  Continue with our attack.
HKP1M5SAe: Mentat : More Fremen troops have arrived.  Be sure the Sardaukar are strong enough to repel the attack, but don't  neglect your mission of conquest!
HKP1M6SAa: Mentat : An Ordos Ghola leads a squad of Sardaukar in their attack against us! They are fools to be deceived!  Kill them if you like, they are worthless and weak.  Or better yet, kill the ghola and show them the error of their ways.  Their childlike notions of honor will lead them to follow us as we capture the territory!
HKP1M6SAb: Mentat : The rogue Sardaukar have arrived.  Expect their attack soon!
HKP1M6SAd: Mentat : The Sardaukar are dead.  It is a shame that they could not be turned.  They would have proved useful.  No matter.  Continue your attack!  Crush the enemy!
HKP1M6SAe: Mentat : We have exposed their false Ghola leader!  Now these Sardaukar will serve us in our attack.
HKP1M6SAf: Sardaukar : Honor demands that we serve you.  We have requested extra forces to attack the Ordos.  We are yours to command.
HKP1M7HKa: Mentat : A convoy of civilian refugees is expected to cross the territory soon.  Hunt them down and kill them as you destroy the enemy base!
HKP1M7HKb: Mentat : The civilian convoy has entered the combat zone.
HKP1M7HKc: Mentat : All the civilians are dead.  Their belongings will go to further the war effort.  Now dispose of the enemy with the same ruthlessness!
HKP1M7HKd: Mentat : You let them get away, Commander!  Concentrate on the enemy now.
HKP1M8HKa: Mentat : The convoy is due to pass through the battle zone soon. Capture the convoy!  I'm sure that Prince Gunseng will be very grateful.
HKP1M8HKb: Mentat : The convoy has been detected.
HKP1M8HKc: Mentat : The convoy has evaded you, Commander.  Gunseng will be disappointed.  Console him by taking this territory!
HKP1M8HKd: Mentat : The convoy is ours.  They surrendered almost instantly.  Word of House Harkonnen's strength precedes us!
HKP1M8Hke: Mentat : You fool!  The caravan was not to be destroyed.  Find the imbecile who fired the first shot.  I want him dead at my feet by morning!  Do not fail to capture this region!
HKP1M8HKf: Mentat : The enemy have control of the convoy. Recapture it, Commander.  Or suffer Prince Gunseng's wrath!
HKP1M8HKg: Mentat : The convoy has stopped.  Attack the enemy and take possession of it!
HKP1M8HKh: Mentat : We have the convoy.  Excellent, Commander.  It will be unloaded once we have rid the territory of enemy scum.
HKP1M9Gna: Mentat : A scout is stranded in the territory.  You must rescue him before he is found and killed. He must not be allowed to jeopardize the mission.  Burn the enemy base to the ground!
HKP1M9GNc: Mentat : We must get the scout to a safe location quickly!  A Fremen raiding party has arrived!
HKP1M9GNd: Mentat : The scout and his guards are under attack from the Fremen.  Assist them!
HKP1M9GNe: Mentat : The scout has been killed.  The Baron is not pleased.  Only the capture of this territory will pacify him now!
HKP1M9GNf: Soldier : The crash was tracked by the Fremen.  We must get to the wreckage first.
HKP1M9GNg: Mentat : The scout has been rescued.  Now crush the enemy!
HKP1M9GNh: Mentat : More Fremen raiders have entered the territory.  Protect the scout!
HKP1M10ORa: Mentat : An escaping spy, rushing to rejoin his Ordos masters, is expected to pass through the battle. Take him alive if you can - a prisoner is worth more to us than a corpse - but kill every other living thing in the area.
HKP1M10ORb: Mentat : Commander, the spy has entered your area.  Find him, and take him alive!
HKP1M10ORc: Mentat : Excellent.  The spy is our captive.  We will interrogate him.  In the interim, destroy the enemy base.
HKP1M10ORbb: Mentat : Our intelligence is confirmed.  The Ordos know that we have captured their spy.  They will almost certainly attempt to retrieve him.  Or at the very least, ensure his silence.
HKP1M10ORcc: Mentat : The Ordos snatched the spy from under your very nose!  Destroy the APC before it escapes!
HKP1M10ORd: Mentat : The spy is dead, and with him, all information regarding the Ordos espionage networks.  Take this territory, Commander!  It has never been more vital!
HKP1M11GNa: Mentat : The enemy in this territory are lacking necessary medical supplies.  A medical vehicle is on its way to re-supply them.  You must prevent it from making the delivery.  The loss will reduce their morale and allow for an easy conquest.
HKP1M11GNb: Mentat : The medical vehicle approaches the enemy base.  Destroy it!
HKP1M11GNc: Mentat : The medical vehicle has been destroyed, and the anti-serum with it.  The enemy cannot retain this territory without the supplies.  We expect a swift retreat.
HKP1M11GNd: Mentat : You allowed the anti-serum to be delivered!  The fate of the medical vehicle is no longer important.  Use your forces to press the attack.
HKP1M12GNa: Mentat : A Harkonnen supply convoy is approaching.  You are to escort it through the region and protect it from attack.  But do not fail to capture this territory for the Baron!
HKP1M12GNb: Mentat : The convoy is now in the battle zone.  You must protect it!
HKP1M12GNc: Mentat : The convoy has left the battle zone safely.  Now, destroy the enemy and take this region!
HKP1M12GNd: Mentat : The convoy has been destroyed.  Avenge this humiliation by destroying our enemies!
HKP1M12GNe: Convoy Leader : The convoy is under your protection, Commander.
HKP1M15HKa: Mentat : You have an Engineer to reactivate the decommissioned refinery in this area.
HKP1M15HKb: Mentat : Well done!  Now you must repair the refinery.  It is in poor condition.
HKP1M15HKc: Mentat : Control sequences for the harvester have been found.  It is now ours.  Use the resources to capture this territory!
HKP1M15HKd: Mentat : If you capture the barracks, you will have the opportunity to train additional infantry in the use of enemy weapons and tactics.  Victory is nigh!
HKP1M16GNa: Mentat : A suspected smuggler convoy has entered this territory.  Stop it and inspect it for contraband goods. Do not allow this to distract you from the main task - killing the enemy and burning their base to the ground!
HKP1M16GNb: Mentat : Wiping out the convoy was not your orders!  We had far more to gain by keeping it intact!   No matter.  Take the territory for House Harkonnen!
HKP1M16GNc: Soldier : We have intercepted the convoy.  We're checking the cargo manifests now.
HKP1M16GNd: Soldier : The convoy is smuggling small arms and weapon parts.  We will confiscate them, and deliver the drivers for interrogation and torture.
HKP1M16GNe: Soldier : All the vehicles are clear.  This is a legitimate convoy.  We're allowing to pass through.
HKP1M17SAa: Mentat : You must kill the commander of a Sardaukar patrol in the area.  His death will ensure our victory in this region!
HKP1M17SAb: Sardaukar : What is your business?  We are here to observe, not to interfere in your petty squabbles.
HKP1M17SAc: Sardaukar : We shall avenge this insult!
HKP1M17SAd: Mentat : Glorious!  The Sardaukar General and his supporters have been eliminated.  Now you must defeat the enemy and destroy their base!
HKP1M17SAe: Mentat : The Sardaukar General and his supporters have been destroyed.  We have cleverly planted evidence that incriminates the enemy.  The Sardaukar will find it, and their trust in us will grow!  Delightful! The fools will attack the enemy now.  Use them to claim this territory for the Baron!
HKP1M17SAf: Mentat : The General and his supporters were not killed before reinforcements arrived!  The Baron will be beside himself!  If you value your neck, placate him with the blood-soaked ruins of the enemy base!
HKP1M18GNa: Mentat : Find the old smuggler outpost and restore it to active status to guide the Carryall.  Once the lost fools have been retrieved, push on and destroy the enemy!
HKP1M18GNb: Mentat : The Outpost isn't far away.  Find it.  Now!
HKP1M18GNc: Mentat : Haste, Commander, haste!  The  advanced Carryall is a valuable piece of equipment.  Unless you locate the Outpost, it will be lost!
HKP1M18GNd: Mentat : The Advanced Carryall is about to crash!   Reactivate the outpost!
HKP1M18GNe: Carryall Pilot:  This is Advanced Carryall Flight 23. Your signal is strong. Now homing on your position.
HKP1M18GNf: Mentat : We recommend that you repair the outpost.  It must be protected until the carryall reaches this territory!
HKP1M18GNg: Carryall Pilot : Advanced Carryall flight 23 reporting for duty.  We are at your service, Commander!
HKP1M18GNh: Mentat : The enemy have detected our presence at the outpost.  They will attack shortly.  The building must be protected!
HKP1M18Gni: Mentat : Contact with the Carryall has been lost!  Their telemetry data indicates that they crashed in our territory. Forget them for now!  Concentrate your anger on the battle!  Death to the enemy of the Harkonnen!
HKP1M18GNj: Mentat : The Carryall has dropped off our scanners.
HKP1M18GNk: Mentat : Contact with the Carryall has been lost!  Their telemetry data indicates that they crashed in our territory. Forget them for now!  Concentrate your anger on the battle!  Death to the enemy of the Harkonnen!
HKP2M1HKa: Mentat : Commander, unit morale is low.   We suspect Ordos treachery.  If any of our troops attempt to desert, execute them! They will fear us more than the enemy!  Remember, this territory must be taken!
HKP2M1HKb: Mentat : Treason!  Troops are attempting to defect!  Execute them immediately, before they join our enemies!
HKP2M1HKc: Mentat : You fool!  The inadequacy has allowed the traitors to escape, and with Harkonnen secrets, no doubt! Redeem yourself by spilling the blood of our enemies.  Destroy them!
HKP2M1HKd: Mentat : Well done, Commander!  Your decisive actions should discourage any further defections.  Now we shall crush the enemy positions and drive the survivors into the sands!
HKP2M1HKe: Mentat : A command of conscripts have been assigned to you, to make up for the shortfall created by the defecting troops.  Use them in the first wave of your assault on the enemy.
HKP2M1HKf: Mentat : The reinforcements have defected!  Kill them!  Let our troops see how the Harkonnen deal with traitors!
HKP2M1HKg: Mentat : It is too late, Commander!  The defectors have reached the enemy!  Attack now, or victory may slip from your grasp!
