HKP2M2HKa: Copec Harkonnen : Commander.  A squad of Harkonnen bodyguards has been assigned to you.  I trust your honor, of course, but the loyalty of these soldiers is suspect. There may be traitors among them.  See that they die a coward's death before the conquest of this territory is complete.
HKP2M2HKb: Gunseng Harkonnen : Commander...  Due to a small, ah... shall we say 'clerical error'?  ... a squad of my personal guard has been diverted to Arrakis.  You may use them as you see fit.  I will, of course, hold you personally responsible for their welfare.
HKP2M2HKc: Copec Harkonnen : I appreciate your loyalty and prompt compliance, Commander.  It has been duly noted.  Now capture the territory!
HKP2M2HKd: Mentat : Commander!  Gunseng has ordered his men to leave the battlefield before they suffer further casualties.  If you wish to gain Copec's favor, I suggest you act now to wipe out all those who remain!
HKP2M3IXa: Mentat : Kill the Tleilaxu!  The Ixians have promised a handsome reward!  When they have fallen, turn your forces on the enemy!
HKP2M3IXb: Tleilaxu : The most dangerous thing about you is your breath, Harkonnen!  Approach us and die, you ignorant slime!
HKP2M3IXc: Ixian : We are grateful for your assistance.  Accept this gift and our thanks.
HKP2M3IXd: Ixian : You have not carried out our request!  Do you require our aid?  Or perhaps you have sided with the Tleilaxu!
HKP2M3IXe: Mentat : Groups of Ixians and Tleilaxu have entered the area.  They seem intent on destroying each other.
HKP2M3IXf: Tleilaxu : Harkonnen devils!   You will pay with your souls for the destruction of our Flesh Vats!
HKP2M4TLa: Mentat : The Tleilaxu have approached us with an offer.  An Ixian researcher has been stranded in this territory.  He is weak and alone. Kill him, and the Tleilaxu promise us some examples of their technology.  We can use these to drive our  enemy, screaming, into the desert!
HKP2M4TLc: Mentat : The Tleilaxu are most appreciative of your actions.  You can expect a delivery from them soon.  Now continue your attack on the enemy!
HKP2M4TLd: Mentat : The Tleilaxu gift has arrived.  More units!  Make good use of them.  Destroy the enemy!
HKP2M5SAe: Tleilaxu : You may have defeated us, for the moment.  But know this: the future belongs to the Bene Tleilax!
HKP2M5SAf: Mentat : A large force of Sardaukar have arrived to attack the Tleilaxu.
HKP2M5SAh: Sardaukar : We are grateful, Commander.  We will remember this.
HKP2M5SAi: Mentat : The Sardaukar have destroyed the Tleilaxu base.  Now, destroy the enemy while they are weak!
HKP2M5Saj: Tleilaxu : Our base is destroyed!   We shall avenge our losses by harvesting your corpses!
HKP2M5Sal: Mentat : The Tleilaxu base has been destroyed, but some units remain intact.  They are attempting to leave the battlefield.  Pursue them as you sweep the enemy from this region!
HKP2M5Sam: Mentat : The Tleilaxu held the Sardaukar forces at bay!
HKP2M5Sao: Mentat : Large numbers of Tleilaxu reinforcements are entering this region.
HKP2M5Sap: Mentat : A significant force of Sardaukar are entering the region. Intelligence would suggest that the target for their attack is the Tleilaxu base.
HKP2M5SAq: Mentat : Forces from the Imperial Sardaukar and the Bene Tleilax have been destroyed in combat.  The territory is ready for conquest!
HKP2M6INa: Mentat : The escaped prisoners have been tracked to this territory.  You are to stop them, once and for all.
HKP2M6INb: Mentat : We have spotted the prisoners!
HKP2M6INc: Mentat : Their deaths will be a simple matter.  As easy as shooting wounded men.
HKP2M6Ind: Mentat : The renegades are dead.  Now kill the enemy wherever you find him!
HKP2M6INe: Mentat : The prisoners have escaped.  A sand worm will have them before they reach the enemy.  Forget them.  Concentrate on defeating the enemy!
HKP2M6INf: Mentat : A group of escapees have appeared.  Kill them all!
HKP2M6INg: Mentat : Too many prisoners have escaped.  The enemy will know our deployments and gain a strategic advantage!  Minimize our losses by taking this territory!
HKP2M6INh: Mentat : Another group of escapees have turned up, using stolen prison equipment and weapons.  End their miserable existence!
HKP2M7HKa: Mentat : Take the troops suspected of allegiance to Copec and ensure sure they don't survive this battle.  Use them in the front rank of your assault on the enemy base!
HKP2M7HKb: Gunseng Harkonnen : Why are those men still alive?  How disappointing.  Now I shall have to dirty my own hands.  You try my patience, Commander.
HKP2M7HKc: Mentat : The enemies of Lord Gunseng will see the fate of traitors to House Harkonnen.  Now, capture the territory for our Lord!
HKP2M8SAa: Mentat : Take this region and show the Sardaukar that we are not weak.  We are the supreme force on Arrakis!
HKP2M8SAf: Mentat : The Sardaukar are heading for the enemy base.  Now is the time for a show of strength!
HKP2M8SAb: Mentat : Spies report that the Sardaukar have made an alliance with the enemy.  They will attack soon.  Destroy them all!  Reduce their base to a smoldering ruin!
HKP2M8SAc: Mentat : Well done!  Your quick and decisive action has shown the Sardaukar that we are the strongest House. They will summon troops to support us.  We shall crush the enemy!
HKP2M8SAd: Mentat : Our scans reveal that a new squad of Sardaukar have entered the territory.
HKP2M8SAe: Mentat : With the Sardaukar envoy dead, their alliance with the enemy will be delayed.  We may now concentrate on the capture of this region!
HKP2M9IXa: Mentat : A number of Ixian scientists have been stranded by the battle.  Rescue them, and protect them from enemy action while you fight for control of the territory!
HKP2M9IXb: Ixian : Thank you, Commander.  We are at your service until the end of the battle. The Tleilaxu are aware of our location.  It is only a matter of time before they attack!
HKP2M9IXc: Mentat : The Ixians are dead. You failed to provide a strong enough defense!   Now concentrate on the enemy, before we lose the region completely!
HKP2M9IXd: Mentat : One of the scientists has been lost.  Ensure the protection of the others!
HKP2M9IXe: Mentat : Tleilaxu forces have entered the area.  We must assume their intent is to attack the scientists.  Intercept them and  kill them all!
HKP2D9IXa: Mentat : House Ix has rewarded us for protecting a group of their scientists.  Use the extra resources well!
HKP2M10IXa: Mentat : An Ixian convoy is due to pass through this battle zone.  Ensure that it passes through unharmed!
HKP2M10IXb: Mentat : The Ixian convoy has arrived.  Try to protect as many vehicles as possible!
HKP2M10IXc: Mentat : The convoy has left the area.  Your nursemaid duties are at an end.  Concentrate on killing the enemy!
HKP2M10IXd: Mentat : The convoy has been wiped out.  No matter.  They were an unnecessary burden.  Concentrate on defeating the enemy!
HKP2M10IXe: Ixian : We are grateful for your escort, Commander.
HKP2M10IXf: Mentat : A group of Tleilaxu leeches have appeared.  Their target will be the Ixian convoy.  We recommend that you intercept them.
HKP2M10IXg: Tleilaxu : Harkonnen!   Our war upon these vile technologists is no concern of yours!
HKP2M11TLa: Mentat : A Tleilaxu supply convoy will shortly arrive here.  Ensure that it passes through the territory unharmed, while your forces crush the enemy!
HKP2M11TLc: Mentat : Well done!  The convoy passed through the area safely.
HKP2M11TLd: Mentat : Your lack of attention has caused the destruction of the convoy!  Now, concentrate on crushing the enemy!
HKP2M12SMa: Mentat : Smugglers have stolen one of our harvesters.  Find it and 'persuade' the smugglers to return it.  Use as much force as necessary.  Then burn the enemy base to the ground.
HKP2M12SMb: Soldier : We have located the stolen harvester, sir.  It is being guarded by smugglers.  They will have to be neutralized if we are to recapture it.
HKP2M12SMc: Mentat : The Harvester has been recaptured.  Use it for its intended purpose - collecting spice. As for the rest of the smuggler convoy, kill them if you have the time, or let them go.  But concentrate your forces on your main objective - the enemy's defeat!
HKP2M12SMd: Mentat : Why did you destroy the harvester rather than capturing it?  Now you must capture this territory without its assistance!
HKP2M12SMe: Mentat : The Smugglers have planted a bomb on the harvester.  They must have been paid off by our enemies!  Get the harvester away from our other vehicles.
HKP2M12SMf: Mentat : The bomb has detonated!  A timer was set when we reclaimed it from the smugglers.  We will take our revenge!  Kill everything in the region!
HKP2M12SMg: Mentat : A convoy of vehicles has entered the region. Our stolen harvester is among them.  Find the convoy, and take our property back!
HKP2M13IXa: Mentat : An Ixian base has offered us vehicles in return for deliveries of spice.  Supply them so long as it does not jeopardize the your mission.
HKP2M13IXb: Ixian : We are grateful for your assistance.  We will construct some examples of our technology, for your use.
HKP2M13IXc: Ixian : Harkonnen savage!  We extend our hand in friendship, and you bite it off!
HKP2M13IXd: Ixian : An Infiltrator has been constructed for your use.  We will supply you with more technology, so long as the spice deliveries continue.
HKP2M13IXe: Ixian : We are grateful for the spice.  We now have enough to continue our experiments.  You will be rewarded very soon.
HKP2M14IXa: Mentat : The Ixians have supplied sample units for battle testing.  They are interesting, but not well-armored.  Use them at your discretion, to defeat the enemy.
HKP2M14IXb: Mentat : There appear to be Tleilaxu observers in the enemy base.  Do they observe the Ixian vehicles, or our troops?  We shall discuss this with the Ixians.
HKP2M14IXc: Mentat : A number of Ixian units have arrived, Commander.  They are a gift from House Ix.  They want us to use them to destroy the Tleilaxu observers.
HKP2M14IXd: Mentat : House IX extends its thanks for killing the Tleilaxu observers. They will repay the debt.  Now, you must retake this territory from the enemy!
HKP2M15IXa: Mentat : A Tleilaxu Face Dancer spy is hiding near this territory.  House Ix has offered a bounty for its head.  Collect the bounty, and take this region for House Harkonnen!
HKP2M15IXb: Mentat : The Face Dancer spy is on the move!  Find it and kill it!
HKP2M15IXc: Soldier : We have located the spy, Commander.
HKP2M15IXd: Mentat : The spy is dead.  The Ix will be pleased.
HKP2M15IXe: Mentat : The spy has met with his escort.  Act quickly, and kill it!
HKP2M15IXf: Mentat : We have received a warning from the Tleilaxu.  If we do not let their spy leave in peace, they have threatened to take action against us.
HKP2M15IXg: Tleilaxu : How dare you attack the minions of the Bene Tleilax!  We will have our revenge!
HKP2M15IXh: Mentat : The spy has escaped.  Forget the bounty.  Capture  the territory!
HKP2M16IXa: Mentat : The Ixian scientists need supplies.  Deliver your sandcrawler to them, but remember this: our victory in this battle is more important than their foolish requests!
HKP2M16IXb: Ixian : We are grateful for these deliveries.  Another truck has been supplied, for your use.
HKP2M16IXc: Ixian : These supplies are vital to our work. We have arranged for the delivery of a third consignment.  We our continuing our surveillance of the Tleilaxu.  We believe that they are plotting something.
HKP2M16IXd: Mentat : Well done!  You successfully delivered all three supplies vehicles to the Ixian scientists.
HKP2M16IXe: Mentat : The supply truck has been destroyed.  The Ixian research will fail without the components it carried.
HKP2M16IXf: Mentat : Commander, stop that sandcrawler!  Our scanners have detected large amounts of explosive in it.  We must assume it is a bomb, and try to disarm it!
HKP2M16IXg: Mentat : We have determined that there is a bomb in the sandcrawler!  It is set to explode in proximity to the Ixian supplies.  You must not take it to their base until we have disarmed it!
HKP2M16IXh: Mentat : You were ordered not to take the sandcrawler to the Ixian base until the bomb was disarmed!  Your mistake will cost us! The Ix will not pay us.  Forget them.  Carry out your attack on the enemy!
HKP2M16IXi: Tleilaxu : Very observant, Commander.  It is a bomb.  But you are too late.  You'll never be able to prevent us from destroying the transport!
HKP2M16IXj: Mentat : The Tleilaxu are carry a short-range transmitter.  We believe it to be a trigger device for the bomb in the sandcrawler.  Don't let them approach it!
HKP2M16IXk: Mentat : The Tleilaxu got close enough to detonate the bomb!
HKP2M16IXl: Mentat : With the destruction of the truck, the Ixians cannot complete their experiments.  Continue your assault on the enemy!
HKP2M16IXm: Mentat : We have managed to disarm the bomb.  Ensure that the truck reaches the Ixian scientists!
HKP2M16IXn: Mentat : The Ixians have constructed an Infiltrator for our use.
HKP2M17TLa: Mentat : Seek out and destroy the Tleilaxu units before they can interfere with our attack!
HKP2M17TLb: Mentat : We are picking up garbled battle transmissions. The Tleilaxu rogue units appear to be heading for an enemy base.
HKP2M17TLc: Mentat : From intercepted transmissions, we have determined that the enemy are under attack by the Tleilaxu!
HKP2M17TLd: Mentat : Enemy battle transmissions indicate that the Tleilaxu have ceased their attack.
HKP2M17TLe: Soldier : We are under attack by the Tleilaxu units!
HKP2M17TLf: Soldier : Sir, we believe that all the Tleilaxu units have been eliminated.
HKP2M17TLg: Mentat : The natives have been contaminated by the Tleilaxu. Destroy them!
HKP2M17TLh: Mentat : A native village appears to have escaped damage in the Tleilaxu attacks.  This is extremely suspect.  They might be traitors.  Investigate immediately!
HKP2M18TLa: Mentat : The Landsraad have asked us to escort an inspector to a hidden Ixian base in this region.  The inspector will investigate alleged infringements of the Butlerian Jihad. Indulge them, but ensure that we control this territory by the end of the day!
HKP2M18TLb: Imperial Inspector : This has all the hallmarks of Ixian technology. I shall inspect it carefully.
HKP2M18TLc: Imperial Inspector : House Ix has been attempting to create a thinking machine.  This is in direct violation of the Butlerian Jihad.  Commander, you need not concern with this matter any further.  My associates will take over as soon as they arrive.
HKP2M18TLd: Ixian : Commander, the inspector is a Tleilaxu agent.  He cannot prove these accusations.  His false report is a pretense.   He will use it to destroy us! If you destroy the Tleilaxu impostor, you will be rewarded!
HKP2M18TLe: Imperial Inspector : I see that you have located the Ixian base.  I must begin the inspection as quickly as possible.
HKP2M18TLf: Tleilaxu : How dare you interfere with the cleansing of this unholy place!   You will be punished for this outrage!
HKP2M18TLg: Mentat : The Tleilaxu are defeated, but their purpose in attacking was fulfilled.  Our report to the Landsraad will indicate that the Tleilaxu creatures went rogue and had to be killed.  Continue with your assault!
HKP2M18TLh: Mentat : You protected their base from the Tleilaxu, and the Ixians are grateful.  With this task complete, you must concentrate on taking the territory!
HKP2M18TLi: Mentat : The Tleilaxu Inquisitors have completed their task.  The Ixian base is destroyed.  Now, take this territory for House Harkonnen!
HKP2M18TLj: Mentat : Despite your efforts, the Ixian base has been destroyed.  It is of no consequence.  All that matters is the capture of this region!
HKP2M19IXa: Mentat : Your mission is to capture the Ixian base in this territory.  Failing this, destroy it.  Then destroy all enemies of House Harkonnen in this region!
HKP2M19IXb: Mentat : The Ixian research center was destroyed.  We would have preferred that you capture the center intact, but total destruction is always a safe alternative.
HKP2M19IXc: Mentat : The Ixian research center has been destroyed.  Concentrate on the capture of this territory!
HKP2M19IXd: Mentat : We now control the Ixian base.  Protect it!
HKP2M20TLa: Mentat : Your objectives are twofold: protect the Tleilaxu base from the Sardaukar attack, and destroy the enemy base in this region!
HKP2M20TLb: Mentat : The Sardaukar have launched an attack upon the Tleilaxu.
HKP2M20TLc: Tleilaxu : The Sardaukar are attacking!  The fools do not understand the importance of our work!  You must help us!
HKP2M20TLd: Sardaukar : Our fight is with the Tleilaxu.  If you ally with them, DIE with them!
HKP2M20TLe: Mentat : The Tleilaxu Flesh Vats have been destroyed.  Turn your attention to our enemies, Commander!
HKP2M20TLf: Mentat : The Tleilaxu have run low on resources.  Perhaps we should make a greater commitment to their protection.
HKP2M20TLg: Mentat : Our long range scans cannot locate any more Sardaukar troops in this territory.  There is no longer any need for us to waste our resources protecting the Tleilaxu.  Concentrate our forces on the enemy!
HKP2M21TLa: Mentat : Protect the Tleilaxu base from Fremen attack, but ensure that House Harkonnen takes control of this region!
HKP2M21TLb: Mentat : Fremen raiders have been spotted in this area.
HKP2M21TLd: Fremen : You aligned with the Tleilaxu, the very spawn of Shaitan!  Now we will spill YOUR water!
HKP2M21TLe: Mentat : The Tleilaxu Flesh Vats have been destroyed!  Turn your attention to the enemy, Commander!
HKP2M21TLf: Mentat : Commander, the Tleilaxu have run out of reinforcements!  We must make a greater commitment to their protection.
HKP2M21TLg: Mentat : Our long range scans cannot locate any more Fremen in this territory.  Concentrate on the battle against our true enemies and take the region!
HKP3M1TLa: Mentat : Capture the Tleilaxu scientist!  He has important information and must be interrogated!  Do not neglect the main objective - capture the region for the Baron!
HKP3M1TLb: Mentat : You have found the convoy!  The scientist we want is in the Tleilaxu cargo transport.  Isolate and capture it!  Destroy the escort force as you do this!
HKP3M1TLc: Tleilaxu : This violation of our neutrality shall be avenged, Harkonnen!   You cannot defeat us.  We have power over death itself!  When one of our number is killed, we can recover his knowledge and skills in ghola form.
HKP3M1TLd: Mentat : The scientist has been killed. You have not helped the Harkonnen cause!  Make amends by reducing the enemy base to a smoking ruin littered with corpses!
HKP3M1TLe: Mentat : The Tleilaxu convoy has entered the area.  Intercept it and capture the scientist before they reach the base!
HKP3M1TLf: Mentat : The convoy has reached the Tleilaxu base.  You must act quickly!  Capture the scientist!
HKP3M1TLg: Mentat : A communication, Commander!  From reinforcements heading towards our base.  They claim to have been sent by our High Command, to counter the growing Tleilaxu threat!
HKP3M1TLh: Mentat : Treason!  The reinforcements are transforming into Leeches and Contaminators!  The Tleilaxu have deceived us!
HKP3M1TLi: Mentat : We have crushed the imposters.  Their communications were transmitted in an old IFF code.  We will not be deceived again!
HKP3M1TLj: Mentat : Another group of  troops have appeared.  Be prepared, Commander!
HKP3M1TLk: Tleilaxu : Perhaps you are not as stupid as you appear, Harkonnen.  You may have detected our attack,  but you will still fall before us!
HKP3M2TLa: Mentat : The Tleilaxu need fresh subjects for their flesh vats.  They have sent additional units to assist in the capture of a group of Fremen refugees. Once you have fulfilled their requirements, drive the enemy from our territory!
HKP3M2TLb: Fremen : We do not fear death, Harkonnen!   The souls of our fallen warriors live on in the desert sands.
HKP3M2TLc: Mentat : The Tleilaxu are grateful, but they need more captives!
HKP3M2TLd: Mentat : There are no more civilians in the area to capture!  This could strain relations with the Tleilaxu.  Let them complain!  We must concentrate on the conquest of this area!
HKP3M2TLe: Mentat : The Tleilaxu require live flesh, not burnt meat. You have failed to deliver!  They will not provide us with aid.   You must conquer this territory without their assistance!
HKP3M2TLf: Mentat : Refugees have entered the battle zone.  They are defended by a few warriors, but this is of no consequence.  We are Harkonnen!
HKP3M3TLa: Mentat : An observation post has failed to report in.  Find the post and have an engineer reactivate it.  Use the information gained to drive home your assault.
HKP3M3TLb: Mentat : The outpost has been spotted!  It is surrounded by Tleilaxu units!
HKP3M3TLc: Mentat : The outpost is secure.  Well done!   Beware of surviving Tleilaxu creations.
HKP3M3TLd: Mentat : There may still be remnants of the Tleilaxu in the region!
HKP3M3Tle: Soldier : Communication with our outposts has been temporarily cut off, due to storm damage.  They will be returned to operational status in a short time.  Further investigation is not required.
HKP3M3TLf: Mentat : One of our outposts is not using the correct Harkonnen battle codes. Send a reasonably sized Security Force to the post.  An Engineer might be able to fix whatever communications problems they are experiencing.
HKP3M3TLg: Mentat : It is a Tleilaxu trap!   Kill them!
HKP3M3TLh: Mentat : The outlying border territories report that a large force of Tleilaxu are headed this way.
HKP3M3Tli: Mentat : A Tleilaxu attack squad approaches!
HKP3M5HKa: Mentat : The Atreides transport crashed in this area.  The contents may still be intact. Kill the survivors and bring back any technology for analysis.  Then continue the advance and sweep the enemy from the region!
HKP3M5HKb: Atreides Technician : Calling all Atreides units!  This is a priority one distress!  I need immediate assistance.  I am under attack! Please respond, over.
HKP3M5HKc: Mentat : The technician has been manipulating the enemy tanks by remote control.  We have captured his remote control unit.   Now, we control the tanks!   Attack the enemy base!
HKP3M5HKd: Mentat : The Atreides technician had the tanks under remote control.  We have seized his controller, but without the tanks it is useless.  We shall use our own units to drive the enemy from the face of Arrakis!
HKP3M6HKa: Mentat : Civilians in this area refuse to pay their taxes.  Destroy their town and put them to death!  You may then continue our conquest of the region by crushing the enemy!
HKP3M6HKb: Mentat : Destroy the rest of the town!  Retrieve any valuables!
HKP3M6HKc: Mentat : The town is destroyed.  Their tax debt has been paid in blood.  Now, we will spill the blood of the enemy!
HKP3M6HKd: Mentat : The settlement has summoned reinforcements.  Fremen warriors with Atreides vehicle support are heading your way.  Kill them all!
HKP3M7FRa: Mentat : Your mission is to destroy the Fremen leader and his bodyguards.  Finish the job quickly!  Clean out their filthy nest, then burn the enemy base to the ground!
HKP3M7FRb: Fremen : Your choice is simple!  Leave now or die.  Bi-la kaifa!
HKP3M7FRc: Mentat : Bravo, Commander!   The Baron's wishes have been fulfilled.
HKP3M7FRd: Mentat : Additional funds have been supplied to you.  Use them wisely!
HKP3M7FRe: Mentat : It is a trap!  Two forces of Fremen raiders have entered the area.  They are heading for your position. Prepare to defend yourselves!
HKP3M8SAa: Mentat : Once again, the Sardaukar crusade against the Tleilaxu presents us with an opportunity. Destroy the Tleilaxu storage base and Sardaukar reinforcements should pour in!  We shall then use them to take this territory!
HKP3M8SAb: Tleilaxu : We see your plans within plans, Harkonnen.  We know of the Sardaukar proposals.  Give up this fight, and you might not share their fate in the depths of our Flesh Vats.
HKP3M8SAc: Mentat : You have destroyed the Tleilaxu. The Sardaukar will join our assault against the enemy!
HKP3M8SAd: Tleilaxu : You have destroyed our base here, but we have others!  Your involvement will not be forgotten!
HKP3M8SAe: Mentat : Sardaukar Troopers have arrived to support us.  Burn the enemy out!
HKP3M9IXa: Mentat : Our tracking stations report unusual activity.  We may have located the Ixian Scientists!
HKP3M9Ixb: Ixian : We are all that's left of an Ixian research team.   We were witness to strange events in the deep desert.  A group of Tleilaxu Frigates transporting large amounts of unusual scientific equipment. We have never seen the likes of it.  We were spotted, and set upon by Tleilaxu Contaminators and Leeches.  We barely escaped with our lives.
HKP3M9Ixc: Ixian : The Suboid slaves and our vehicles…They've been infected by the Tleilaxu!
HKP3M9IXbb: Ixian : Don't shoot!  We've been out here for days.  Most of our team was lost.  Some died of thirst, others were devoured by sandstorms and worms.  We are all that's left of an Ixian research team.  We witnessed some suspicious activity in the desert and barely escaped with our lives.  Even now, I fear we are being tracked!  Will your base give us asylum?  If you shelter us, we will share what we have seen.   We were attacked and had to flee for our lives.  Even now, I fear they are tracking us.  If your base grants us asylum, we will tell you more.
HKP3M10FRa: Mentat : Find out what the Fremen are doing in this region.
HKP3M10FRb: Mentat : A group of Fremen has entered the region.
HKP3M10FRc: Tleilaxu:  We shall remember this insult, unbeliever.  The time shall come when you regret your foolish actions.
HKP3M10FRd: Fremen : Once we have dealt with these abominations, we shall destroy you too.
HKP3M10FRe: Mentat : The Tleilaxu appear to have been wiped out.  The Fremen warriors seem more than a match for the Tleilaxu biological weapons.  The way is now open.  Take this territory for House Harkonnen!
HKP3M10FRf: Mentat : This is our fight Harkonnen!   Do not interfere!
HKP3M10FRg: Tleilaxu:  We are under attack by these desert vermin, and we shall fight them alone.  Do not interfere with this holy battle.
HKP3M10FRh: Mentat : There appear to be no Fremen left in the area.  The Tleilaxu are victorious and are busy gathering corpses.   Attack the enemy base!
HKP3M10FRi: Tleilaxu:  Now you shall pay for your interference, you will die in our Flesh Vats
HKP3M11TLa: Mentat : A Tleilaxu researcher has fled their base.  The Tleilaxu have asked for his death.  This is a minor part of your mission here.  The priority is the conquest of the territory!
HKP3M11TLb: Tleilaxu Deserter : I know many secrets.  I will share them with you, in return for your protection.
HKP3M11TLc: Mentat : The Tleilaxu are pleased that the scientist was killed.  They have sent a reward.  Use it to ensure victory!
HKP3M11TLd: Mentat : The Tleilaxu are not pleased.  Their presence here was revealed before the scientist was killed.  Their opinion is of little concern, however.  Only the capture of the territory matters!
HKP3M11TLe: Tleilaxu:  Why are you protecting our enemy?  We will kill him ourselves, and anything that tries to interfere with us shall be destroyed.
HKP3M11TLf: Tleilaxu:  Why have you not tracked down the traitor yet?  We shall kill him ourselves.
HKP3M11TLg: Mentat : Commander, wiping out the Tleilaxu strike force may have been a mistake.  We shall see.
HKP3M12TLa: Mentat : The Tleilaxu deserters are entering the territory.  Make sure they get back to the base in safety!
HKP3M12TLb: Tleilaxu Deserter : The Bene Tleilax want to kill us all!  The experiment… it is an unholy abomination!   Sanctuary, we beg of you!
HKP3M12TLc: Mentat : The Tleilaxu have sent a squad of their creations to attack us.  They have discovered that we are harboring the defectors.
HKP3M12TLbb: Tleilaxu Deserter : You must protect us!   The Tleilaxu experiment… it will destroy us all!  They are coming.  Give us sanctuary. We beg you!
HKP3M13SMa: Mentat : Find the smuggler Starport and punish the occupants!
HKP3M13SMb: Smuggler : Please!   We don't want any more trouble.  There are more deliveries scheduled.  You could take them!  If you kill us, there will be no more supplies coming through!
HKP3M13SMc: Smuggler : Take the supplies!  Just, please... don't kill us!  There's another delivery coming. If we don't call in, it will be cancelled.  We won't deal with your enemies any more, rest assured!   I'm sure they'll be furious.  They'll probably try to kill us!  Will you help to protect us?
HKP3M13SMd: Smuggler : In the future, perhaps WE could do business.
HKP3M13SMe: Mentat : You'll not receive any deliveries, now that the smuggler Starport has been destroyed.
HKP3M13SMf: Mentat : There will be no more free deliveries.  There are no smugglers left to call them in!
HKP3M13SMx: Mentat : We won't get any more free deliveries, courtesy of the enemy.  The smuggler's Starport has been captured!
HKP1D1FRa: Mentat : A group of Fremen are assisting the enemy.  This is a decisive battle.  They must not stand in the way of Harkonnen victory!
HKP1D3FRa: Mentat : We have recruited a group of exiled Fremen bandits who are now sworn to fight under your command.
HKP1D3FRb: Mentat : Fremen have been seen entering this area.  We believe they intend to attack.  Apparently they are not pleased with our harboring of Fremen exiles.
HKP1D4SAa: Mentat : The Sardaukar have given you a squad of their troops to command.  Make good use of them.
HKP1D5SAa: Mentat : The Sardaukar are attacking a Fremen camp in this territory.  It might be prudent to assist them.
HKP1D5SAb: Mentat : A squad of Sardaukar have arrived.
HKP1D5SAc: Mentat : The Sardaukar are attacking the Fremen.  How amusing, to watch these desert vermin suffer!
HKP1D5SAd: Mentat : Another group of Fremen have arrived to reinforce their defenses.
HKP1D5SAe: Mentat : The Fremen camp has been destroyed.  The few who survive are little threat.  They cannot harm us, or the Sardaukar, now.
HKP1D5SAf: Mentat : The Fremen camp and its guardians are destroyed.  The Sardaukar will surely aid us against our enemies now!
HKP1D7HKa: Mentat : Destroy this town as an example for the rest of Arrakis.  They will speak of the event in hushed whispers, for years to come.  And when they do, they will remember the strength of House Harkonnen!
HKP1D7HKb: Mentat : Destroy the rest of the town.
HKP1D7HKc: Mentat : The town is destroyed.  Now crush our enemies and take the region!
HKP1D7HKd: Mentat : The column of Atreides are rushing to the scene, in a feeble effort to save the town.  They are so utterly predictable.  They can die with their friends.
HKP1D8HKa: Mentat : Use the convoy to attack the enemy base.
HKP1D8HKb: Mentat : The convoy has entered the area. Good hunting, Commander!
HKP1D8HKc: Mentat : The enemy has detected the hidden explosives.  We'll have to trust to luck that they succeed.  Use this as a distraction, to cover for an attack of your own.
HKP1D9GNa: Mentat : The Sardaukar have prevented reinforcements from reaching the enemy.
HKP1D14FRa: Mentat : Make an example of these Fremen.
HKP1D14FRb: Fremen : The citizens must be protected!   There are children here!
HKP1D14FRc: Mentat : Give them cause to regret their actions against us!
HKP1D16GNa: Mentat : There are a group of civilians coming to buy the confiscated goods.  Don't kill them.
HKP1D16GNb: Mentat : These funds will help greatly in our efforts to defend this territory
HKP1D18GNa: Mentat : The crashed Carryall will be found somewhere in the area being flashed on your radar screen.  Find its contents and use them as you see fit.
HKP1D18GNb: Mentat : If you can't find the crash site in the area indicated, we must assume that the enemy got there first.  We are disappointed, Commander!
HKP2D1HKa: Mentat : We need more slaves!  Take the Fremen alive.
HKP2D1HKb: Fremen : Death to the Harkonnen devils!
HKP2D1HKc: Mentat : We will teach these vermin some manners!
HKP2D1HKe: Mentat : Fremen have been detected in this region.
HKP2D2aHKa: Copec Harkonnen : Commander.  As a reward for your loyalty, you will receive reinforcements.  A number of additional units will be assigned to your current defensive action.
HKP2D2bHKa: Gunseng Harkonnen : Well done!  If you continue to act on my behalf, you can expect to retain my favor.  In the coming days, you'll find this a great advantage.  But do not betray me, Commander.  I will show you pain, as you have never imagined! I have assigned a number of additional units for your current defensive action.  No need to thank me, Commander.  But one day, I will ask for a favor, and you will obey without question.  Do we have an understanding?  I hope so.
HKP2D3IXa: Mentat : We have taken advantage of Ixian goodwill to purchase a number of their vehicles at a discount.  Some of these are now available for your use.  Defend our territory!
HKP2D4IXa: Mentat : The Ixians have sent additional units to thank us for our show of restraint.  The cowards seek to bribe us!
HKP2D4TLa: Mentat : The Tleilaxu are sending us a number of units in payment for the killing of the Ixian researcher.
HKP2D4TLb: Mentat : The Tleilaxu units have arrived.
HKP2D5bSAa: Mentat : The Sardaukar have sworn to attack us.  The Tleilaxu will aid in our defense.
HKP2D5bSAb: Mentat : A force of Tleilaxu units has arrived.
HKP2D5bSAc: Mentat : The Imperial Sardaukar are attacking!
HKP2D5SAa: Mentat : The Tleilaxu interference will make this a difficult battle, but the Sardaukar have promised their assistance.
HKP2D5SAb: Mentat : A squad of Sardaukar have arrived to support our defenses.
HKP2D5SAc: Mentat : Tleilaxu units have been detected on the battlefield.
HKP2D10IXa: Mentat : The Ixians have built a Research center in your base as a reward for escorting their convoy.
HKP2D11TLa: Mentat : Use the Tleilaxu units to wipe out the village.  Then take these units and wipe out the enemy!
HKP2D11TLb: Mentat : The civilians will pay for their deceit.  The Tleilaxu will slaughter them to the last man!
HKP2D11TLc: Mentat : The town has been destroyed.  Now attack the enemy!
HKP2D12SMa: Mentat : The Smugglers have promised to send us compensation for stealing our harvesters.
HKP2D12SMb: Mentat : A harvester has entered the area.  It is a gift from the smugglers, as promised.
HKP2D12SMc: Mentat : Treachery!  The harvester was a suicide bomb.
HKP2D12SMd: Smuggler : Don't attack.  This unit is a gift for House Harkonnen. Allow us to take it to your base.
HKP2D12SMe: Mentat : Commander, scans reveal the possible presence of explosives on that harvester. Destroy it if you consider it a risk.
HKP2D12SMf: Mentat : The harvester was a Trojan horse!  It contained enough explosives to cause us considerable damage.  You were right to suspect it, Commander.
HKP2D13IXa: Mentat : House IX has repaid us for the spice you delivered in your recent offensive action.
HKP2D13IXb: Mentat : A group of Ixian units have entered the region and are heading for our base.  Beware, Commander.  This seems rather suspicious.
HKP2D13IXc: Ixian Commander : Accept this Ixian technology as repayment for our debt.  These units are now under your command.
HKP2D16IXa: Mentat : The Ixians have delivered a number of units in return for our assistance.
HKP2D16IXb: Mentat : A convoy has entered the area.  They claim to bear gifts from the Ixians, and ask that we receive them.
HKP2D16IXc: Mentat : We have lost communication with the Ixian convoy.  This might be a result of enemy jamming.  You must investigate!
HKP2D16IXd: Mentat : The convoy vehicles are transforming into Tleilaxu Leeches!  Defend yourself, Commander!
HKP2D16IXe: Mentat : Excellent, Commander!  The Tleilaxu's surprise attack has failed.
HKP2D17TLa: Mentat : Kill the Ixian agent.  The Tleilaxu will reward us.
HKP2D17TLb: Ixian : What do you want?  Leave me alone!
HKP2D17TLc: Mentat : The Tleilaxu will deliver the bounty.
HKP2D17TLd: Mentat : The Tleilaxu bounty has arrived.  Make good use of it, Commander.
HKP2D18TLa: Mentat : The Tleilaxu Ambassador is expecting to meet his official escort.  Kill him before he reaches them!
HKP2D18TLb: Mentat : The Ambassador suspects something.  He is on the move.
HKP2D18TLc: Soldier : The Ambassador has been located, Commander.
HKP2D18TLd: Mentat : The ambassador is dead.  The bounty will be claimed for House Harkonnen!
HKP2D18TLe: Mentat : The Ambassador has reached his escort.  Kill them all!
HKP2D18TLf: Mentat : The Tleilaxu have mobilized a rescue force.
HKP2D18TLg: Tleilaxu : So!  Do the Harkonnen play both sides against the middle?   How dare you attack a representative of the Landsraad?
HKP2D20TLa: Mentat : The Sardaukar are enraged by your successful defense of the Tleilaxu base.  They will almost certainly mount an attack.  Prepare your defenses!
HKP2D20TLb: Mentat : A large force of Sardaukar approaches.  We have been in contact with the Tleilaxu.  They are sending reinforcements to aid us.
HKP2D20TLc: Mentat : The Tleilaxu reinforcements may arrive too late!  The Sardaukar are attacking!
HKP2D20TLd: Soldier : The Tleilaxu have arrived, sir.  Their Contaminator units have already infected many of the Sardaukar attackers.  The attack column should be easily defeated.
HKP2D20TLe: Mentat : The Sardaukar have been destroyed.  The remaining Contaminators are now under our control.
HKP2D20TLf: Mentat : The Sardaukar are dead, and the Contaminators have been destroyed.
HKP2D21TLa: Mentat : We have reports of reinforcements heading towards the Fremen camp.  Find the camp and destroy it!
HKP2D21TLb: Ghola : We are ghola.  We are ordered to join with you.
HKP2D21TLc: Ghola : We are under your command.
HKP2D21TLd: Mentat : The Fremen have unmasked the gholas, and destroyed them all.
HKP2D21TLe: Mentat : Gholas have infiltrated the fremen camp!
HKP2D21TLf: Mentat : The ghola have completed their mission.  The Fremen camp is reduced to rubble.  Rendezvous with the gholas.  They may prove useful.
HKP2D21TLg: Mentat : A band of Fremen natives have entered this area.
HKP2D21TLh: Fremen : Harkonnen ghaflas!  We should have expected this ghola trickery!
HKP3D1TLa: Mentat : The Tleilaxu scientist you liberated has been transferred to this territory.  Unfortunately, the Tleilaxu have dispatched squads of assassins to eliminate him.  He must be protected!
HKP3D1TLb: Mentat : The Tleilaxu scientist's transport vehicle has been sabotaged.  It is rigged with explosives!   We cannot disarm it, and we suspect that it can be triggered by a short-range transmission.  It is imperative that you do not allow any Tleilaxu to approach the transport!
HKP3D1TLc: Mentat : A squad of Tleilaxu creations draws near!   Prevent them from approaching the transport!
HKP3D1TLd: Mentat : You have failed!  That scientist was vital to our plans!
HKP3D2TLc: Mentat : The Fremen are defeated. Now, the enemy can be swept aside!
HKP3D2TLd: Mentat : You must ensure that victory is achieved in this region!
HKP3D2TLe: Mentat : The Fremen have lost control of their battle crazed warriors.  They are attacking the enemy.  Use the distraction to destroy both factions!
HKP3D3TLa: Mentat : Watch for Tleilaxu units.  Defeat the enemy!
HKP3D3TLb: Mentat : The enemy will soon be attacked by the Tleilaxu!
HKP3D3TLc: Mentat : The Tleilaxu have attacked the enemy!
HKP3D3TLd: Mentat : The Tleilaxu are in retreat from the enemy!
HKP3D3TLf: Mentat : The Tleilaxu threat is receding.  Concentrate on the enemy!
HKP3D3TLh: Mentat : We must be sure there is no remaining contamination.  Sterilize the area.  Kill every living thing you find!
HKP3D4TLa: Mentat : The Tleilaxu have paid us for our assistance in an experiment performed on this sandworm.  A share has been added to your battle funds.
HKP3D5HKa: Mentat : Our scientists have produced replica Sonic Tanks.  They are now under your command.
HKP3D8SAa: Mentat : The Sardaukar have promised us their aid during this battle.
HKP3D8SAb: Mentat : Sardaukar have arrived to support you.
HKP3D9IXa: Mentat : We are picking up incoming Ixian units.  Repel them!
HKP3D9IXb: Mentat : You have failed to protect the Ixian deserter.  We will be unable to interrogate him!
HKTutorialA: Mentat : The troops are yours to command!
HKTutorialB: Mentat : There is a beacon to the northeast of your position, near an enemy outpost.  Move your troops to the beacon site and await further instructions.
HKTutorialD: Mentat : The enemy are blinded!  A Mobile Construction Vehicle has been dispatched.  Move the MCV onto the rock your troops have secured and deploy it.
HKTutorialE: Mentat : Now you can build other base structures.
HKTutorialF: Mentat : Build an Outpost to get radar coverage of the area.
HKTutorialF2: Mentat : Now build a Windtrap.  These structures generate the power that your base will require.
HKTutorialG: Mentat : Now that you have power, build a Refinery and a Barracks.
HKTutorialH: Mentat : The refinery contains a Carryall and Harvester.  Harvesters collect the Baron's spice and return it to the refinery for purification. In battle, spice is the key to the flow of money, and will allow you to contract additional buildings and increase the size of your forces.  If a harvester is destroyed, a replacement will be sent.
HKTutorialI: Mentat : The barracks are completed.  Additional troops may now be trained.  We recommend that you train some additional Light Infantry.  You have enough scouts, at present.
HKTutorialJ: Mentat : Enemy troops are approaching!  Send a scout to the beacon on the northern end of this rock outcropping.  Have him watch for the enemy.
HKTutorialK: Mentat : Wormsign!   Giant Sandworms are in the area.  Traveling on the sand would be dangerous, now. Wait on the rock, for the Ordos to approach.  Do not send any troops to meet the enemy!
HKTutorialL: Mentat : The Fremen bandits call the largest of the sand worms Shai-Hulud.   When wormsign is reported, you must be sure that any vital troops are on solid rock! Worms do not linger in one place, and this one should soon be leaving.  Wait for the all-clear!
HKTutorialM: Mentat : Some of the Ordos survived the worm's attack.  Prepare to annihilate them!
HKTutorialN: Mentat : The attackers are dead.   You will soon be ready to destroy the enemy base!
HKTutorialO: Mentat : The worm has gone.  Select your forces and send them to the beacon, east of your base.
HKTutorialP: Mentat : The depression in the sand is a dustbowl.  Its shifting sands will trap anything that enters it.  Be cautious.  Travel to the beacon, south-east of here.
HKTutorialQ: Mentat : This broken rock is impassable to vehicles.   Remember this!  It can be used to hide troops, to protect against incoming fire, and to create ambushes to surprise the enemy.
HKTutorialR: Mentat : The enemy is located to the north-east.  Destroy their base!
HKTutorialS: Mentat : Attack the enemy!  Destroy their buildings and kill everyone you find!
HKTutorialT: Mentat : The Ordos have deployed two vehicles - a Dust Scout and a Laser Tank!  Both vehicles carry heavy weapons, and the Laser Tank has a shield generator. Reinforcements will arrive!  Use the missile tank and assault tank to regain the advantage.  Crush the infantry under their wheels, then destroy the vehicles!
HKTutorialU: Mentat : Without their construction yard they will be unable to rebuild!   Level the base!
HHKmoremen: Mentat : Opposition is a bit stronger than we anticipated.  Use these additional troops.
HHKdirections: Mentat : There is a frigate on the other side of the double gate!
HHKuLoser: Mentat : There is only one punishment for failure...
HHKcongrats: Mentat : The baron is delighted with your success, Commander!
HHKKillKill: Mentat : Destroy all the enemy frigates!  Kill everyone you find!
HHKGUwarning: Guild Navigator : Attention. Attention. All combatants are in direct violation of the Great Convention.  Guild Law must be upheld.  You will cease hostilities immediately. If you fail to comply, all frigates in this section will be jettisoned into deep space. Countdown to decompression now commencing…
HHKairloks: Guild Navigator : Warning. Warning. Cargo ejection sequence commencing. Return to your vessels or face the consequences of your actions.
HKEndmissionWin: Mentat : The Guild and the Tleilaxu are defeated.  House Harkonnen rules the Imperium!
HKEndMissionC: Mentat : Destroy the Worm Creature before it wakes!
HKEndMissionD: Mentat : That Emperor worm's development depends upon the spice.  Destroy the Guild Harvesters and buy our forces more time!
HKEndMissionE: Mentat : The enemy has constructed additional harvesters! The creature will gain consciousness soon.  Destroy it, quickly!
HKEndMission00: Mentat : You have delayed the Creatures awakening.  Now, finish it!  Victory is within our grasp.
HKEndMissionLose: Mentat : You have failed us!  The creature is awake.  Our doom is at hand!
ORP1M1FRMini: There is a Fremen encampment in this territory
ORP1M2ATMini: There is Fremen activity in this region.
ORP1M3SAMini: There is a Sardaukar base in this region.
ORP1M4HKMini: There is Sardaukar activity in this region.
ORP1M5FRMini: There are Fremen in this region.
ORP1M6SAMini: There are Sardaukar in this region.
ORP1M9GNMini: The conditions here are unusually hostile.
ORP1M10GNMini: This territory is suitable for the transport of supplies.
ORP1M11HKMini: The morale of the Harkonnen in this region is low.
ORP1M12FRMini: There is a Fremen encampment in this region.
ORP1M14GNMini: Our reports indicate that smuggling factions are active in this region.
ORP1M15SAMini: There is Sardaukar activity in this region
ORP1M16GNMB: This territory was once home to a Smuggler base.
ORP2M4ORMini: Our intelligence services have a keen interest in this region.
ORP2M5SMMini: The smuggling factions in this region have aligned themselves with our enemies
ORP2M6TLMini: The Tleilaxu have taken an interest in this region.
ORP2M7Ixmb: There is an Ixian base in this region.
ORP2M8GNmb: This territory was once home to a Smuggler base.
ORP2M9TLmb: There is a civilian town in this region.
ORP2M10IxMini: A number of Ixian scientists are stranded.
ORP2M11IxMini: There is Ixian activity in this region.
ORP2M12TLMini: There is Tleilaxu activity in this region.
ORP2M13SMMini: The smugglers are not acting logically.
ORP2M14IxMini: There is an Ixian base here
ORP2M15IxMini: The Ixians in this region have a proposal for House Ordos.
ORP2M17IxMini: There is Ixian activity in this region.
ORP2M18TLMB: There are reports of Tleilaxu units in this region.
ORP2M19TLMini: There is Tleilaxu activity in this region.
ORP2M20IxMini: An Ixian base lends support to the enemy.
ORP2M21TLMini: A Tleilaxu base is under attack.
ORP2M22TLMini: A Tleilaxu base is under attack by the native Fremen.
ORP3M1TLMini: There is a Tleilaxu base in this territory
ORP3M2TLMini: A Tleilaxu convoy will pass through this region .
ORP3M3HKMini: We have been making concerted intelligence efforts in this territory.
ORP3M4SMMini: The smuggling faction is being attacked by the Tleilaxu
ORP3M5FRMini: We wish to contact the Fremen in this region.
ORP3M6SAMini: Sardaukar forces are engaging the Tleilaxu in this region.
ORP3M7TLMini: A Tleilaxu envoy in this territory requests a meeting
ORP3M8IxMini: The Ixians request that we turn our attention to this region.
ORP3M9IxMini: The Ixians would like to bring your attention to this region.
ORP3M10TLmb: A forward outpost in this territory has terminated communication.
ORP3M11FRmb: Fremen raids have been initiated from  this territory.
ORP3M12ATMini: A ghola bioform is stranded in this territory.
ORP3M13IxMini: Ixian distress signals have been detected.
ORP3M14FRMini: The Fremen are searching this region.
ORP3M15TLMini: The Tleilaxu are showing interest in this region.
ORP3M16TLMini: Tleilaxu in this region have contacted us.
ORP3M17SMMini: There is a Smuggler base in this region.
ORP1M1FR: House Atreides has re-established diplomatic ties with the Fremen natives.  These relations are both tenuous and vulnerable. We have procured ghola bioform likenesses of Atreides troops.  Use these to attack the Fremen.  We wish the news of this attack to be widely disseminated, in the interest of propaganda.  Allow some Fremen to escape. Capture the territory for House Ordos.  That is the imperative.  All other objectives are secondary.
ORP1M2AT: We wish to disrupt the alliance between our enemies.  Toward this end, you have been allocated gholas of Fremen warriors.  Use them to attack the Atreides base. The Atreides battle plan will be disrupted.  This will weaken them.  You will acquire their territory and its spice.
ORP1M3SA: Harkonnen forces are strong in this region.  They must be weakened if the territory is to be captured.  Ghola bioform likenesses of Harkonnen troops should be used to provoke the Sardaukar forces based here. We predict an immediate response.  This will allow us to capture the territory more efficiently.
ORP1M4HK: House Harkonnen seeks an alliance with the Imperial Sardaukar.  This alliance may pose a threat to our expansion. A Sardaukar ghola has been obtained to assist in the capture of this territory .  He will lead the Sardaukar against our enemy.  They will deliver the territory to us.
ORP1M5FR: Fremen simplicity will be used to acquire this territory.  At great expense, a Ghola bioform of a Fremen Prophet has been created.  Infiltrate the Fremen settlement and deliver the ghola.  Our strategists believe the ghola may persuade the Fremen to join our battle.  The ghola must be protected.  Ensure that our efforts are not squandered.  Capture the territory.  That is the imperative.
ORP1M6SA: The Sardaukar base is an obstacle to our plans for this area.  We shall use it to our advantage. Use the ghola to assume command of their base.  Their loyalty ensures our success.  Capture the territory for House Ordos.  That is the directive.
ORP1M9GN: Enemy troops in this territory are suffering from a viral outbreak.  The virus spreads due to lack of medical equipment.  Enemy command is attempting to rectify the situation.  A medical vehicle, guarded by  mercenary Sardaukar deserters, has been dispatched. The vehicle contains an anti-serum.  Prevent the supply from reaching the enemy.  Capture the territory.  Failure is not an option.
ORP1M10GN: Windstorms prevent our supply frigates from reaching our forward outposts.  Supplies are dwindling.  Emergency rations must be transported by land. Your attack will serve as a distraction.  The convoy's journey is timed to coincide with your offensive.  It must reach its destination.   That is the directive.
ORP1M11HK: Harkonnen troops have defected.  They seek asylum with House Ordos.  They may have useful information.  We will interrogate them further.  You are to assist the Harkonnen defectors in their bid for freedom.  They will provide us with Harkonnen intelligence, or be terminated.  Do not fail to capture the territory.  That is our primary objective.
ORP1M12FR: A Fremen encampment is located in this territory.  They will attack any approaching unit.  They are of no use to us.  Do not approach them. Conflict with the Fremen would be inefficient.  Concentrate on capturing this region.  That is the imperative.
ORP1M13OR: Intelligence reveals an abandoned refinery in this region.   Reactivation of the facility would be an advantage. An engineer has been assigned to your force. Repair the refinery.  Use its resources to ensure the capture of this territory.  Failure is not an option.
ORP1M14GN: A trade caravan approaches this territory.  It is believed to be a cover for a smuggling faction. Inspect it for contraband.  Commandeer the convoy if contraband is discovered.  Then proceed with the capture of the territory.  That is our primary objective.
ORP1M15SA: Sardaukar are based in this region.  Their commander opposes any alliance with House Ordos.  This is unacceptable.  The Sardaukar commander's patrol will arrive soon.  Your attack is timed to coincide with its arrival.  Terminate him and his troops before additional Sardaukar arrive. His death will be blamed on others.  Manufactured evidence will be planted to ensure this.  His termination will ensure our conquest of this territory.
ORP1M16GN: The weather patterns work in our favor.  Dust storms cover our advance towards this territory.   There is a complication.  Additional airborne reinforcements have become disoriented by the storm.  These reinforcements must get through.   An abandoned smuggler outpost has been detected ahead of your forces.  Reactivate it. The reinforcements will use the signal to rendezvous with you.  Utilize them to capture the region.  That is the directive.
ORP2M4OR: We have observed an enemy agent in our midst.  His presence has been tolerated.  We hoped to learn more about our enemy's intelligence strategy by observing his activity.  He suspects our intentions and has escaped.  Capture him alive.  We wish to interrogate him to extract further information.  Do not permit this to distract you from your main objective.  Capture the territory.  Failure is not an option.
ORP2M5SM: Smuggling factions in this region give aid to the enemy.  They supply fighting units in return for protection - a common arrangement. A demonstration of power is necessary.  Destroy their base and kill its occupants.  Then proceed with your conquest of the territory.  That is the primary objective.
ORP2M6TL: Your capture of this territory may be complicated by external influences.  The Tleilaxu wish to acquire Sardaukar genetic material.  They have sent forces here to retrieve it. They will pay for our assistance in this matter.  Their cooperation may prove valuable in our capture of this area
ORP2M7Ix: The Ixians have a manufacturing base in this territory.  Production is maintained by a slave race known as Suboids. The Suboids have been incited to revolt by unknown forces.  The Ixians are trapped.  They will pay for our assistance.  The Ixians are frightened and rich.  They will pay well.  Their money will allow you to acquire this territory for House Ordos.
ORP2M8GN: Dust storms have covered our advance towards this territory.  This will help in its capture.  However, extra airborne reinforcements sent to you have become disorientated in the storm.  Reactivate a Smuggler outpost that has been detected ahead of your forces.  Your reinforcements will use the signal to rendezvous with you.  Once they have arrived, use them to capture the region.
ORP2M9TL: The Tleilaxu have provided examples of their technology for assessment . Do not engage the enemy with them until their capabilities have been proven. There is a civilian town in this area.  This will provide a safe testing ground.  Use the Tleilaxu weapons to convert the town's inhabitants into additional forces. Whatever the result of these tests, this territory must be taken.  Our advance must be maintained.
ORP2M10Ix: Ixian scientists have been stranded in this territory.  The Ixians will pay us for safe passage.  Do not let this distract you from the objective.  Annex this area.  That is the imperative.
ORP2M11Ix: Ixian elite have arrived on Arrakis.  A convoy carrying their chief researchers will pass through this area. House Ix has asked for our protection.  It is highly probable that the enemy will attack the convoy.  Protect the Ix. Repulse any attack.  When the convoy leaves the area, capture the region.  Failure is not an option.
ORP2M12TL: A Tleilaxu convoy will pass through this territory in the near future.  The vehicles carry religious relics. They must be protected to fulfill our contract with the Tleilaxu.  Victory is still the prime directive.  Do not commit too many forces to escort duty.
ORP2M13SM: Smugglers have been hijacking our harvesters.   One such theft is taking place at this moment.   We are tracking them.  The crime must not go unpunished.  Find them and dispose of them, then defeat the enemy.  That is the directive.
ORP2M14Ix: An Ixian base has lost its harvesters.  They require spice.  They offer units in exchange.  This seems cost-effective.  Take advantage of their offer, then carry out your prime objective - elimination of any resistance in this territory.
ORP2M15Ix: House Ix wishes to test their new units under battle conditions.  We will oblige them.  Take note of their performance and tactical advantages.  If they prove efficient, we may acquire more.
ORP2M16Ix: The Ixians have offered a bounty. A Tleilaxu Face Dancer fled into the desert.  It has been traced to this territory.  It is predicted to be hiding in the enemy base.  Ensure that the spy is eliminated during the capture of this territory.
ORP2M17Ix: Ixian scientists have set up experiments in this territory.  The coming battle will endanger them.  They insist they will not leave their research. House Ix requires us to resupply their scientists.  They promise support if we carry out this task.  This should not interfere with the capture of the territory.
ORP2M18TL: The Tleilaxu manufacturing base in this region has been destroyed.  Experiments have escaped into the desert. Destroy these rogue Tleilaxu units on sight.  They must not interfere with the capture of this region.
ORP2M19TL: The Tleilaxu have contacted the Landsraad.  They claim there is an Ixian base in the area.  They allege that the Ixians are carrying out illegal research at this base -- research that violates the edict against the creation of thinking machines.  The Landsraad commands us to assist in the search for this base. We have been directed to provide an escort.  Comply with this directive, so long as it does not jeopardize the conquest of this territory.
ORP2M20Ix: The Ixian base in this territory supplies units to the enemy.  These units are powerful.  They must be delivered.  Capture the Ixian base.  Prevent the units being manufactured.  If this proves too difficult, destroy the Ixians along with the enemy.
ORP2M21TL: The Tleilaxu are pleading for assistance.  Their local base has come under attack from a Sardaukar column.  The enemy aids the Sardaukar in this attack. High Command has determined that House Ordos must defend the Tleilaxu.  We must set an example.  The Sardaukar must witness the results of dealing with our enemies.  If the Tleilaxu fall, we must still face the Sardaukar and the enemy to take this region.
ORP2M22TL: A Tleilaxu base is been under siege by the Fremen.  Our assault is their only hope for escape.  They are deploying a rescue column but require our assistance. Fremen resistance will be fierce.  Take proper precautions.  Do not jeopardize the capture of the region.
ORP3M1TL: Recent developments require a new approach to the Tleilaxu.  The incident on our Homeworld may not have been an accident. It seems the Bene Tleilax have their own agenda in this war.  This was not foreseen.  We must know their motives to calculate a response. You have been assigned a scout equipped with listening devices.  Find the Tleilaxu base in this territory and intercept their communications.  Information is vital.  Victory is imperative.
ORP3M2TL: Recent events have caused tension between House Ordos and the Tleilaxu.  They have refused to supply gholas to our forces.  This is not a logical step for the Tleilaxu. Gholas are key to Ordos success.  The Tleilaxu refusal is not acceptable.  You are approaching an unarmed Tleilaxu supply convoy. Capture the vehicles.  Take the gholas they contain and replenish our supplies.  However, the territory must be captured as a priority.  Failure is not an option.
ORP3M3HK: Ordos strategy is succeeding.  The proliferation of Ghola infiltrators and assassins have lowered morale in this territory.  The defenders should not stand against you for long.
ORP3M4SM: The territory is ready for conquest.  It will fall to House Ordos.  There is other business in this territory that must be dealt with as well. The Tleilaxu are attacking a Smuggler base under our protection.  To ensure our income from other bases, we must protect the Smugglers.  Ordos success is imperative.
ORP3M5FR: Tleilaxu forces are planning to attack a Fremen sietch.  Inform the Fremen.  Give them the opportunity to defend themselves. The Tleilaxu are not immune from treachery.  Remember, the capture of the territory is our priority.
ORP3M6SA: The Tleilaxu have been stealing Sardaukar corpses and civilian specimens for their flesh vats.  The Sardaukar have sworn a blood feud against them. House Ordos can make use of their growing hatred.  A Tleilaxu convoy is passing through this territory.  Destroy it, and its guards! The Sardaukar will repay the service.  Tleilaxu blood will buy the Sardaukar cooperation.  The Sardaukar will give us the territory.
ORP3M7TL: The territory ahead is fortified and well-provisioned.  The Tleilaxu offer a gift - a 'peace offering.'  We will accept their gift.  The Tleilaxu units are now available for use in the attack. The territory should fall.  Do not trust the Tleilaxu.  Watch their units carefully.
ORP3M8Ix: The Ixians request assistance.  They wish to gain technical information on Atreides technology. Capture an enemy supply convoy.   Allow the Ixians to perform their research on the captured vehicles. When this is done, the Ixians will disable the security devices on the vehicles and they will be ours.  These will help in the capture of the territory.
ORP3M9Ix: The Ixians request assistance.  They wish to gain technical information on Harkonnen technology.  Capture an enemy vehicle supply convoy.   Allow the Ixians to perform their research.  Once they have finished, the Ixians will disable the security devices on the vehicles and they will be ours.  These will help in the capture of the territory.
ORP3M10TL: The territory ahead has been covertly monitored for signs of weakness.  There are few signs, as yet.  We have lost communication with our forward outposts. This may be inefficiency or enemy action.  As part of your duties in this attack, you are to investigate this loss of contact.  Bring the outpost back on-line.
ORP3M11FR: One of our Fremen Gholas has malfunctioned.  It was inserted into a Fremen settlement, disguised as a prophet.  It's mission was to ferment resistance to our enemies, but now it has now declared a jihad against all off worlders. This will hinder an Ordos victory.  It is unacceptable.  Destroy the ghola and end the resistance to House Ordos.
ORP3M12AT: One of our ghola agents has been uncovered.  It has stolen enemy weaponry to aid its escape. Find the ghola and take command of its units.  Use the units help your capture of this territory.
ORP3M13Ix: We have been contacted by Ixian scientists.  They wish to defect.  They would not disclose their location.  They believe that their communications are being monitored.   They are somewhere in this territory.  Find them, then defeat the enemy.  That is the directive.
ORP3M14FR: Fremen activity has risen in this area.  Large groups of warriors have been seen.  These could endanger the prime directive.  Failure is not an option.
ORP3M15TL: A Tleilaxu scientist has gone berserk and stolen a virus from their laboratory.  He must be eliminated before he can reach civilization and infect the population. The Tleilaxu concern is insincere.  There are other reasons they want him dead.  Once he has been found, capture the area as directed.
ORP3M16TL: We received a Distrans message from Tleilaxu scientists who wish to defect.  They have important information regarding the Tleilaxu.  Give them refuge.  We must interrogate them.
ORP3M17SM: Smugglers are supplying the enemy with stolen equipment.  Locate the Smuggler base and secure the contraband supplies. Keep a small guard nearby.  Do not let this distract you from the capture of this region for the Ordos.
ORENDGAME: The Navigator Emperor must be destroyed while it is still vulnerable.  This is the prime directive.  There are no other directives.  Failure is not an option.
ORP1D1FR: The Ghola attack was successful.  It has had the calculated effect.  Atreides-Fremen negotiations have faltered
ORP1D3SA: The Sardaukar attack the Harkonnen wherever they find them.  They have been warned of the incoming Harkonnen attack.  We expect them to assist us.
ORP1D5FR: A Fremen leader is marked for ghola replacement.  He is returning to his sietch after receiving medical attention from the Atreides.  He must not arrive. The ghola will be inserted at a later date.  This ghola will play a vital role in creating unrest among the fremen.  The leader must die.  Then the enemy can be defeated.  That is your directive.
ORP1D6SA: Our Ghola is established within the Sardaukar command structure.  We now control their local organization. We assisted in the construction of a Sardaukar base in this territory.  These Sardaukar will defend us against attack.
ORP1D9GN: Your destruction of the Vaccine supplies has resulted in catastrophic casualties in this region.  This attack is likely to be demoralized and under strength.  Now is the time to attack.
ORP1d11HK: Lost Harkonnen troops have been wandering through this territory for some time.  They can join us, or die of thirst.
ORP1D12FR: Recent Fremen activity is unacceptable.  Their leaders are meeting for a council of war.  This must be disrupted. Gholas will be used in the attack.  Remove any threat to Ordos control of this area.
ORP1D13OR: Increased production requires that we transport profits out of this territory.  Enemy action is heavy.  Air transport is not possible. A convoy will move through your area shortly.  It must not fall into enemy hands.  We must acquire this territory.  That is imperative.
ORP1D14GN: Local civilians wish to buy the confiscated goods.  Any means of raising funds is valid.  Sell the contraband.  Ensure that our profit margin is high.
ORP1D16GN: The Carryall crashed in this territory.  You will be shown its estimated position on your radar. Find the cargo before the enemy.  Then continue with the conquest of the region.
ORP2D4OR: More traitors have been identified through our interrogations.  Most have already been captured and their contracts terminated. Those remaining will attempt to reach the enemy.  They must be terminated by your forces.
ORP2D5SM: The Smugglers have been eliminated.  Other smuggler factions have increased deliveries to us, out of fear.  One such delivery has been diverted to you.
ORP2D6TL: The Tleilaxu require further material.  This material will be of low quality, and easily obtained. We have tolerated the presence of a settlement in this territory.  It will now serve as a resource, to re-supply the Tleilaxu.  Use Tleilaxu units to gather the material they require, and to increase your forces.  Then utilize those forces to destroy the enemy.  That is your directive.
ORP2D7Ix: Other Ixian outposts have suffered from Suboid revolution.  The insurrection is spreading. The Suboids are of no consequence to House Ordos.  Only our victory matters.  Failure is not an option.
ORP2d7TL: Our use of civilians to test Tleilaxu technology has angered the Atreides and the Fremen.  Eliminate all resistance.
ORP2D8GN: Further reinforcements are to be made available.  The enemy invasion must not succeed.
ORP2D9Ix: The Ixians have kept their word.  We have been supplied with units and resources as a payment for their lives.
ORP2D10Ix: In return for your protection of their leaders, the Ixians have constructed a Research Center at your base. Use it to build Ixian vehicles to assist you in battle.
ORP2D11Ix: In return for the protection of their leaders, the Ixians have constructed a Research Center at our base.  Use it to build Ixian vehicles to assist you in battle.
ORP2D12TL: The Tleilaxu have offered us a number of their creatures.  Test them to see how well they perform.
ORP2D12aGN: A supply convoy has passed through our front lines, and is now under our protection.  You can now construct additional reinforcements.
ORP2D12bGN: Without the supply convoy, we cannot build sufficient reinforcements.
ORP2D13SM: Smugglers are sending a delivery as recompense for our loss of the harvester.  They seek to re-establish a relationship.
ORP2D14Ix: The financial assistance given to the Ixians is to be repaid - with interest.
ORP2D15Ix: The Ixians are sending us a gift of cash in return for the assistance we gave them.
ORP2D17Ix: The Ixians are grateful for our support.
ORP2D20TL: The Sardaukar have become too strong.  They must be weakened to ensure Ordos success.  A plan has been developed. We will lead the Sardaukar into a trap, utilizing gholas supplied by the Tleilaxu.  The Sardaukar deaths will help House Ordos maintain the defense of this territory.
ORP2D21TL: The Tleilaxu are grateful for our previous help.  They will provide an additional force for our use against the enemy.  Be alert for Fremen resistance.
ORP2D22TL: Our ghola attacks across the planet have been successful.  Fremen hostility has increased against all the other houses. Leave them in isolation.  Do not approach the Settlement in this area.  Concentrate on defeating the invading enemy.
ORP3d1TL: The conflict between the Tleilaxu and Sardaukar continues.  A Sardaukar column has been separated from their command. They are lost in our territory.  Do not antagonize the Sardaukar command.  Do not let the enemy attack succeed.
ORP3D3HK: Acting on information received from the defectors, we have been able to capture a number of refugees.  Many of these have been conditioned to serve under Ordos command. They have been sent to your area.  They are useful, but disposable.
ORP3D4SM: The Smugglers will provide an extra payment to us.  Facilities must be built for their frigate to land.  There is a time limit, however.  The frigate must leave orbit soon to avoid detection.
ORP3D2TL: Your defense of this area grows more difficult.  Another convoy has been detected. It is undefended and will pass through your area shortly.  Capture it to obtain more gholas.
ORP3D5FR: Once warned, the Fremen were able to defend their sietch's from attack.  They are in our debt, and offer fighting men as payment. They will only fight in this battle, then return to their people.  Nothing will be gained by limiting their casualties.  Consider them expendable.
ORP3D6SA: In return for your strikes against Tleilaxu forces, the Sardaukar have granted you command of a Barracks in this territory.
ORP3D8Ix: The Ixians have created replica Atreides units from the parts in the convoy.  They have finished testing these replicas, and have given them to us.  Use them well.
ORP3D9Ix: The Ixians have constructed replica Harkonnen units from the parts in the convoy you captured.  They have finished testing these replicas.  They are now at our disposal.  Use them well, Commander.
ORP3D13Ix: We have the defector under guard in the Barracks.  We believe the Ixians will attempt to silence him.  Be vigilant.
ORP1M1FRWin: The Fremen leadership has been thrown into confusion by the attack.  They will not ally with the Atreides.
ORP1M1FRLose: Gholas are an expensive resource.  They should only be used for long term benefit.
ORP1M2ATWin: The Atreides were fooled by the gholas.  Their ties to the Fremen have been severed.
ORP1M2ATLose: Our plan to use the gholas was a good one.  Your execution of the plan was flawed.  Follow our orders!
ORP1M3SAWin: We believe the Sardaukar will seek retribution against the Harkonnen.  This will be to our advantage.  Unwittingly, they do our bidding.
ORP1M3SALose: Your use of the gholas was inefficient.  Long term benefits must be considered.
ORP1M4HKWin: The Harkonnen's hope for an alliance with the Sardaukar has been defeated.  Neither side suspects us.  Our deception was a success.
ORP1M4HKLose: The ghola troops have not been used as efficiently as they might have been.
ORP1M5FRWin: The ghola is in place and influence on the tribe is growing.  We expect the Fremen to supply aid to our war efforts in the near future. The situation may not last long.  Use their aid while you can.
ORP1M5FRLose: The ghola has failed.  We have no way to Fremen actions in the coming days.
ORP1M6SAWin: The Ghola has infiltrated the Sardaukar command structure.  It will ensure that we receive their aid.
ORP1M6SALose: The ghola could not infiltrate the Sardaukar.  We have provided for this eventuality.
ORP1M8GNWin: Intercepting the enemy supplies had the desired effect.  Without them the enemy could not hold the territory.
ORP1M8GNLose: Failing to intercept the supply vehicle has made your job more difficult.  Opportunities for easy victories cannot be squandered.
ORP1M9GNWin: Interdicting the enemy supplies has had the desired effect, Commander.  Without them the enemy could not hold the territory.
ORP1M9GNLose: Failing to interdict the supply vehicle made your job harder, Commander.  Opportunities for easy victories cannot be squandered.
ORP1M10GNWin: You protected the supply convoy from enemy attack.  The front line will hold.
ORP1M10GNLose: The supply convoy was destroyed through enemy action.  The lost equipment must be found elsewhere.
ORP1M11HKWin: The information from the defectors was useful.  Expect more deserters in the future.  The Harkonnen's brutality does not inspire loyalty.
ORP1M11HKLose: The deserters are dead.  Their information is lost, and must be obtained by other means.
ORP1M12FRWin: It was wise to refrain from an attack upon the Fremen.  Action would have been inefficient at this time.
ORP1M12FRLose: Your attack upon the Fremen has caused unnecessary conflict.  This strategy was inefficient.
ORP1M13ORWin: Reactivating the Refinery will increase productivity.  Productivity will increase your resources.  Those resources will be passed on to your forces.
ORP1M13ORLose: The engineer was not used to reactivate the refinery.  Why was the plan not followed?
ORP1M14GNWin: The smugglers have been captured.  Contraband was discovered, as predicted.
ORP1M14GNLose: No contraband was found.  Contraband was predicted.  The error must have been yours.
ORP1M15SAWin: The Sardaukar are easily manipulated.  They do not suspect our involvement.
ORP1M15SALose: The plan was not carried out satisfactorily.  The Sardaukar were not used efficiently.
ORP1M16GNwin: The Smugglers are grateful for our help. They may contact us again.
ORP1M16GNlose: The carryall crashed in one of our territories.  You must locate it.
ORP2M4ORWin: The spy has begun to reveal his secrets.  The information is more extensive than we predicted.  Action may be called for.
ORP2M4ORLose: The spy is dead.  Had he been taken alive, we might have obtained useful information from him.  Information must be gathered by other means.
ORP2M5SMWin: Others must learn respect for House Ordos.  They must be shown that pain and death await all who hinder our plans.
ORP2M5SMLose: Our reputation has been damaged.  House Ordos must not be viewed as weak.
ORP2M6TLWin: The Tleilaxu are grateful for the assistance.  Their research continues.
ORP2M6TLLose: The Tleilaxu suffered severe losses during their attack on the Sardaukar.  Despite their protests, they will still need Ordos help in future.
ORP2M7IxWin: The Ixians will provide us with forces, once their production lines are back in service.  Their gratitude will prove useful.
ORP2M7IxLose: The Ixian organization is severely disrupted.  Their scientists are dead and their production lines halted.  They may not recover for some time.
ORP2M8GNwin: The outpost is now online.  The reinforcements have detected the signal and are heading this way.
ORP2M8GNlose: We must assume that the units crashed in the storm.  They could have proved valuable.
ORP2M9TLWin: The test is complete.  The data is being analyzed. The specimens proved to be powerful and efficient units.  We should seek other opportunities to work with the Tleilaxu, as they arise.
ORP2M9TLLose: Our data regarding the Tleilaxu is insufficient.  We cannot make accurate judgments based upon it.
ORP2M9IxWin: The scientists have been protected.  The Ixian research continues.  Expect payment for our actions very soon.
ORP2M9IxLose: Our failure to protect the scientists was a missed opportunity.
ORP2M10IxWin: Protecting the scientists has allowed Ixian research to continue.  We expect payment for our actions soon enough.
ORP2M10IxLose: Our failure to protect the scientists was a missed opportunity.
ORP2M11IxWin: The Ixians will promptly pay their debts.  It is their way.
ORP2M11IxLose: The Ixian convoy was destroyed.  This has damaged the reputation of House Ordos.
ORP2M12TLWin: We have fulfilled our contract.  The Tleilaxu will pay us soon enough.
ORP2M12TLLose: The convoy was destroyed.  This is unfortunate.
ORP2M13SMWin: The Smugglers fate will dissuade other criminals who would steal from House Ordos.
ORP2M13SMLose: The Smugglers were not punished.  This trouble may continue. Resources allocated for the front line must be spent protecting our supply lines and resource areas.  This is inefficient.
ORP2M14IxWin: Dealing with the Ixians was a wise move.  They are dependable and predictable.
ORP2M14IxLose: The Ixians bargain was an interesting one.  It would have been logical to take it.
ORP2M15IxWin: The Ixians are grateful for your action.  The Tleilaxu were destroyed.
ORP2M15IxLose: The Tleilaxu were not destroyed, as we instructed.
ORP2M16IxWin: The spy has been neutralized.  The Ixians are satisfied.
ORP2M16IxLose: The face dancer escaped, despite your efforts.
ORP2M17IxWin: House Ix is pleased with our efforts to resupply them.  They have promised us aid, once they begin to reap the benefits of their work.
ORP2M17IxLose: The Ixian research in the area has failed, for lack of supplies.
ORP2M18TLWin: The Tleilaxu have offered compensation to all parties, for damages caused by the accident.
ORP2M18TLLose: The Tleilaxu units will spread across the planet.  They must be hunted and destroyed before they threaten our territories.  Forces have been allocated for patrolling the areas to your rear.
ORP2M19TLWin: The destruction of the Ixian base was achieved.  The Landsraad and Tleilaxu express their gratitude.
ORP2M19TLLose: The Ixians are grateful their base was not destroyed.
ORP2M20IxWin: The building has been captured.  The Ixians are reconsidering their bargain with the enemy.
ORP2M20IxLose: It would have been more efficient to capture the Ixian research center.
ORP2M21TLWin: The Sardaukar continue to feud with the Tleilaxu.  There are opportunities here.
ORP2M21TLLose: The Tleilaxu are defeated.  They will continue their feud with the Sardaukar.  We shall see who is the strongest.
ORP2M22TLWin: The Fremen siege is broken.  The Tleilaxu have survived.
ORP2M22TLLose: The Fremen have defeated the Tleilaxu relief column.
ORP3M1TLWin: We have received disturbing information.  The Tleilaxu are communicating covertly with a representative of the Guild. We believe the Tleilaxu will leave Arrakis to avoid retribution from various quarters.  The matter of their communication with the Guild is another factor.  We will consider this.  The Sardaukar developments are interesting.  Pursue any opportunity to improve our relations with them.
ORP3M1TLLose: We need additional data.  The Tleilaxu are not behaving as predicted.   Our strategic extrapolations are unreliable, due to lack of information.
ORP3M2TLWin: The gholas have been captured.  This is fortunate.  They are essential to our strategy.
ORP3M2TLLose: Espionage requires gholas.  Without them, our intelligence is limited.
ORP3M3HKWin: The extraction of the defectors was successful.  Their information indicates that even more troops wish to desert.  These troops are to be used immediately.   Consider them to be expendable.
ORP3M3HKLose: The Harkonnen deserters never reached our position.  This was a waste of potential resources .
ORP3M4SMWin: The Smugglers are grateful for their rescue.  We will present them with our terms.
ORP3M4SMLose: The Smugglers are dead.  A chance for profit was lost.
