ORP3M5FRWin: The Fremen will assist us in the future.  They are childish and easy to manipulate.
ORP3M5FRLose: You missed a rare opportunity to gain Fremen trust.  We may not get another chance.
ORP3M6SAWin: The Tleilaxu are dead.  The Sardaukar have been appeased by your successful assault.  They will not attack.
ORP3M6SALose: The Sardaukar believe that we have sided with the Tleilaxu.  They prepare to attack.  The Sardaukar are a formidable enemy.
ORP3M7TLLose: The Tleilaxu force was handled efficiently.  Even an untrustworthy source of aid may be of benefit.
ORP3M8IxWin: The Atreides supply convoy has been captured.  The Ixians are grateful.
ORP3M8IxLose: The Ixians are disappointed by your failure to capture the convoy.
ORP3M9IxWin: The Harkonnen supply convoy has been delivered to the Ixians, as planned.
ORP3M9IxLose: The Ixians are disappointed that you failed to capture the convoy.
ORP3M10TLWin: The Tleilaxu compensated us for their error, but their regret is insincere.  They are to be watched.  Monitoring and espionage efforts will be increased.
ORP3M10TLLose: The Tleilaxu compensated us for their error, but their regret is insincere.  They are to be watched.  Monitoring and espionage efforts will be increased.
ORP3M11FRWin: Your efficiency is noted.  Fremen resistance should decrease.  An investigation into the malfunction of the Ghola unit is underway.
ORP3M11FRLose: An investigation into the malfunction of the Ghola unit is underway.  Fremen insurgency will continue. Your failure in this matter is noted.  It will be taken into account during your contract renewal negotiations.
ORP1D1FRLose: The Fremen were fooled by the gholas, as we expected.  Primitives such as these are easy to manipulate.
ORP1D2AtWin: Our enemies waste their resources.  Our plans are too advanced for them.
ORP1D2ATLose: The Atreides discovered our plan.  The strategy was sound.  I shall be interrogating possible traitors.
ORP1D3SALose: The Sardaukar blind adherence to the concept of honor makes them easy to manipulate.
ORP1D4Hkwin: Their heavy losses will make the Sardaukar reconsider their alliances..
ORP1D4Hklose: Your inability to deal with a minor Sardaukar attack is cause for concern.  There will be bigger challenges ahead.
ORP1D5FRWin: A Fremen Ghola conditioned to be Loyal to House Ordos will be in position shortly.
ORP1D5FRLose: The Ghola can not be inserted while the Fremen leader is still alive. Other measures will be taken.
ORP1D6SALose: The Sardaukar aid cost us little.  Our ghola must avoid suspicion for now.  We can expect more assistance later.
ORP1D12FRWin: The ghola attack was successful.  The Fremen leadership is in chaos.
ORP1D12FRLose: Gholas are an expensive resource.  They should be used for long term benefit.
ORP1D13Win: Profits have been safely delivered.  House Ordos is stronger for your actions.
ORP1D13Lose: Profits have been lost.  We shall make up the shortfall from other sources.
ORP2D4ORWin: The traitors are dead.  Their secrets died with them.
ORP2D4ORLose: The traitors have escaped.  They must be tracked by our intelligence agents.  They will not live to tell their secrets.
ORP2D5SMWin: This delivery will aid House Ordos.  Put it to good use.
ORP2D6TLLose: The Tleilaxu have not obtained the materials they require. They will turn elsewhere.  Guard your troops.
ORP2D6IxWin: Protecting the scientists has allowed Ixian research to continue.  We expect payment for our actions soon enough.
ORP2D7Ixlose: The rebellion is crushed.  Order must be maintained.
ORP2D5SMLose: You did not collect the delivery.  Your actions are illogical.
ORP3D8Ixlose: Our dealings with the Ixians show promise.  They will be welcomed as allies.
ORP2D9Tlwin: The Executrix are amused by the Atreides and Fremen attacks.
ORP2D9TLlose: The Executrix are disturbed by the Atreides and Fremen attacks.
ORP2D20TLWin: The Sardaukar have sustained heavy casualties.  This will ensure easier negotiations.
ORP2D20TLLose: The gholas were not used efficiently.
ORP2D22TLWin: The Fremen were successfully avoided.  This was most efficient.
ORP2D22TLLose: Your attack on the Fremen provoked the predicted response.  They were to be avoided.
ORP3D1TLWin: The Tleilaxu believe we pose a threat to their operations on Arrakis.  This will be considered.
ORP3D1TLlose: The Sardaukar were not found.  An opportunity was wasted.
ORP3d2TLWin: The Tleilaxu plot was defeated.  They will return.
ORP3d2TLLose: The convoy would have provided valuable resources for the battle.
ORP3D3HKLose: Random executions among the Harkonnen ranks have discouraged further deserters.
ORP3D4SMWin: The Starport was completed on schedule.
ORP3D4SMLose: The Smugglers payments were not collected.
ORP3D5FRWin: The Fremen aid was surprisingly useful.  We may have underestimated them.  This matter will be considered further.
ORP3D5FRLose: As you have seen, the Fremen can make powerful enemies as well as allies.  Attacking them was unwise. We will attempt to rectify the damage you have done.
ORP3M13IxWin: The information from the scientist was revealing.  The Tleilaxu activity is suspect.  Surveillance of the Tleilaxu will increase.
ORP3M13IxLose: In all probability, the message was a trap.
ORP3M14FRWin: This was not our quarrel.  It should have been avoided.
ORP3M14FRLose: Your refusal to involve our forces was wise.
ORP3M15TLWin: The defector is dead.  This incident will be analyzed further.
ORP3M15TLLose: The defector surrendered to us.  His interrogation reveals that the Tleilaxu and Guild representatives have been meeting covertly.  We have no information regarding the subject of these meetings. This is reason for concern.  The Guild does not take sides, but they seem to be making an exception here. All Tleilaxu outposts are to be observed.  All Tleilaxu are to be regarded as suspect.  Contact is discouraged.
ORP3M16TLWin: The deserters have perished from their prolonged exposure in the desert.  Their secrets died with them.  The Tleilaxu are hiding something.  We shall have to watch them more closely.
ORP3M16TLLose: We will never know what the scientists wanted to tell us
ORP3M17SMWin: We have exposed the Smugglers operation.  They dare not supply our enemies now.
ORP3M17SMLose: Your failure to stamp out this unsanctioned Smuggler activity could undermine our war efforts.
ORP3D13Ixwin: The scientist survived.  You are to be commended.
ORP3D13IxLose: The scientist is dead.  It is of no consequence.
ORP1M1FRa: Mentat : A Fremen convoy crosses this territory.  Use the Atreides gholas to attack them.  Destroy the convoy, but leave survivors to spread the news.
ORP1M1FRb: Fremen : Atreides scum!   You talk of friendship, then stab us in the back!
ORP1M1FRc: Mentat : News of the attack will be carried to other sietches.  The Atreides will be held responsible.
ORP1M1FRd: Mentat : There were no survivors to the attack.  Without witnesses, the Fremen will not blame the Atreides for their loss.  The attack was pointless.
ORP1M1FRe: Mentat : The convoy has been detected.  It is heading for a Fremen Camp
ORP1M1FRf: Mentat : We have lost contact with the convoy. It should be heading for the Fremen Camp
ORP1M1FRg: Mentat : The Fremen will be hostile to the Atreides for some time.
ORP1M2ATa: Mentat : Use the Fremen gholas to attack the Atreides base.
ORP1M2ATb: Mentat : Monitors report that the Atreides have observed the Gholas.
ORP1M2Atf: Fremen : We shall avenge the murder of our brethren!
ORP1M2Atff: Mentat : Our plans are nearly complete.
ORP1M2Atg: Fremen : Atreides murderers!  You will die for your crimes!
ORP1M4HKa: Mentat : Use the Ghola to persuade the Sardaukar troops to attack the Harkonnen base.  You will be notified when the Sardaukar have arrived.  You must not allow the enemy to kill the ghola.
ORP1M4HKb: Sardaukar : We were supposed to rendezvous at this location.  Where is the Commander?
ORP1M4HKbb: Mentat : The Sardaukar have arrived.  Utilize the Ghola to take command of them.  The ghola must be protected.  That is the imperative.
ORP1M4HKbbb: Ghola : Our orders have altered.  We are to attack the Harkonnen settlement.
ORP1M4HKc: Sardaukar : Sections 2 and 3 reporting, sir.  Our orders are confirmed.  We are moving against the Harkonnen!
ORP1M4HKd: Mentat : The Ghola is dead.  We will not be able to control the Sardaukar without it.
ORP1M4HKdd: Mentat : The ghola is dead.  The Sardaukar are in retreat.
ORP1M4Hke: Mentat : Our listening posts report that the Ghola has been seen by the enemy.  It will now be targeted for destruction.  If the ghola does not reach the Sardaukar, we will not be able to control them.
ORP1M4HKf: Mentat : The Harkonnen believe that the Sardaukar are going to ally with us.  Their own plans are in turmoil.  The plan is successful.
ORP1M5FRa: Mentat : Insert the ghola inside the Fremen camp.  We predict that insurrection will follow.
ORP1M5FRb: Fremen : Kull wahad!   A prophet walks among us!  At last, a savior comes to lead us!
ORP1M6SAa: Mentat : Direct the ghola to the Sardaukar Barracks.  It must take command.
ORP1M9GNa: Mentat : The enemy in this territory is low on medical supplies and vaccine.  A medical transport vehicle is on its way to their base.  Intercept the vehicle.
ORP1M9GNb: Mentat : The medical vehicle has reached the battle zone.  Stop it before it reaches the enemy base.
ORP1M9GNc: Mentat : The medical vehicle has been destroyed, and the vaccine with it.  The enemy cannot retain this territory without the supplies.  We expect them to retreat soon.
ORP1M9GNd: Mentat : The vaccine has been delivered.  The fate of the medical vehicle is no longer important.  Use your forces to press the attack.  That is the imperative.
ORP1M10GNa: Mentat : Our supply convoy will cross this territory.  You are to escort it and protect it from attack.
ORP1M10GNb: Mentat : The convoy is now in the battle zone.
ORP1M10GNc: Mentat : The convoy has left the battle zone safely.  Your performance was adequate.
ORP1M10GNd: Mentat : The convoy has been destroyed.  Your incompetence has cost us valuable supplies.
ORP1M10GNe: Convoy leader:  Glad to be under your protection, Commander.
ORP1M11HKa: Mentat : The defectors are making their bid to escape.  The Harkonnen are unaware of this.
ORP1M11HKb: Mentat : Harkonnen defectors have been detected.  Send out an escort to ensure their survival.
ORP1M11HKc: Mentat : The defectors have been killed.
ORP1M11HKd: Mentat : We have the information needed to entice more deserters from the Harkonnen forces.
ORP1M12FRa: Mentat : Do not approach the Fremen camp in this region.
ORP1M12FRb: Fremen : Leave us now, out-freyn dog!   We want nothing from outsiders!
ORP1M12FRc: Mentat : Killing Fremen was inefficient.  It did not contribute to our victory.
ORP1M12FRd: Mentat : Destroying the Fremen camp was a needless diversion.
ORP1M13ORa: Mentat : An Engineer has been sent to reactivate the refinery.
ORP1M13ORb: Mentat : We advise repairing the refinery.
ORP1M13ORc: Mentat : Control sequences for the harvester have been found.  It now belongs to House Ordos.
ORP1M13ORd: Mentat : Capturing the barracks will allow you to train infantry in the use of enemy weapons and tactics.
ORP1M14GNa: Mentat : A suspected smugglers convoy has entered the territory.  Inspect it for contraband.
ORP1M14GNb: Mentat : Destroying the convoy was not the directive.  It was a minor point.  Proceed with the mission.  Capture the territory for the Ordos.  Success is imperative.
ORP1M14GNc: Mentat : The convoy has been stopped and its contents are being scanned.
ORP1M14GNd: Mentat : The convoy is smuggling weapon parts.  They will be seized.  The drivers will be brought back for interrogation.
ORP1M14GNe: Mentat : The convoy is legitimate.  It will be allowed to continue.
ORP1M15SAa: Mentat : You are instructed to terminate the commander of a Sardaukar patrol in this region.
ORP1M15SAb: Sardaukar : What is your business here?
ORP1M15SAd: Mentat : The Sardaukar have been eliminated.
ORP1M15SAe: Mentat : You have successfully terminated the Sardaukar.  We have provided evidence that will incriminate the enemy. The Sardaukar will seek revenge.  Use this opportunity for a swift victory.
ORP1M15SAf: Mentat : Your attack on the Sardaukar patrol was observed.  The Sardaukar have been alerted.  This will complicate our conquest of this region.
ORP1M16GNa: Mentat : Find the Smuggler outpost and use an engineer to restore it to active status.
ORP1M16GNb: Mentat : The Outpost is nearby.  There is not much time left.
ORP1M16GNc: Mentat : Increase your efforts.  The advanced carryalls are valuable.  Unless you locate the Outpost, they will be lost.
ORP1M16GNd: Mentat : The carryalls have sent their final distress signal. Reactivate the outpost.
ORP1M16GNe: Pilot Leader: This is Advanced Carryall Flight 23. Your signal is strong. Now homing on your position.
ORP1M16GNf: Mentat : Repair the outpost.  It must be protected until the carryall reaches it.
ORP1M16GNg: Pilot Leader: Advanced Carryall flight 23 reporting. We are yours to command.
ORP1M16GNh: Mentat : The enemy have detected the activated outpost.  They will attack shortly.  The building must be protected.
ORP1M16Gni: Mentat : Contact with the Carryall has been lost. You must capture the region without their help.
ORP1M16GNk: Mentat : Telemetry data indicates that the Carryall crashed in one of our territories.
ORP2M4ORa: Mentat : The agent is trying to return to his masters.  Capture him alive.
ORP2M4ORb: Mentat : Keep the spy alive so that we may interrogate him.
ORP2M4ORbb: Mentat : Release the spy.  It has been fitted with an explosive device.  It will detonate when the enemy attempts to meet with their allies.
ORP2M4ORbc: Mentat : The enemy will learn not to spy on House Ordos.
ORP2M4ORc: Mentat : You have let the spy escape.  We may have lost vital information.
ORP2M5SMa: Mentat : A Smuggler base in this territory is supplying the enemy with vehicles.  Ensure that they are punished.
ORP2M5SMb: Smuggler : Do you think that you can intimidate us?
ORP2M5SMc: Mentat : The Smuggler organization has renounced all ties with the enemy.  All future payments will be made to us.
ORP2M5SMd: Mentat : The Smugglers have received a delivery of vehicles, slated for our enemies.
ORP2M6TLa: Mentat : A squad of Sardaukar has been lured to this region.  Kill them and allow the Tleilaxu to take their corpses for their flesh vats.
ORP2M6TLb: Sardaukar : Deception!  We should have known!  You will pay dearly for our lives!
ORP2M6TLc: Mentat : The Sardaukar are dead.   The Tleilaxu will be grateful when they receive the corpses.
ORP2M6TLcc: Mentat : More Sardaukar have arrived.  They must not be allowed to leave the region alive.
ORP2M7Ixa: Mentat : Prevent the Ixians from being harmed.  Crush the revolt.
ORP2M7Ixb: Suboid : Freedom or death!  Freedom or death!
ORP2M7Ixc: Suboid : We will never be slaves again!  Death before slavery!
ORP2M7Ixd: Ixian : We are grateful to House Ordos.  Once our production returns to normal, we will send payment for your services.  For now, send an engineer to reactivate our factory and it is yours for the coming battle.
ORP2M7Ixe: Mentat : Ixian production will be severely hampered by this rebellion.
ORP2M7TLa: Mentat : Your mission is to test these Tleilaxu units by assimilating the civilian town in this territory.
ORP2M7TLb: Mentat : Data recorded. Collation of data enabled.
ORP2M7TLc: Mentat : All data has been collated and recorded. Now for the true test.  Utilize these units to obtain your prime objective.  Capture the territory.
ORP2M8GNa: Mentat : Locate the old Smuggler outpost in this territory and bring it back on line.  Harvest the spice and capture this territory.   Your objectives are clear.
ORP2M8GNb: Mentat : You have yet to locate the abandoned outpost.  Increase your efforts.  Find it before the storms claim another carryall.
ORP2M8GNc: Mentat : Your inefficiency could result in the loss of valuable equipment.  Locate the Outpost.
ORP2M8GNd: Mentat : The Advanced Carryall is about to become inoperative. Proceed with haste.
ORP2M8GNe: Mentat : The Carryalls have locked on to our signal.  Complete your main objective and capture this territory
ORP2M8GNf: Carryall Pilot: We have your signal, loud and clear.  We shall be with you shortly.
ORP2M8GNg: Carryall Pilot : Flight SM2M8 arrived! Ready and awaiting orders.
ORP2M9TLa: Mentat : Use the Tleilaxu units provided.  Evaluate their usefulness.  Teach the local populace not to underestimate House Ordos.  A cash reward shall be given for each successful experiment.
ORP2M9TLb: Mentat : Data recorded. Collation of data enabled
ORP2M9TLc: Mentat : All data has been collated and recorded. You may now use these units to complete in your prime objective.  Capture this territory.
ORP2M10Ixa: Mentat : Ixian scientists have been stranded by the battle.  Protect them from harm and capture the territory.
ORP2M10Ixb: Ixian : We are in your debt, Commander.  Now we require your protection.  You will be generously rewarded.
ORP2M10Ixc: Mentat : The Ixians are dead.  There will be no reward.  Concentrate on the battle for this area.
ORP2M10Ixd: Mentat : One of the scientists has been lost.  Ensure that the others are protected.
ORP2M10Ixe: Mentat : Tleilaxu units have entered this area.  They intend to attack the scientists.  Intercept and destroy them.
ORP2M11Ixa: Mentat : The Ixian convoy is due to pass through the battle zone.  It must not be harmed.
ORP2M11Ixb: Mentat : The convoy has arrived.  Protect it.
ORP2M11Ixc: Mentat : The convoy has left the area.  Your efforts were successful.
ORP2M11Ixd: Mentat : The convoy has been destroyed.  This was predicted.  It is unfortunate.
ORP2M11Ixe: Ixian : We place ourselves under your protection, Commander.
ORP2M11Ixf: Mentat : Tleilaxu units have been detected in pursuit of the Ixian convoy.  They must be neutralized.
ORP2M11Ixg: Tleilaxu : How dare you interfere in our war with the Ix?   You will join them in death!
ORP2M12TLa: Mentat : The Tleilaxu convoy will arrive shortly.  Ensure that it passes through the territory unharmed.
ORP2M12TLb: Mentat : The convoy has arrived. Escort it through this region.
ORP2M12TLc: Mentat : The convoy has left safely.
ORP2M12TLd: Mentat : The convoy was destroyed.  Concentrate on the mission.  Capture this region.  That is the directive.
ORP2M12TLe: Tleilaxu : You are late, Commander.  We must make haste.
ORP2M13SMa: Mentat : Smugglers have stolen a harvester.  Locate it and reclaim it.  Use as much force as necessary.
ORP2M13SMb: Mentat : The harvester has been located.  Dispose of the guards and recapture our property.
ORP2M13SMc: Mentat : Return the harvester to the gathering of spice.  Eliminate as many smuggler units as possible.  Set an example.  Others will think twice before stealing from the Ordos.
ORP2M13SMd: Mentat : The harvester was destroyed.  Resources were wasted.
ORP2M13SMe: Mentat : An explosive device has been detected on the harvester.  It must not be allowed to enter the base.
ORP2M13SMf: Mentat : The device has detonated and destroyed the harvester.  The Smuggler group will be punished.  Their families will be visited by our gholas.
ORP2M13SMg: Mentat : The stolen harvester has been detected.  Find it, and recover it.
ORP2M14Ixa: Mentat : The Ixians offer vehicles in return for deliveries of spice.  Build a spare harvester and direct it towards their refinery.
ORP2M14Ixb: Ixian : We are satisfied with your delivery of spice.  In exchange, we offer these weapons.
ORP2M14Ixc: Ixian : Why do you attack us?   Leave us in peace!
ORP2M14Ixd: Ixian : We have constructed an Infiltrator for your use.  Now, we require more spice.
ORP2M14Ixe: Ixian : We have more than enough spice to continue our experiments.  You will be rewarded very soon.
ORP2M15Ixa: Mentat : The Ixians have provided units for battle testing.  They offer interesting possibilities.
ORP2M15Ixb: Mentat : Tleilaxu observers have been detected in the enemy base.  They are watching the Ixian vehicles trial.  We shall communicate this to the Ixians.
ORP2M15Ixc: Mentat : Ixian reinforcements have arrived.  They will remain under our command if the Tleilaxu are killed during our assault.
ORP2M15Ixd: Mentat : The Tleilaxu are dead.  The Ixians will provide additional payment for our assistance.
ORP2M16Ixa: Mentat : The Face Dancer spy is in this territory.  Terminate it, and collect the bounty.
ORP2M16Ixb: Mentat : The face dancer is on the move.  Eliminate it!
ORP2M16Ixc: Mentat : Contact has been made with the spy.
ORP2M16Ixd: Mentat : The Face Dancer spy is dead.
ORP2M16Ixe: Mentat : The Face Dancer spy reached his escort.  His elimination will be more difficult now.
ORP2M16Ixf: Mentat : The Tleilaxu have warned us to stay away from their agent.
ORP2M16Ixg: Tleilaxu : You were warned of the consequences, yet you attacked us!   Now, witness our revenge!
ORP2M16Ixh: Mentat : The spy has escaped.  The bounty was lost.
ORP2M17Ixa: Mentat : House Ix asks that we supply equipment to their scientists in this territory.  Guide the sandcrawler to their base.
ORP2M17Ixb: Ixian : These supplies are adequate, but more are required.  Another crawler has been allocated for delivery.
ORP2M17Ixc: Ixian : We have arranged for a third load to be delivered.  This will complete our requirements.
ORP2M17Ixd: Mentat : The supplies have been successfully delivered.  Concentrate on capturing the territory.  Failure is not an option.
ORP2M17Ixe: Mentat : The supply truck has been destroyed.  Only the capture of the territory matters now.
ORP2M17Ixf: Mentat : Stop the sandcrawler.  An explosive device has been found aboard.
ORP2M17Ixg: Mentat : The bomb has a proximity fuse, set to detonate if it approaches the Ixian base.  It must not approach until the base is searched and the trigger found.
ORP2M17Ixh: Mentat : The proximity fuse detonated the explosives.  The sandcrawler is destroyed.
ORP2M17Ixi: Mentat : Tleilaxu units are approaching the sandcrawler.
ORP2M17Ixj: Mentat : The Tleilaxu carry a short-range transmitter.  They intend to trigger the bomb in the sandcrawler.  They must not be allowed to approach the vehicle!
ORP2M17Ixk: Mentat : The Tleilaxu got close enough to detonate the bomb.
ORP2M17Ixl: Mentat : The sandcrawler has been destroyed.  The Ixians cannot complete their experiments.
ORP2M17Ixm: Mentat : We have managed to disarm the bomb.  The sandcrawler can now approach the base.
ORP2M17Ixn: Mentat : The Ixians have constructed an Infiltrator for our use.
ORP2M18TLa: Mentat : Eliminate any Tleilaxu units found.
ORP2M18TLb: Mentat : Transmissions indicate that the Tleilaxu are approaching an enemy base.
ORP2M18TLc: Mentat : The enemy are under attack from the Tleilaxu
ORP2M18TLd: Mentat : Monitors report that the Tleilaxu attack against the enemy has stopped.
ORP2M18TLe: Mentat : Tleilaxu units are attacking our forces.
ORP2M18TLf: Mentat : All Tleilaxu units have been eliminated.
ORP2M18TLg: Mentat : The civilians have been infected by the Tleilaxu.  An effective ploy.
ORP2M18TLh: Mentat : The civilian village is still functioning.  It should be investigated.
ORP2M19TLa: Mentat : The Landsraad demand that we escort an inspector to an Ixian base.  He will investigate alleged infringements of the Butlerian Jihad.
ORP2M19TLb: Tleilaxu : This is the place.  I will be scanning the area for violations of the Butlerian Jihad.
ORP2M19TLc: Tleilaxu : There can be no doubt.  The Ixians are guilty of heresy. Commander, you need not concern yourself with this matter.  We shall be the Landsraad's instrument of justice!
ORP2M19TLd: Ixian : This inspection is a sham.  It is a pretense to justify their attack!   We will match any Tleilaxu offer of payment.
ORP2M19TLe: Tleilaxu : I see that your forces have located the Ixian base.  Please take me there as quickly as possible.
ORP2M19TLf: Tleilaxu : Heretics!  How dare you interfere with the judgment of the Landsraad!  You shall be punished for this outrage!
ORP2M19TLg: Mentat : The Tleilaxu are dead, but their purpose was fulfilled.
ORP2M19TLh: Mentat : The Ixians are grateful for the protection we provided.
ORP2M19TLi: Mentat : The Tleilaxu Inquisitors have completed their task.  The Ixian base has been destroyed.
ORP2M19TLj: Mentat : Despite your efforts, the Ixian base has been destroyed.
ORP2M20Ixa: Mentat : Your mission is to capture the Ixian base in this territory.  Failing this, destroy it.
ORP2M20Ixb: Mentat : The Ixian structure is destroyed.  Now continue with the conquest of the region.  That is the directive.
ORP2M20Ixc: Mentat : The captured research center has been destroyed.  You did not adequately defend it.
ORP2M20Ixd: Mentat : The Ixian base has been captured.  Now you must protect it from enemy attacks.
ORP2M21TLa: Mentat : Protect the Tleilaxu base from Sardaukar attack.
ORP2M21TLb: Mentat : A Sardaukar force has been detected.
ORP2M21TLc: Tleilaxu : The Sardaukar are attacking.  We need your support!
ORP2M21TLd: Sardaukar : Our vendetta is with the Tleilaxu!   If you fight with them, you will DIE with them!
ORP2M21TLe: Mentat : The Tleilaxu have been destroyed.  Turn your attention to the enemy.
ORP2M21TLf: Mentat : The Tleilaxu are weakening.  They cannot survive much longer.
ORP2M21TLg: Mentat : The Sardaukar attack is over.  Concentrate your forces on the enemy.
ORP2M22TLa: Mentat : Protect the Tleilaxu base from Fremen attack.
ORP2M22TLb: Mentat : Fremen raiders have been detected.
ORP2M22TLd: Fremen : You gave aid to the Tleilaxu devils!   Prepare to taste our blades, Ordos!
ORP2M22TLe: Mentat : The Tleilaxu have been destroyed.  Turn your attention to the enemy, Commander.
ORP2M22TLf: Mentat : The Tleilaxu cannot sustain these losses.
ORP2M22TLg: Mentat : The Fremen have been defeated.  Turn your attention towards capturing the territory.
ORP3M1TLa: Mentat : We have become suspicious of Tleilaxu motives.  We have assigned you a scout with special listening equipment. Use him to observe the Tleilaxu base.  Do not approach too closely.  We will inform you when the scout is close enough.
ORP3M1TLb: Mentat : The scout is close enough.  Leave him in position while the listening equipment is calibrated.
ORP3M1TLc: Mentat : Why have you moved the scout out of position?  The listening device must be recalibrated now.  Return him to his position.
ORP3M1TLd: Tleilaxu : Remove your spy, Ordos.  We will not tolerate any further intrusion!  Our affairs are not your concern.
ORP3M1Tle: Mentat : The equipment is in place.  Move the scout away from the Tleilaxu position and concentrate on the battle.
ORP3M1TLf: Soldier : ALERT!  Tleilaxu units are heading for our base.  Our position may be compromised!
ORP3M1TLg: Mentat : The Sardaukar have made contact.  Their command has offered assistance against the Tleilaxu.  Their forces will arrive shortly.
ORP3M1TLh: Mentat : More hostile Tleilaxu units are approaching.
ORP3M1TLi: Mentat : A Sardaukar brigade has been allocated to our defense.  Crush the Tleilaxu and capture the territory.
ORP3M2TLa: Mentat : A Tleilaxu convoy is due to pass through this territory. Capture it and return it to our base.  Once the guards are killed, the Tleilaxu will surrender.
ORP3M2TLb: Mentat : The convoy has left the area.  The cargo is lost.  Concentrate your efforts on capturing the region.
ORP3M2TLc: Mentat : You destroyed all the transport vehicles.  The cargo is lost.  Concentrate your efforts on capturing the territory.
ORP3M2TLd: Mentat : The guards are dead.  The remaining vehicles have surrendered.
ORP3M3HKa: Mentat : A group of Harkonnen soldiers wish to defect.  Protect them until they reach our base.  We must interrogate them.  After that, you may use them to conquer the territory for House Ordos.
ORP3M3HKb: Mentat : The Harkonnen have located the defectors, and are in pursuit.
ORP3M3HKc: Mentat : The defectors have told us all they know.  The information is inconsequential.  They are wiling to fight for us.  Let them die for House Ordos.  Use them to spearhead your attacks and win the battle.
ORP3M4SMa: Mentat : A group of Smugglers under our protection has been targeted by the Tleilaxu.  Protect our investment, and defend their Starport.
ORP3M4SMb: Mentat : The Tleilaxu raiding party has arrived.  The Smugglers will need our assistance.
ORP3M4SMc: Mentat : The Tleilaxu raiders have reached the Smugglers base.
ORP3M4SMd: Tleilaxu : Stay back!   We act on behalf of the Guild in this matter.  Unauthorized transport on Arrakis is forbidden by declaration of the Landsraad council.
ORP3M4SMe: Mentat : The Smugglers are dead.  Other groups will be reluctant to pay protection funds.  Our income will suffer.
ORP3M4SMf: Mentat : The Tleilaxu are dead.  The Smugglers have been instructed to make an advance on their protection payments.
ORP3M4SMg: Mentat : Another group of Tleilaxu has been detected.
ORP3M4SMh: Mentat : You have cleansed the area of Tleilaxu... for now.  It is unfortunate that you could not have done it sooner.
ORP3M4Smi: Tleilaxu : You will suffer for this interference!
ORP3M5FRa: Mentat : Our spies report that the Tleilaxu plan to attack a major Fremen Sietch.  Warn the Fremen and let them ambush the Tleilaxu.  Do not harm any Fremen.
ORP3M5FRb: Fremen : Halt where you stand!  Why have you come here, Ordos?
ORP3M5FRc: Fremen : What do you want?  Speak your mind and leave us!   Don't try our patience!.
ORP3M5FRd: Soldier : We have come with a warning!  The Tleilaxu plan an attack on the sietch near Bled Al-Hazrad.  You may still have time to take action against them.
ORP3M5FRe: Fremen : We're grateful for your warning, but you must leave now!  Do not approach us again.  If this a trick, you will suffer for it!
ORP3M5FRf: Mentat : Why did you kill the Fremen?  Now they will treat us as enemies.  Our intelligence work has been wasted.
ORP3M6SAa: Mentat : Tleilaxu tomb robbers are passing through our territory.  The Sardaukar will attack any house that tolerates the Tleilaxu presence.  We must respond to their incursion.   Destroy the Tleilaxu.
ORP3M6SAb: Mentat : The convoy has escaped.  The Sardaukar are angry.  It will take some time to repair their trust.  Capture the territory to strengthen our position.
ORP3M6SAc: Mentat : The convoy is destroyed.  The Sardaukar will return the stolen bodies to their tombs.  Now concentrate on defeating the enemy in this region.  That is the imperative.
ORP3M7TLa: Mentat : The Tleilaxu offer a gift of their units.  They have proven themselves to be far from trustworthy.  Do not trust this gift.
ORP3M7TLb: Mentat : Warning.  Several Tleilaxu units are malfunctioning.
ORP3M7TLc: Mentat : More units are malfunctioning.  This may be a Tleilaxu trick.
ORP3M8Ixa: Mentat : You are to capture a supply convoy for the Ixians.  Eliminate the guards, and the transports will surrender.  This is your mission.  Success is imperative.
ORP3M8Ixb: Mentat : The convoy has escaped.  Continue with your conquest of the region.  Do not fail.
ORP3M8Ixc: Mentat : The convoy was destroyed.  This was not the plan.  The Ixians will withhold payment.  Continue with your conquest of the region.  Failure is not an option.
ORP3M8Ixd: Mentat : The guards have been defeated.  The drivers have surrendered their vehicles to you.  Seize control of this region.  That is your mission.
ORP3M8Ixe: Atreides : We will never surrender to you, Ordos!
ORP3M8Ixf: Mentat : A predictable response.  Kill the Atreides interlopers and complete your mission.
ORP3M9Ixa: Mentat : In addition to capturing this territory, you will perform an extra duty.  Capture a supply convoy for the Ixians.  Kill the guards and the transports will surrender.  This is your mission.
ORP3M9Ixb: Mentat: The convoy has escaped.  Continue with your conquest of the region.  Do not fail.
ORP3M9Ixc: Mentat:  The convoy was destroyed.  This was not the plan.  The Ixians will withhold payment.  Continue with your conquest of the region.
ORP3M9Ixd: Mentat : You have eliminated the guards.  The drivers have surrendered control of their vehicles to you.  Now seize control of this region.  This is your mission.
ORP3M9Ixf: Mentat : Predictable.  Kill the Harkonnen and complete the mission.
ORP3M10TLa: Mentat : Locate the outpost and report back.
ORP3M10TLb: Mentat : Retake the outpost. The Tleilaxu deny responsibility and claim a malfunction of their units may have occurred.  This is of no consequence. Destroy them.
ORP3M10TLc: Mentat : The outpost is recaptured.  Extra resources have been diverted to your area to ensure that this distraction does not weaken our efforts to conquer the territory.
ORP3M10TLd: Mentat : The Tleilaxu units have been eliminated. The Tleilaxu continue to deny responsibility.  We shall be launching our own investigation.  Continue with your assault.
ORP3M11FRa: Mentat : It appears the Fremen have been in hiding, marshalling their forces for an attack.  Assault this territory and destroy their camp.
ORP3M11FRaa: Mentat : It appears the Fremen have been in hiding, marshalling their forces for an attack.
ORP3M11FRc: Mentat : The Fremen are defeated.  Capture the territory to ensure that their resistance does not trouble us again.
ORP3M11FRd: Mentat : Extra resources have been made available to ensure victory in this region.
ORP3M11FRe: Mentat : The enemy base is under attack.  Our reports indicate that the Fremen are attacking anyone who isn't native to Arrakis.  They are divided, and their resources are overstretched.  We should be able to deal with them easily.
ORP3M12ATa: Mentat : Locate the Ghola and his acquisitions
ORP3M12ATb: Mentat : Ghola and Sonic Tanks have been spotted. Approach them to activate your command.
ORP3M12ATc: Mentat : The Ghola has been killed and the tanks are now in enemy hands.
ORP3M12ATd: Mentat : The Ghola is dead and the sonic tanks have been destroyed. This was an inefficient use of our resources.
ORP3M12ATe: Mentat : The Ghola and Sonic Tanks have been located.  Control of the Sonic Tanks has been assumed.
ORP3M12ATf: Mentat : Destroy the Ghola. Leave no evidence of our subterfuge.
ORP3M12Atg: Mentat : Use existing forces to take control of this area.
ORP3M13Ixa: Mentat : Our tracking stations report unusual activity.  There is a high probability that we have located the scientists.
ORP3M13Ixb: Ixian : We are the only survivors of a research team.  We witnessed some unusual activity in the desert.  Frigates transporting large amounts of strange Tleilaxu equipment to the surface.  They spotted us, and attacked…
ORP3M13Ixc: Ixian : Treachery!  We have been infected by the Tleilaxu!
ORP3M13Ixbb: Ixian : Don't shoot!  Most of our scientific team has been lost to sand storms, worms and dehydration.  We are the only survivors.  We witnessed something strange in the desert, and fell under attack.  We barely escaped with our lives.  Even now, they are tracking us!   Give us asylum at your base, and we will tell you more...
ORP3M14FRa: Mentat : Investigate the Fremen activities in this region.
ORP3M14FRb: Mentat : A group of Fremen have entered the battle zone.
ORP3M14FRc: Tleilaxu : We shall remember this insult.  The time is coming when you will regret your foolish actions.
ORP3M14FRd: Fremen : We will deal with these monsters, then YOU will taste our blades!
ORP3M14FRe: Mentat : The Tleilaxu have been wiped out.  The Fremen are more than a match for the Tleilaxu.
ORP3M14FRf: Fremen : This is our battle!   Do not interfere!
ORP3M14FRg: Tleilaxu : Do not interfere in this holy battle!
ORP3M14FRh: Mentat : The Fremen are dead.  The Tleilaxu are reclaiming the corpses for their own use.
ORP3M14FRi: Tleilaxu : Now you will join your colleagues in the flesh vats!
ORP3M15TLa: Mentat : A Tleilaxu researcher has fled their base.  Eliminate him.
ORP3M15TLb: Tleilaxu Deserter : Please, don't kill me!  I know many secrets.  Spare me, and they are yours...
ORP3M15TLc: Mentat : You were successful.  The Tleilaxu have sent a reward.
ORP3M15TLd: Mentat : The scientist was destroyed, but not before the Tleilaxu presence here was revealed.  They are not pleased.
ORP3M15TLe: Tleilaxu : Why do you protect the traitor?  We will kill him ourselves!
ORP3M15TLf: Tleilaxu : We shall kill the defector ourselves!   Interference will not be tolerated!
ORP3M15TLg: Mentat : Destroying the Tleilaxu strike force may have been a miscalculation.
ORP3M16TLa: Mentat : Tleilaxu deserters are entering the territory now.  Escort them to the base, in safety.
ORP3M16TLb: Tleilaxu Deserter : Protect us!   The Tleilaxu  experiment…  the abomination is coming!   It will kill us all!   We must leave this planet!   Please, help us!
ORP3M16TLc: Mentat : A Tleilaxu squad approaches.  Their target must be the deserters.
ORP3M16TLbb: Tleilaxu Deserter : The abomination is coming . . . no one can escape it . . . it will kill us all . . .
ORP3M17SMa: Mentat : Find the Smuggler Starport and punish the occupants for their misdeeds.
ORP3M17SMb: Smuggler : We give up! There are some deliveries on their way, take them. If you let us live they're yours. Just don't kill us or the deliveries won't complete.
ORP3M17SMc: Smuggler : Here, take these but please don't kill us! There's another delivery coming. If we don't call them in they won't deliver! Our customers are going to want to kill us now though. Please protect us.
ORP3M17SMd: Smuggler : Thank you for letting us live! Perhaps in future we could do a little... business?
ORP3M17SMe: Mentat : You will not receive any deliveries now that the Smuggler Starport has been destroyed.
ORP3M17SMf: Mentat : There will be no more deliveries.  There are no Smugglers left to call them in.
ORP3M17SMx: Mentat : The Smuggler Starport has been captured.   We will not be receiving any more free deliveries courtesy of the enemy.
ORP1D3SAa: Mentat : The Sardaukar have volunteered a force to assist our defense.  They do not realize their error.
ORP1D5FRa: Mentat : The Fremen leader is too ill to travel.  He is being transported in an Atreides medical vehicle.  This will make our task simple.
ORP1D5FRc: Mentat : The leader is dead.  The ghola will be made ready.  Continue with your defense of this territory.
ORP1D5FRd: Mentat : The leader has survived the journey.  Continue with your defense of this territory.
ORP1D6SAa: Mentat : Our agent among the Sardaukar has secured assistance for our defense.
ORP1D11Hka: Mentat : The deserters revealed there are some men stranded in this area.  Enlist their help in your defense of this territory.
ORP1D11HKb: Mentat : The extra troops will prove useful.  Test their loyalty by using them in our defense against the enemy
ORP1D12FRa: Mentat : Use the gholas to attack the Fremen.  Casualties are unimportant.  The council must be disrupted.
ORP1D12FRb: Fremen: Sound the alarm.  We are under attack.
ORP1D12FRc: Mentat : Survivors are escaping.  They are unimportant.  The plan has been successful.
ORP1D12FRd: Mentat : The Fremen are dead.  Their council is over.
ORP1D12FRe: Mentat : More Fremen leaders are arriving.  Attack them.
ORP1D12FRf: Mentat : The Fremen are somewhere in the desert.  We predict that they will move towards their settlement.  Prepare to intercept them.
ORP1D12FRg: Mentat : The Fremen will need time to recover from this attack.
ORP1D13a: Mentat : The convoy requires an escort.  It is a sure target for the enemy.
ORP1D13b: Mentat : The convoy is on its way.
ORP1D13c: Mentat : The convoy is safe.  The escort was successful.
ORP1D13d: Mentat : The convoy has been destroyed.  Our funds are lost.
ORP1D13e: Convoy leader:  We are ready to move, Commander
ORP1D14GNa: Mentat : Civilians are approaching your positions.  They wish to purchase some of the confiscated goods.
ORP1D14GNb: Mentat : The money will help in our defense of this territory
ORP1D16ORa: Mentat : The Carryall wreck is somewhere in the indicated area on your radar screen.  Find it and use the contents as you see fit.
ORP1D16ORb: Mentat : If you cannot locate it, the enemy must have already retrieved the cargo.
ORP2D4ORa: Mentat : Other traitors are fleeing through this territory.  Eliminate them.
ORP2D4ORb: Mentat : The traitors have broken their contracts.  Kill them before they escape.
ORP2D4ORd: Mentat : The traitors are heading toward the enemy base.
ORP2D5SMa: Mentat : Thanks to your decisive action, production revenue has increased.  One of those payments is being sent to you in a Smuggler vehicle.
ORP2D5SMb: Mentat : The payment has arrived.  The enemy will destroy the vehicle if they can.  Rendezvous with it, quickly.
ORP2D6TLa: Mentat : Harvest the local settlement for the Tleilaxu.  You will be paid for your efforts.  Use the Tleilaxu forces to drive the enemy from the territory.
ORP2D6TLb: Mentat : The collection process has started.
ORP2D6TLc: Mentat : The Tleilaxu have their materials.  Now drive the enemy from this region.
ORP2D7Ixa: Mentat : The Ixian payment will arrive shortly.  They warn that other bases have suffered Suboid revolts.  Some of the rebel slaves may enter this territory.  They may threaten our victory.  Destroy any Suboids found.
ORP2D7Ixb: Ixian : Here is your payment, as we promised.
ORP2D7Ixc: Mentat : Suboid rebels have been detected heading towards our positions.
ORP2D7Ixd: Mentat : Suboid rebels are heading towards the enemy positions
ORP2D8GNa: Mentat : Telemetry indicates that the carryall crashed here. There may be salvageable remains.
ORP2D9Tla: Atreides : You will pay dearly for your crimes, Ordos!
ORP2D9TLb: Fremen : By the laws of Kanly, we shall have our revenge!
ORP2D10Ixa: Mentat : The Ix have rewarded us for protecting a group of their scientists.  Use the extra resources efficiently.
ORP2D11Ixa: Mentat : The Ixians have constructed a Research center as a reward.
ORP2D12TLa: Mentat : The Tleilaxu creatures are our payment, for protecting one of the Tleilaxu convoys.
ORP2D13SMa: Mentat : Smugglers have promised compensation for the theft of one of our harvesters.
ORP2D13SMb: Mentat : A harvester has entered the area.  This is the compensation promised us.
ORP2D13SMc: Mentat : The harvester was a bomb.
ORP2D13SMd: Smuggler : This is our gift.  Allow us to take it to your base.
ORP2D13SMe: Mentat : Scans reveal explosives on board the harvester.  Destroy it at once!
ORP2D13SMf: Mentat : The harvester was rigged with explosive charges.  You made the correct choice.
ORP2D14Ixa: Mentat : House Ix have paid us for the spice given to them.
ORP2D14Ixb: Mentat : Ixian units are approaching our base.  We recommend that you investigate.
ORP2D14Ixc: Ixian : As full and final repayment of House Ix's debt, we have been placed under your command.
ORP2D17Ixa: Mentat : We have been given units by the Ixians.
ORP2D17Ixb: Mentat : An Ixian convoy has entered the area carrying another portion of our reward.
ORP2D17Ixc: Mentat : The Ixian convoy has stopped.  Communications have ceased.  Investigate the convoy.
ORP2D17Ixd: Mentat : Tleilaxu spores have been placed in the convoy vehicles.  Destroy them.
ORP2D17Ixe: Mentat : The Tleilaxu move was unexpected, but fruitless.
ORP2D20TLa: Mentat : The ghola will take command of the Sardaukar.  Order the Sardaukar to attack the enemy defenses.  While the ghola leads them, they will die before they retreat.
ORP2D20TLb: Sardaukar : Reporting as ordered, Commander.  We await your instructions.
ORP2D20TLbb: Mentat : The captured codes worked.  The Sardaukar have answered our signals.  Take the Ghola to them.  Ensure that it is kept safe.
ORP2D20TLbbb: Ghola : The enemy waits.  Death before dishonor!
ORP2D20TLc: Sardaukar : Orders confirmed!  Death before dishonor!
ORP2D20TLcc: Mentat : More Sardaukar troops have been summoned by us.
ORP2D20TLdd: Mentat : The Sardaukar will not fight without orders.  They are returning to their bases.
ORP2D20TLe: Mentat : The enemy has intercepted our transmissions.  They will try to kill the ghola to prevent the plan from succeeding.  Protect the ghola.
ORP2D20TLf: Mentat : The plan is successful.  The Sardaukar will suffer casualties. They will be weakened when next we come to negotiate.
ORP2D21TLa: Mentat : The Sardaukar are enraged.  Expect an attack, in retaliation for your defense of the Tleilaxu base.  Prepare your defenses.
ORP2D21TLb: Mentat : A column of Sardaukar has entered the area.  It is heading for your position.  The Tleilaxu are sending a relief force.
ORP2D21TLc: Mentat : The Sardaukar are attacking.  The Tleilaxu have not yet arrived.
ORP2D21TLd: Mentat : The Tleilaxu have arrived.  The Sardaukar column is neutralized.
ORP2D21TLe: Mentat : The Sardaukar have been wiped out.  The Tleilaxu are now under our control.  The Tleilaxu ask if we liked "the wrapping on their gifts"?
ORP2D21TLf: Mentat : The Sardaukar are dead, and the Contaminators with them.  The Tleilaxu ask if we "liked the wrapping on their gifts"?
ORP2D22TLa: Mentat: Do not approach the Fremen camp in this region.
ORP2D22TLb: Fremen : Out-freyn dogs!   All outsiders are enemies to the tribe!
ORP2D22TLc: Mentat : Killing Fremen does not aid House Ordos.
ORP3D1TLa: Mentat : A squad of Sardaukar have been allocated to our defense.  They were ambushed by the Tleilaxu and are separated from their battalion.  Locate them and use them to defend the territory.
ORP3D1TLb: Mentat : Spotters have picked up a signal.  It may be the Sardaukar.
ORP3D1TLc: Mentat : The Sardaukar have made contact. They are requesting a guide to our positions.
ORP3D1TLd: Mentat : The Sardaukar have been infected by the Tleilaxu.  Destroy them.
ORP3D1TLe: Mentat : This possibility was predicted and accounted for. Sardaukar have been informed of a Tleilaxu presence in this territory. They will arrive soon.
ORP3D2TLa: Mentat : Capture the Tleilaxu convoy and return with it to our base.
ORP3D2TLb: Mentat : The convoys position has been pinpointed for you.
ORP3D2TLc: Mentat : The convoy has escaped.  A valuable opportunity has been lost.  Ensure that your victory minimizes its impact on Ordos strategy.  Success is imperative.
ORP3D2TLd: Mentat : The convoy is a trap set by the Tleilaxu. This was not foreseen.
ORP3D2TLe: Mentat : Tleilaxu reinforcements have been detected converging on your position.  They will complete the ambush.  There are no extra units available for assistance.  Failure is not an option.
ORP3D3HKa: Mentat : The other Harkonnen deserters have arrived.  They have been placed under your command.
ORP3D4SMa: Mentat : If a Starport can be constructed in time, the Smugglers will make a delivery of vehicles to you.
ORP3D4SMb: Mentat : The Starport is completed.  The frigate will be landing shortly.
ORP3D4SMc: Mentat : The frigate has run out of time.  It must leave orbit to avoid detection.  They will not be able to deliver the vehicles.
ORP3D5FRa: Mentat : Thanks to your efforts to warn the Fremen earlier, they will be assisting in our defense of this territory.
ORP3D5FRb: Mentat : A group of Fremen have arrived to attack the enemy.
ORP3D5FRc: Fremen : Traitors!  We came to assist you, and now you stab us in the back!
ORP3D6SAa: Mentat : The Sardaukar have granted you command of their barracks in this territory.  Make good use of it.
ORP3D8Ixintro: Mentat : Your objective is to capture the territory. The Ixians have promised us special units in return for our help.
ORP3D8Ixa: Mentat : This is the first installment of copied units as promised by the Ixians,  They were constructed from the parts you captured for them.  Use them effectively.
ORP3D8Ixb: Mentat : The Ixians have supplied additional enemy units for our use.
ORP3D8Ixc: Mentat : A final installment of enemy units has been supplied for our use.
ORP3D9Ixa: Mentat : Here are some units copied by the Ixians. Use them to defend this territory
ORP3D13Ixa: Mentat : We are picking up incoming Ixian units.
ORP3D13Ixb: Mentat : The Ixian deserter is dead.  We will now be unable to interrogate him for information.
ORTutorialA: Mentat : A squad of troops has been assigned to your command.
ORTutorialB: Mentat : A beacon has been placed near an enemy radar outpost to the north-east of your position.  Move your troops to the beacon.  Then await further instruction.
ORTutorialD: Mentat : The outpost is destroyed.  It is safe to deliver a Mobile Construction Vehicle.  Move this vehicle onto the rock.  Once there, deploy it to create a Construction Yard.  Ensure that your troops do not block the deployment of the vehicle.
ORTutorialE: Mentat : The Construction Yard is functional. Other base structures may now be constructed.
ORTutorialF: Mentat : Build an Outpost to gain radar coverage.
ORTutorialF2: Mentat : Build a Windtrap.  These structures generate power. Other structures in a base require power to function.
ORTutorialG: Mentat : You learn swiftly.  Continue by building a Refinery and a Barracks.
ORTutorialH: Mentat : A harvester and carryall are delivered once a refinery is constructed.  Harvesters automatically harvest spice from the desert and deliver it to the Refinery for purification.  If the harvester is destroyed, a replacement will be delivered.
ORTutorialI: Mentat : The barracks allows extra troops to be trained.  Build a number of extra infantry.  Do not build scouts.  The scouts delivered will be sufficient.
ORTutorialJ: Mentat : Atreides troops have been detected.  Send a scout to the beacon on the northern end of the rock outcropping to watch for the enemy.
ORTutorialK: Mentat : Wait here for the Atreides squad to approach.  Do not send troops to engage the enemy.  Wormsign has been detected.  Traveling over the sand would be dangerous.
ORTutorialL: Mentat : It is a giant worm, known to the Fremen as the Shai-Hulud.  These are the largest and most dangerous of the worms.  Sandworms are highly mobile.  This worm will leave soon.
ORTutorialM: Mentat : Atreides units survived the worm attack.  Prepare to engage them.
ORTutorialN: Mentat : The enemy squad is defeated.  Prepare your force to defeat the main enemy base.
ORTutorialO: Mentat : The worm has gone.  Collect your forces and send them to the beacon to the east of your base.
ORTutorialP: Mentat : The depression of gray sand is a dustbowl.  The fine sands make it impassable to all units except Ordos hover vehicles.  It is an important tactical resource.  Travel to the beacon to the south-east.
ORTutorialQ: Mentat : Broken ground is of  tactical importance.  The roughness of the terrain prevents vehicles from entering these areas.  Infantry may use the terrain as cover against weapons.  Infantry may use them as efficient shields, hiding places and firing positions.
ORTutorialR: Mentat : The main enemy base is located at the north-east border of this territory.  Eliminate it.
ORTutorialS: Mentat : The enemy base has been found.  Priority targets are the production facilities - the Barracks,  Factories, and Construction Yard.   Destroy these first.   Eliminate any enemy that attempts to attack.
ORTutorialT: Mentat : Intelligence data was insufficient.  Atreides forces include a Trike and a Mongoose.  These vehicles carry heavy weapons. The Mongoose can crush infantry.  We shall supply  a Laser Tank and a Kobra to ensure victory.
ORTutorialU: Mentat : The Atreides Construction Yard has been destroyed.  They will now be unable to rebuild.  Early destruction of production facilities is an effective tactic.
ORTutorialV: Mentat : Destroying the barracks will ensure that the Atreides cannot train reinforcements.
ORTutorialW: Mentat : All enemy buildings have been destroyed.  Neutralize remaining resistance.
ORTutorialX: Mentat : Without troops, the base is defenseless.  Destroy it.
ORTutorialY: Mentat : The enemy base and its guardians have all been destroyed.  This area now belongs to the Ordos.
ORTutorialZ: Mentat : Reinforcements are arriving to replace Ordos losses.
ORHLa: Mentat : Enemy reinforcements must not reach Arrakis.  Deviator Gas will be introduced into the oxygen supply of the Heighliner. Two engineers have been assigned to you for this purpose.  A bodyguard is also present.  Rely on stealth rather than strength to complete this mission.
ORHLb: Mentat : The engineer has sabotaged the oxygen generator.  The enemy will kill one another.  The plan has succeeded.
ORHLc: Mentat : Your force has been spotted.  Retreat and avoid being seen again.
ORHLd: Mentat : Without the engineers, you cannot succeed in your mission.
ORHLe: Mentat : The alarm has been raised.   A squad of troops is in pursuit.  Proceed to the oxygen regenerator immediately.  Failure is not an option.
OREndmissionWin: Mentat : The Guild and Tleilaxu are defeated.  The Ordos are all powerful.
OREndMissionC: Mentat : The creature must be destroyed before it becomes fully conscious.
OREndMissionD: Mentat : The creature needs spice to develop.  Destroy the Guild Harvesters to buy our forces more time.
OREndMissionE: Mentat : The enemy has constructed more harvesters. The creature continues to develop.  Kill it before it awakens.
OREndMission00: Mentat : You have delayed the Creatures awakening.  It must be terminated.  That is the objective.
